description: The fair value of collateral received by the entity associated with securities borrowed that must be returned if the counterparty fulfills its obligations. It appears on the balance sheet as a liability and has a corresponding asset that appears on the balance sheet called Securities Received as Collateral.

tlabel: oci, liability for future policy benefit, gain (loss), after reclassification adjustment, tax, parent
description: Amount, after tax and reclassification adjustment, of unrealized gain (loss) from (increase) decrease in liability for future policy benefit from change in discount rate, attributable to parent.

tlabel: oci, liability for future policy benefit, gain (loss), after reclassification adjustment, before tax
description: Amount, before tax and after reclassification adjustment, of unrealized gain (loss) from (increase) decrease in liability for future policy benefit from change in discount rate.

tlabel: oci, debt securities, available-for-sale, gain (loss), after adjustment, tax
description: Amount, after tax and adjustment, of unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) and unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to available-for-sale.

tlabel: other comprehensive (income) loss, defined benefit plan, after reclassification adjustment, before tax
description: Amount, before tax, after reclassification adjustment, of (increase) decrease in accumulated other comprehensive income for defined benefit plan.
Amount of investments classified as other.
Amount of expense or loss included in net income that result in no cash flow, classified as other.
Amount due to policyholders for funds held that are returnable under the terms of insurance contracts, classified as other.

tlabel: payments for (proceeds from) hedge, investing activities
description: The cash outflow or inflow for a financial contract that meets the hedge criteria as either a cash flow hedge, fair value hedge, or hedge of a net investment in a foreign operation.

tlabel: payments to acquire debt securities, available-for-sale
description: Amount of cash outflow to acquire investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).
The cash outflow for the purchase of loan receivable arising from the financing of goods and services.
Amount of cash outflow to acquire investments classified as other.
Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date, net of allowance for doubtful accounts, of all premiums and other types of receivables due from other persons or entities.
Amount, after premiums ceded to other entities and premiums assumed by the entity, of premiums earned.

tlabel: proceeds from maturities, prepayments, calls of held-to-maturity securities
description: The cash inflow associated with the maturity, prepayments and calls (requests for early payments) of debt securities designated as held-to-maturity.

tlabel: proceeds from sale, collection of loans receivable
description: The cash inflow associated with the sale and collection of loans receivables arising from the financing of goods and services.

tlabel: proceeds from sale of treasury stock
description: The cash inflow from the issuance of an equity stock that has been previously reacquired by the entity.

tlabel: stock issued during period, value, stock options exercised
description: Value of stock issued as a result of the exercise of stock options.

tlabel: stock issued during period, value, treasury stock reissued
description: Value of treasury shares or units reissued. Excludes reissuance of shares or units in treasury for award under share-based payment arrangement.
Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable for statutory income, sales, use, payroll, excise, real, property and other taxes.
Carrying amount of premiums written on insurance contracts that have not been earned as of the balance sheet date.

tlabel: liability for future policy benefit, remeasurement gain (loss), limited-payment contract
description: Amount of remeasurement gain (loss) on liability for future policy benefit for limited-payment contract from application of revised benefit ratio as of contract issue date.

tlabel: real estate owned, transfer to real estate owned
description: Value transferred from mortgage loans to real estate owned (REO) in noncash transactions.
The cash inflow from a segregated fund account during the period.

tlabel: adjustments to reconcile net income (loss) to cash provided by (used in) operating activities
description: The sum of adjustments which are added to or deducted from net income or loss, including the portion attributable to noncontrolling interest, to reflect cash provided by or used in operating activities, in accordance with the indirect cash flow method.

tlabel: allowance for doubtful accounts, premiums, other receivables
description: The valuation allowance as of the balance sheet date to reduce the gross amount of receivables to estimated net realizable value, which would be presented in parentheses on the face of the balance sheet.
Amount of write-down of assets recognized in the income statement. Includes, but is not limited to, losses from tangible assets, intangible assets and goodwill.

Amount of currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions. Includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits. Excludes cash and cash equivalents within disposal group and discontinued operation.
Represents the aggregate of total long-term debt, including current maturities and short-term debt.

tlabel: debt securities, available-for-sale, allowance for credit loss, excluding accrued interest
description: Amount excluding accrued interest, of allowance for credit loss on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

tlabel: debt securities, available-for-sale, amortized cost, excluding accrued interest, before allowance for credit loss
description: Amortized cost excluding accrued interest, before allowance for credit loss, of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

tlabel: debt securities, available-for-sale, excluding accrued interest
description: Amount excluding accrued interest, of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

tlabel: deferred policy acquisition costs, present value of future insurance profits, amortization
description: Amount of amortization expense (reversal of expense) for deferred policy acquisition costs and present value of future profits from insurance contract acquired in business combination.

tlabel: disposal group, not discontinued operation, gain (loss) on disposal
description: Amount before tax of gain (loss) recognized on the sale or disposal of a disposal group. Excludes discontinued operations.

tlabel: financing receivable, allowance for credit loss, excluding accrued interest
description: Amount excluding accrued interest, of allowance for credit loss on financing receivable. Excludes net investment in lease.

tlabel: financing receivable, excluding accrued interest, after allowance for credit loss
description: Amortized cost excluding accrued interest, after allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable. Excludes net investment in lease.

tlabel: funds held under reinsurance agreements, liability
description: Amount of funds held as security for payments to be received under reinsurance contracts.

tlabel: income (loss) from continuing operations, net of tax, including portion attributable to noncontrolling interest
description: Amount after tax of income (loss) from continuing operations including portion attributable to the noncontrolling interest.

tlabel: income (loss) from discontinued operations, net of tax, including portion attributable to noncontrolling interest
description: Amount after tax of income (loss) from a discontinued operation including the portion attributable to the noncontrolling interest. Includes, but is not limited to, the income (loss) from operations during the phase-out period, gain (loss) on disposal, gain (loss) for reversal of write-down (write-down) to fair value, less cost to sell, and adjustments to a prior period gain (loss) on disposal.

tlabel: increase (decrease) in liability for claims, claims adjustment expense reserve
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in liability to reflect the estimated ultimate cost of settling claims relating to insured events that have occurred on or before the balance sheet date, whether or not reported to the insurer at that date.

Income from agency and brokerage operations (includes sales of annuities and supplemental contracts); service charges, commissions, and fees from the sale of insurance and related services; and management fees from separate accounts, deferred annuities, and universal life products.
Amount of interest expense for allocation to policyholder account balance.

tlabel: liability for claims, claims adjustment expense
description: The amount needed to reflect the estimated ultimate cost of settling claims relating to insured events that have occurred on or before the balance sheet date, whether or not reported to the insurer at that date.

tlabel: noncontrolling interest, increase from subsidiary equity issuance
description: Amount of increase in noncontrolling interest from subsidiary issuance of equity interests to noncontrolling interest holders.

tlabel: other comprehensive income (loss), financial liability, fair value option, after tax, reclassification adjustment
description: Amount, after tax and reclassification adjustment, of gain (loss) from increase (decrease) in instrument-specific credit risk of financial liability measured under fair value option.
Amount of short-term investments classified as other.

The net amount paid (received) by the reporting entity through acquisition or sale and maturities of short-term investments with an original maturity that is three months or less which qualify for treatment as an investing activity based on management's intention and intended by management to be liquidated, if necessary, within the current operating cycle. Includes cash flows from securities classified as trading securities that were acquired for reasons other than sale in the short-term.

tlabel: payments of ordinary dividends, preferred stock, preference stock
description: Amount of cash outflow in the form of ordinary dividends to preferred shareholders of the parent entity.

tlabel: payments to acquire mortgage notes receivable
description: The cash outflow from the purchase of receivables arising from the mortgage note on real estate.

tlabel: payments to acquire trading securities held-for-investment
description: The cash outflow to acquire securities classified as trading securities and held for investment purposes. Excludes payments for trading securities purchased and held principally for the purpose of selling them in the near term (thus held for only a short period of time).
Amount of liability due to policyholder for deposit held under long-duration contract issued by insurance entity.

tlabel: preferred stock dividends, income statement impact
description: The amount of preferred stock dividends that is an adjustment to net income apportioned to common stockholders.

tlabel: preferred stock, including additional paid in capital
description: Aggregate issuance value of nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) issued and outstanding.
Value of the difference between preference in liquidation and the par or stated values of the preferred shares.

tlabel: proceeds from sale, collection of mortgage notes receivable
description: The cash inflow from proceeds from sale of receivables arising from the mortgage note on real estate; includes collections on mortgage notes receivable that are not classified as operating cash flows.

tlabel: proceeds from sale of debt, equity securities, fv-ni, held-for-investment
description: The cash inflow associated with the sale of securities classified as trading securities and held for investment purposes. Excludes proceeds from trading securities purchased and held principally for the purpose of selling them in the near term (thus held for only a short period of time).
Amount of asset at fair value held for benefit of separate account policyholder.
Amount of liability for variable contract in which all or portion of contract holder's funds is allocated to specific separate account and supported by assets held in separate account.
Amount of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading).
Amount of unrealized gain (loss) on investment.
The cash outflow for a segregated fund account during the period.

Amount of asset position for contract or contract feature in long-duration contract issued by insurance entity that both protects contract holder from other-than-nominal capital market risk and exposes insurance entity to other-than-nominal capital market risk.

tlabel: market risk benefit, change in fair value, gain (loss)
description: Amount of gain (loss) from (increase) decrease in fair value of contract or contract feature in long-duration contract issued by insurance entity that both protects contract holder from other-than-nominal capital market risk and exposes insurance entity to other-than-nominal capital market risk. Excludes change attributable to instrument-specific credit risk.

Amount of liability position for contract or contract feature in long-duration contract issued by insurance entity that both protects contract holder from other-than-nominal capital market risk and exposes insurance entity to other-than-nominal capital market risk.

tlabel: oci, market risk benefit, instrument-specific credit risk, gain (loss), after adjustments, tax
description: Amount, after tax and adjustments, of unrealized gain (loss) from (increase) decrease in instrument-specific credit risk on contract or contract feature in long-duration contract issued by insurance entity that both protects contract holder from other-than-nominal capital market risk and exposes insurance entity to other-than-nominal capital market risk.

tlabel: proceeds from divestiture of businesses, net of cash divested
description: This element represents the cash inflow during the period from the sale of a component of the entity.
The cash inflow from a segregated fund account during the period.

tlabel: adjustments to reconcile net income (loss) to cash provided by (used in) operating activities
description: The sum of adjustments which are added to or deducted from net income or loss, including the portion attributable to noncontrolling interest, to reflect cash provided by or used in operating activities, in accordance with the indirect cash flow method.

tlabel: allowance for doubtful accounts, premiums, other receivables
description: The valuation allowance as of the balance sheet date to reduce the gross amount of receivables to estimated net realizable value, which would be presented in parentheses on the face of the balance sheet.

tlabel: disposal group, including discontinued operation, assets
description: Amount classified as assets attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of.

Amount of currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions. Includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits. Excludes cash and cash equivalents within disposal group and discontinued operation.

tlabel: debt securities, available-for-sale, allowance for credit loss, excluding accrued interest
description: Amount excluding accrued interest, of allowance for credit loss on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

tlabel: debt securities, available-for-sale, amortized cost, excluding accrued interest, before allowance for credit loss
description: Amortized cost excluding accrued interest, before allowance for credit loss, of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

tlabel: debt securities, available-for-sale, excluding accrued interest
description: Amount excluding accrued interest, of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

tlabel: deferred policy acquisition costs, present value of future insurance profits, amortization
description: Amount of amortization expense (reversal of expense) for deferred policy acquisition costs and present value of future profits from insurance contract acquired in business combination.

tlabel: disposal group, not discontinued operation, gain (loss) on disposal
description: Amount before tax of gain (loss) recognized on the sale or disposal of a disposal group. Excludes discontinued operations.

tlabel: financing receivable, allowance for credit loss, excluding accrued interest
description: Amount excluding accrued interest, of allowance for credit loss on financing receivable. Excludes net investment in lease.

tlabel: financing receivable, excluding accrued interest, after allowance for credit loss
description: Amortized cost excluding accrued interest, after allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable. Excludes net investment in lease.

tlabel: funds held under reinsurance agreements, liability
description: Amount of funds held as security for payments to be received under reinsurance contracts.

tlabel: increase (decrease) in liability for claims, claims adjustment expense reserve
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in liability to reflect the estimated ultimate cost of settling claims relating to insured events that have occurred on or before the balance sheet date, whether or not reported to the insurer at that date.

Income from agency and brokerage operations (includes sales of annuities and supplemental contracts); service charges, commissions, and fees from the sale of insurance and related services; and management fees from separate accounts, deferred annuities, and universal life products.
Amount of interest expense for allocation to policyholder account balance.

tlabel: disposal group, including discontinued operation, liabilities
description: Amount classified as liabilities attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of.

tlabel: liability for claims, claims adjustment expense
description: The amount needed to reflect the estimated ultimate cost of settling claims relating to insured events that have occurred on or before the balance sheet date, whether or not reported to the insurer at that date.

Amount of asset position for contract or contract feature in long-duration contract issued by insurance entity that both protects contract holder from other-than-nominal capital market risk and exposes insurance entity to other-than-nominal capital market risk.

tlabel: market risk benefit, change in fair value, gain (loss)
description: Amount of gain (loss) from (increase) decrease in fair value of contract or contract feature in long-duration contract issued by insurance entity that both protects contract holder from other-than-nominal capital market risk and exposes insurance entity to other-than-nominal capital market risk. Excludes change attributable to instrument-specific credit risk.

Amount of liability position for contract or contract feature in long-duration contract issued by insurance entity that both protects contract holder from other-than-nominal capital market risk and exposes insurance entity to other-than-nominal capital market risk.

tlabel: noncontrolling interest, increase from subsidiary equity issuance
description: Amount of increase in noncontrolling interest from subsidiary issuance of equity interests to noncontrolling interest holders.

tlabel: oci, market risk benefit, instrument-specific credit risk, gain (loss), after adjustments, tax
description: Amount, after tax and adjustments, of unrealized gain (loss) from (increase) decrease in instrument-specific credit risk on contract or contract feature in long-duration contract issued by insurance entity that both protects contract holder from other-than-nominal capital market risk and exposes insurance entity to other-than-nominal capital market risk.
Amount of short-term investments classified as other.

The net amount paid (received) by the reporting entity through acquisition or sale and maturities of short-term investments with an original maturity that is three months or less which qualify for treatment as an investing activity based on management's intention and intended by management to be liquidated, if necessary, within the current operating cycle. Includes cash flows from securities classified as trading securities that were acquired for reasons other than sale in the short-term.

tlabel: payments of ordinary dividends, preferred stock, preference stock
description: Amount of cash outflow in the form of ordinary dividends to preferred shareholders of the parent entity.

tlabel: payments to acquire mortgage notes receivable
description: The cash outflow from the purchase of receivables arising from the mortgage note on real estate.

tlabel: payment for acquisition, trading security, held-for-investment
description: The cash outflow to acquire securities classified as trading securities and held for investment purposes. Excludes payments for trading securities purchased and held principally for the purpose of selling them in the near term (thus held for only a short period of time).
Amount of liability due to policyholder for deposit held under long-duration contract issued by insurance entity.

tlabel: preferred stock dividends, income statement impact
description: The amount of preferred stock dividends that is an adjustment to net income apportioned to common stockholders.

tlabel: preferred stock, including additional paid in capital
description: Aggregate issuance value of nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) issued and outstanding.
Value of the difference between preference in liquidation and the par or stated values of the preferred shares.

tlabel: proceeds from divestiture of businesses, net of cash divested
description: This element represents the cash inflow during the period from the sale of a component of the entity.

tlabel: proceeds from sale, collection of mortgage notes receivable
description: The cash inflow from proceeds from sale of receivables arising from the mortgage note on real estate; includes collections on mortgage notes receivable that are not classified as operating cash flows.

tlabel: proceeds from sale, debt security, trading,, equity security, fv-ni, held-for-investment
description: The cash inflow associated with the sale of securities classified as trading securities and held for investment purposes. Excludes proceeds from trading securities purchased and held principally for the purpose of selling them in the near term (thus held for only a short period of time).
Amount of asset at fair value held for benefit of separate account policyholder.
Amount of liability for variable contract in which all or portion of contract holder's funds is allocated to specific separate account and supported by assets held in separate account.
Amount of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading).
Amount of unrealized gain (loss) on investment.
The cash outflow for a segregated fund account during the period.

tlabel: increase (decrease) in accrued investment income receivable
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in investment income that has been earned but not yet received in cash.

tlabel: increase (decrease) in cash collateral for loaned securities
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amount of cash that is received as security when loaning securities.
The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in other expenses incurred but not yet paid.
The change in prepaid reinsurance premiums recorded on the balance sheet, which is needed to adjust net income to arrive at net cash flows provided by or used in operations.

Amount before allowance of loans made to policy and contract holders using their life insurance contracts' cash value or separate accounts as collateral. Includes deferred interest and fees, undisbursed portion of loan balance, unamortized costs and premiums over and discounts from face amounts. Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

tlabel: mortgage loans on real estate, commercial, consumer, net
description: The balance represents the amount of loans that are secured by real estate mortgages, offset by the reserve to cover probable credit losses on the loan portfolio.

tlabel: oci, debt securities, available-for-sale, gain (loss), after adjustment, tax
description: Amount, after adjustment, of tax expense (benefit) for unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) and tax expense (benefit) for unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to available-for-sale.

tlabel: other comprehensive income (loss), foreign currency translation adjustment, tax
description: Amount of tax expense (benefit), after reclassification adjustments of gain (loss) on foreign currency translation adjustments, foreign currency transactions designated and effective as economic hedges of a net investment in a foreign entity and intra-entity foreign currency transactions that are of a long-term-investment nature.
Amount of long-term investments classified as other.

tlabel: premium receivable, allowance for credit loss
description: The carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the estimated valuation allowance to reduce gross premiums receivable to net realizable value.

tlabel: reinsurance recoverables, including reinsurance premium paid
description: Amount, after valuation allowance, recoverable under reinsurance contracts including premium paid under reinsurance contracts. Examples include, but are not limited to, settled and unsettled claims, incurred but not reported losses, loss adjustment expense, premium paid, policy benefits and policy reserves.

tlabel: reinsurance recoverable, allowance for credit loss
description: Amount of allowance for credit loss on reinsurance recoverable.
Amount of current income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to taxable income (loss) from continuing operations.

tlabel: increase (decrease) in accrued investment income receivable
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in investment income that has been earned but not yet received in cash.

tlabel: increase (decrease) in cash collateral for loaned securities
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amount of cash that is received as security when loaning securities.
The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in other expenses incurred but not yet paid.
The change in prepaid reinsurance premiums recorded on the balance sheet, which is needed to adjust net income to arrive at net cash flows provided by or used in operations.

Amount before allowance of loans made to policy and contract holders using their life insurance contracts' cash value or separate accounts as collateral. Includes deferred interest and fees, undisbursed portion of loan balance, unamortized costs and premiums over and discounts from face amounts. Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

tlabel: mortgage loans on real estate, commercial, consumer, net
description: The balance represents the amount of loans that are secured by real estate mortgages, offset by the reserve to cover probable credit losses on the loan portfolio.

tlabel: oci, liability for future policy benefit, gain (loss), before reclassification adjustment, after tax
description: Amount, after tax and before reclassification adjustment, of unrealized gain (loss) from (increase) decrease in liability for future policy benefit from change in discount rate.

tlabel: oci, liability for future policy benefit, gain (loss), before reclassification adjustment, tax
description: Amount, before reclassification adjustment, of tax expense (benefit) for unrealized gain (loss) from (increase) decrease in liability for future policy benefit from change in discount rate.

tlabel: oci, debt securities, available-for-sale, gain (loss), after adjustment, tax
description: Amount, after adjustment, of tax expense (benefit) for unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) and tax expense (benefit) for unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to available-for-sale.

tlabel: other comprehensive income (loss), foreign currency translation adjustment, tax
description: Amount of tax expense (benefit), after reclassification adjustments of gain (loss) on foreign currency translation adjustments, foreign currency transactions designated and effective as economic hedges of a net investment in a foreign entity and intra-entity foreign currency transactions that are of a long-term-investment nature.
Amount of long-term investments classified as other.

tlabel: reinsurance recoverables, including reinsurance premium paid
description: Amount, after valuation allowance, recoverable under reinsurance contracts including premium paid under reinsurance contracts. Examples include, but are not limited to, settled and unsettled claims, incurred but not reported losses, loss adjustment expense, premium paid, policy benefits and policy reserves.

tlabel: reinsurance recoverable, allowance for credit loss
description: Amount of allowance for credit loss on reinsurance recoverable.

tlabel: oci, liability for future policy benefit, gain (loss), after reclassification adjustment, tax
description: Amount, after tax and reclassification adjustment, of unrealized gain (loss) from (increase) decrease in liability for future policy benefit from change in discount rate.

tlabel: oci, liability for future policy benefit, gain (loss), after reclassification adjustment, tax
description: Amount, after reclassification adjustment, of tax expense (benefit) for unrealized gain (loss) from (increase) decrease in liability for future policy benefit from change in discount rate.

tlabel: premium receivable, allowance for credit loss
description: The carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the estimated valuation allowance to reduce gross premiums receivable to net realizable value.

tlabel: share-based payment arrangement, decrease for tax withholding obligation
description: Amount of decrease to equity for grantee's tax withholding obligation for award under share-based payment arrangement.

tlabel: adjustments to additional paid in capital, equity component of convertible debt
description: Adjustment to additional paid in capital resulting from the recognition of convertible debt instruments as two separate components - a debt component and an equity component. This bifurcation may result in a basis difference associated with the liability component that represents a temporary difference for purposes of applying accounting for income taxes. The initial recognition of deferred taxes for the tax effect of that temporary difference is as an adjustment to additional paid in capital.

Maintenance costs incurred and directly related to services rendered by an entity during the reporting period. Includes the cost of inspections and repairs, materials and routine maintenance costs for all aircraft and engines.
Expenses incurred related to the lease of aircraft from outside third parties that are used in the entity's business operations.
Costs incurred related to air services provided by third-party transportation companies, including regional affiliates.
Net carrying amount, as of the balance sheet date, of expendable merchandise, goods, commodities, or supplies to be used primarily in air transport of passengers and freight.
Amount of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), classified as current.
Amount of obligation to transfer good or service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable, classified as noncurrent.
Carrying amount, at the balance sheet date, of deposits made to the manufacturer for new flight equipment still under construction. May include capitalized interest.
Accumulated amount of amortization of assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with a finite life.
Fuel costs incurred that are directly related to goods produced and sold and services rendered during the reporting period.

tlabel: increase (decrease) in due from related parties
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in receivables to be collected from other entities that could exert significant influence over the reporting entity.
Amount of increase (decrease) in obligation for pension benefits. Includes, but is not limited to, defined benefit or defined contribution plans. Excludes other postretirement benefits.
The net cash inflow or outflow for the increase (decrease) associated with investments (not to include restricted cash) that are pledged or subject to withdrawal restrictions.

Direct costs incurred at airports in which the entity conducts flight operations. The costs primarily consist of fees paid to the airport authority for takeoff and landing, gate space and facilities, allocations of common space such as security and other terminal costs and fuel storage facilities.
Amount of expenses incurred but not yet paid classified as other, due within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.
Amount of other miscellaneous assets expected to be realized or consumed after one year or normal operating cycle, if longer.
The cash outflow for purchases of and capital improvements on property, plant and equipment (capital expenditures), software, and other intangible assets.

tlabel: pension, other postretirement benefits expense (reversal of expense), noncash
description: Amount of noncash expense (reversal of expense) for pension and other postretirement benefits.
Amount of liability, recognized in statement of financial position, for defined benefit pension and other postretirement plans, classified as noncurrent.

tlabel: property, plant,, equipment, finance lease right-of-use asset, accumulated depreciation, amortization
description: Amount of accumulated depreciation and amortization from plant, property, and equipment and right-of-use asset from finance lease.

tlabel: property, plant,, equipment, finance lease right-of-use asset, before accumulated depreciation, amortization
description: Amount, before accumulated depreciation and amortization, of property, plant, and equipment and finance lease right-of-use asset.
Amount of cash outflow for short-term and long-term debt and lease obligation.

The current cash, cash equivalents and investments that are restricted as to withdrawal or usage. Restrictions may include legally restricted deposits held as compensating balances against short-term borrowing arrangements, contracts entered into with others, or entity statements of intention with regard to particular deposits; however, time deposits and short-term certificates of deposit are not generally included in legally restricted deposits. Excludes compensating balance arrangements that are not agreements which legally restrict the use of cash amounts shown on the balance sheet. Includes current cash equivalents and investments that are similarly restricted as to withdrawal, usage or disposal.
The aggregate total amount of expenses directly related to the marketing or selling of products or services.

tlabel: share-based payment arrangement, decrease for tax withholding obligation
description: Amount of decrease to equity for grantee's tax withholding obligation for award under share-based payment arrangement.

Maintenance costs incurred and directly related to services rendered by an entity during the reporting period. Includes the cost of inspections and repairs, materials and routine maintenance costs for all aircraft and engines.
Expenses incurred related to the lease of aircraft from outside third parties that are used in the entity's business operations.
Costs incurred related to air services provided by third-party transportation companies, including regional affiliates.
Net carrying amount, as of the balance sheet date, of expendable merchandise, goods, commodities, or supplies to be used primarily in air transport of passengers and freight.
Amount of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), classified as current.
Amount of obligation to transfer good or service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable, classified as noncurrent.
Carrying amount, at the balance sheet date, of deposits made to the manufacturer for new flight equipment still under construction. May include capitalized interest.
Accumulated amount of amortization of assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with a finite life.
Fuel costs incurred that are directly related to goods produced and sold and services rendered during the reporting period.
Amount before accretion (amortization) of purchase discount (premium) of interest income on nonoperating securities.

Direct costs incurred at airports in which the entity conducts flight operations. The costs primarily consist of fees paid to the airport authority for takeoff and landing, gate space and facilities, allocations of common space such as security and other terminal costs and fuel storage facilities.
Amount of expenses incurred but not yet paid classified as other, due within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.
Amount of other miscellaneous assets expected to be realized or consumed after one year or normal operating cycle, if longer.
The cash outflow for purchases of and capital improvements on property, plant and equipment (capital expenditures), software, and other intangible assets.
Amount of liability, recognized in statement of financial position, for defined benefit pension and other postretirement plans, classified as noncurrent.

tlabel: property, plant,, equipment, finance lease right-of-use asset, accumulated depreciation, amortization
description: Amount of accumulated depreciation and amortization from plant, property, and equipment and right-of-use asset from finance lease.

tlabel: property, plant,, equipment, finance lease right-of-use asset, before accumulated depreciation, amortization
description: Amount, before accumulated depreciation and amortization, of property, plant, and equipment and finance lease right-of-use asset.
Amount of cash outflow for short-term and long-term debt and lease obligation.

The current cash, cash equivalents and investments that are restricted as to withdrawal or usage. Restrictions may include legally restricted deposits held as compensating balances against short-term borrowing arrangements, contracts entered into with others, or entity statements of intention with regard to particular deposits; however, time deposits and short-term certificates of deposit are not generally included in legally restricted deposits. Excludes compensating balance arrangements that are not agreements which legally restrict the use of cash amounts shown on the balance sheet. Includes current cash equivalents and investments that are similarly restricted as to withdrawal, usage or disposal.
The aggregate total amount of expenses directly related to the marketing or selling of products or services.

Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of the unpaid sum of the known and estimated amounts payable to satisfy all domestic and foreign income tax obligations due beyond one year or the operating cycle, whichever is longer. Alternate captions include income taxes payable, noncurrent.
The increase (decrease) during the reporting period of all assets and liabilities used in operating activities.

tlabel: other comprehensive income (loss), cash flow hedge, gain (loss), after reclassification, tax, parent
description: Amount, after tax and reclassification, of gain (loss) from derivative instrument designated and qualifying as cash flow hedge included in assessment of hedge effectiveness, attributable to parent.
The cash inflow associated with the amount received from the stock plan during the period.
Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of uncollateralized debt obligation (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer), excluding current portion.

Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of short-term borrowings using unsecured obligations issued by banks, corporations and other borrowers to investors. The maturities of these money market securities generally do not exceed 270 days.
The cash outflow for the extinguishment of long-term borrowing, with the highest claim on the assets of the entity in case of bankruptcy or liquidation, before its maturity.

tlabel: proceeds from issuance of commercial paper
description: The cash inflow from borrowing by issuing commercial paper.
Amount of restructuring charges, remediation cost, and asset impairment loss.

Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of the unpaid sum of the known and estimated amounts payable to satisfy all domestic and foreign income tax obligations due beyond one year or the operating cycle, whichever is longer. Alternate captions include income taxes payable, noncurrent.

Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of short-term borrowings using unsecured obligations issued by banks, corporations and other borrowers to investors. The maturities of these money market securities generally do not exceed 270 days.
The cash outflow for the extinguishment of long-term borrowing, with the highest claim on the assets of the entity in case of bankruptcy or liquidation, before its maturity.
The increase (decrease) during the reporting period of all assets and liabilities used in operating activities.

tlabel: proceeds from issuance of commercial paper
description: The cash inflow from borrowing by issuing commercial paper.
The cash inflow associated with the amount received from the stock plan during the period.
Amount of restructuring charges, remediation cost, and asset impairment loss.
Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of uncollateralized debt obligation (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer), excluding current portion.

tlabel: other comprehensive (income) loss, defined benefit plan, after reclassification adjustment, tax, attributable to parent
description: Amount, after reclassification adjustment, of tax (expense) benefit for (increase) decrease in accumulated other comprehensive income for defined benefit plan, attributable to parent.

tlabel: contract with customer, asset, after allowance for credit loss, current
description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right is conditioned on something other than passage of time, classified as current.
Amount of obligation to transfer good or service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable, classified as current.

tlabel: increase (decrease) in contract with customer, liability
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in obligation to transfer good or service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable.

tlabel: increase (decrease) in income taxes payable, net of income taxes receivable
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amounts payable to taxing authorities for taxes that are based on the reporting entity's earnings, net of amounts receivable from taxing authorities for refunds of overpayments or recoveries of income taxes.

tlabel: other comprehensive income (loss), defined benefit plan, gain (loss) arising during period, after tax
description: Amount, after tax, of gain (loss) for (increase) decrease in value of benefit obligation for change in actuarial assumptions and increase (decrease) in value of plan assets from experience different from that assumed of defined benefit plan, that has not been recognized in net periodic benefit (cost) credit.

tlabel: other comprehensive income (loss), defined benefit plan, gain (loss) arising during period, tax
description: Amount of tax expense (benefit) for (increase) decrease in value of benefit obligation for change in actuarial assumptions and increase (decrease) in value of plan assets from experience different from that assumed of defined benefit plan, that has not been recognized in net periodic benefit (cost) credit.

tlabel: other comprehensive income (loss), cash flow hedge, gain (loss), after reclassification, tax
description: Amount, after reclassification, of tax expense (benefit) for gain (loss) from derivative instrument designated and qualifying as cash flow hedge included in assessment of hedge effectiveness.

The net amount of other operating income and expenses, the components of which are not separately disclosed on the income statement, from items that are associated with the entity's normal revenue producing operations.

Carrying amount of accrued known and estimated losses incurred as of the balance sheet date for which no insurance coverage exists, and for which a claim has been made or is probable of being asserted, typically arising from workmen's compensation-type of incidents and personal injury to nonemployees from accidents on the entity's property that are expected to be paid after one year (or the normal operating cycle, if longer).

tlabel: stock redeemed or called during period, value
description: Equity impact of the value of stock bought back by the entity at the exercise price or redemption price.
Amount of increase (decrease) in obligation for operating lease.

tlabel: other comprehensive income (loss), derivative, excluded component, increase (decrease), after adjustments, tax
description: Amount, after tax and adjustments, of gain (loss) from increase (decrease) in value of excluded component of derivative designated and qualifying as hedge. Adjustments include, but are not limited to, reclassifications for sale and settlement, and amounts recognized under systematic and rational method.

tlabel: repayments of long-term lines of credit
description: The cash outflow for the settlement of obligation drawn from a contractual arrangement with the lender, including letter of credit, standby letter of credit and revolving credit arrangements, under which borrowings can be made up to a specific amount at any point in time with maturities due beyond one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

tlabel: unrecognized tax benefits that would impact effective tax rate
description: The total amount of unrecognized tax benefits that, if recognized, would affect the effective tax rate.
Amount of obligation to transfer good or service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable, classified as current.

tlabel: deferred income taxes, other assets, noncurrent
description: Amount after allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences and other assets expected to be realized or consumed after one year or normal operating cycle, if longer.

tlabel: increase (decrease) in contract with customer, liability
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in obligation to transfer good or service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable.
The total amount of investments that are intended to be held for an extended period of time (longer than one operating cycle).
The amount of cash received during the period as refunds for the overpayment of taxes.
The cash outflow due to repaying amounts borrowed by issuing commercial paper.

Amount of cash equivalents restricted as to withdrawal or usage. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

tlabel: deferred income taxes, other assets, noncurrent
description: Amount after allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences and other assets expected to be realized or consumed after one year or normal operating cycle, if longer.
The total amount of investments that are intended to be held for an extended period of time (longer than one operating cycle).

tlabel: payments to acquire businesses, net of cash acquired
description: The cash outflow associated with the acquisition of a business, net of the cash acquired from the purchase.
The amount of cash received during the period as refunds for the overpayment of taxes.
The cash outflow due to repaying amounts borrowed by issuing commercial paper.

Amount of cash equivalents restricted as to withdrawal or usage. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

tlabel: cash provided by (used in) operating activities, discontinued operations
description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) of operating activities of discontinued operations. Operating activity cash flows include transactions, adjustments, and changes in value not defined as investing or financing activities.
This element represents interest incurred for borrowed money which was used to produce goods or render services.

tlabel: income (loss) from discontinued operations, net of tax, attributable to parent
description: Amount after tax of income (loss) from a discontinued operation attributable to the parent. Includes, but is not limited to, the income (loss) from operations during the phase-out period, gain (loss) on disposal, gain (loss) for reversal of write-down (write-down) to fair value, less cost to sell, and adjustments to a prior period gain (loss) on disposal.

The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the aggregate amount of obligations related to services received from employees, such as accrued salaries and bonuses, payroll taxes and fringe benefits.

tlabel: net cash provided by (used in) financing activities, continuing operations
description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) of financing activities, excluding discontinued operations. Financing activity cash flows include obtaining resources from owners and providing them with a return on, and a return of, their investment; borrowing money and repaying amounts borrowed, or settling the obligation; and obtaining and paying for other resources obtained from creditors on long-term credit.

tlabel: net cash provided by (used in) investing activities, continuing operations
description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) of investing activities, excluding discontinued operations. Investing activity cash flows include making and collecting loans and acquiring and disposing of debt or equity instruments and property, plant, and equipment and other productive assets.
This element represents interest incurred for borrowed money which was used to produce goods or render services.

The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the aggregate amount of obligations related to services received from employees, such as accrued salaries and bonuses, payroll taxes and fringe benefits.

tlabel: deferred tax liabilities, tax deferred income
description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from tax deferred revenue or income classified as other.
Amount of paid and unpaid cash dividends declared for classes of stock, for example, but not limited to, common and preferred.
The cash inflow associated with the amount received from the sale of a portion of the company's business, for example a segment, division, branch or other business, during the period.

tlabel: stock issued during period, value, employee benefit plan
description: Value of shares issued during the period to an employee benefit plan, such as a defined contribution or defined benefit plan.

tlabel: cash, securities segregated under federal, other regulations
description: Amount of cash subject to withdrawal restrictions, restricted deposits held as compensating balances, and cash and securities segregated in compliance with regulations (such as cash deposited in a special reserve account for the exclusive benefit of customers).
The aggregate amount of write-downs for impairments recognized during the period for long lived assets held for use (including those held for disposal by means other than sale).

The change during the period, either increase or decrease, in amounts payable to customers. The term customers generally excludes other broker-dealers; persons who are principal officers, directors, and stockholders; and persons whose securities or funds are part of the regulatory net capital of the broker-dealer. Another broker-dealer's account can be classified as a customer if the account is carried as an omnibus account in compliance with certain regulations. The accounts of principal officers, directors and stockholders may be combined in the customer captions if they are not material and the combination is disclosed in the oath that is required to accompany the annual audited FOCUS Report.

tlabel: increase (decrease) in restricted investments for operating activities
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in marketable securities and investments pledged or subject to withdrawal restrictions.

Carrying amount of finite-lived intangible assets, indefinite-lived intangible assets and goodwill. Goodwill is an asset representing the future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized. Intangible assets are assets, not including financial assets, lacking physical substance.
Amount of investments, and noncurrent assets classified as other.

Amount before accumulated depreciation and depletion of real estate held for productive use and additions or improvements to real estate held for productive use, examples include, but are not limited to, walkways, driveways, fences, and parking lots. Excludes land held for sale.
Amount before accumulated depreciation of tangible personal property used to produce goods and services, including, but is not limited to, tools, dies and molds, computer and office equipment.

tlabel: oci, debt securities, available-for-sale, gain (loss), after adjustment, before tax
description: Amount, before tax and after adjustment, of unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) and unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to available-for-sale.

tlabel: redeemable noncontrolling interest, equity, carrying amount
description: As of the reporting date, the aggregate carrying amount of all noncontrolling interests which are redeemable by the (parent) entity (1) at a fixed or determinable price on a fixed or determinable date, (2) at the option of the holder of the noncontrolling interest, or (3) upon occurrence of an event that is not solely within the control of the (parent) entity. This item includes noncontrolling interest holder's ownership (or holders' ownership) regardless of the type of equity interest (common, preferred, other) including all potential organizational (legal) forms of the investee entity.

tlabel: shares issued, value, share-based payment arrangement, before forfeiture
description: Value, before forfeiture, of shares issued under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes employee stock ownership plan (ESOP).

tlabel: proceeds from issuance of long-term debt, capital securities, net
description: Amount of cash inflow from long-term debt, finance lease obligation, and mandatorily redeemable capital security.
The aggregate amount of write-downs for impairments recognized during the period for long lived assets held for use (including those held for disposal by means other than sale).

The change during the period, either increase or decrease, in amounts payable to customers. The term customers generally excludes other broker-dealers; persons who are principal officers, directors, and stockholders; and persons whose securities or funds are part of the regulatory net capital of the broker-dealer. Another broker-dealer's account can be classified as a customer if the account is carried as an omnibus account in compliance with certain regulations. The accounts of principal officers, directors and stockholders may be combined in the customer captions if they are not material and the combination is disclosed in the oath that is required to accompany the annual audited FOCUS Report.
The net cash inflow or outflow for the increase (decrease) associated with investments (not to include restricted cash) that are pledged or subject to withdrawal restrictions.

Carrying amount of finite-lived intangible assets, indefinite-lived intangible assets and goodwill. Goodwill is an asset representing the future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized. Intangible assets are assets, not including financial assets, lacking physical substance.
Amount of investments, and noncurrent assets classified as other.

Amount before accumulated depreciation and depletion of real estate held for productive use and additions or improvements to real estate held for productive use, examples include, but are not limited to, walkways, driveways, fences, and parking lots. Excludes land held for sale.
Amount before accumulated depreciation of tangible personal property used to produce goods and services, including, but is not limited to, tools, dies and molds, computer and office equipment.

tlabel: oci, debt securities, available-for-sale, gain (loss), after adjustment, before tax
description: Amount, before tax and after adjustment, of unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) and unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to available-for-sale.

tlabel: proceeds from issuance of long-term debt, capital securities, net
description: Amount of cash inflow from long-term debt, finance lease obligation, and mandatorily redeemable capital security.

tlabel: redeemable noncontrolling interest, equity, carrying amount
description: As of the reporting date, the aggregate carrying amount of all noncontrolling interests which are redeemable by the (parent) entity (1) at a fixed or determinable price on a fixed or determinable date, (2) at the option of the holder of the noncontrolling interest, or (3) upon occurrence of an event that is not solely within the control of the (parent) entity. This item includes noncontrolling interest holder's ownership (or holders' ownership) regardless of the type of equity interest (common, preferred, other) including all potential organizational (legal) forms of the investee entity.

tlabel: shares issued, value, share-based payment arrangement, before forfeiture
description: Value, before forfeiture, of shares issued under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes employee stock ownership plan (ESOP).

This element represents acquisition-related costs incurred to effect a business combination which costs have been expensed during the period. Such costs include finder's fees; advisory, legal, accounting, valuation, and other professional or consulting fees; general administrative costs, including the costs of maintaining an internal acquisitions department; and may include costs of registering and issuing debt and equity securities.

tlabel: capitalized costs of unproved properties excluded from amortization, cumulative
description: The sum of the capitalized costs incurred, as of the balance sheet date, of unproved properties excluded from amortization including acquisition costs, exploration costs, development costs, and production costs.

Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of the asset arising from derivative instruments and hedging activities, which are expected to be converted into cash or otherwise disposed of within a year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in interest payable, which represents the amount owed to note holders, bond holders, and other parties for interest earned on loans or credit extended to the reporting entity.

tlabel: increase (decrease) in outstanding checks, financing activities
description: The change in cash during the period due to the net increase or decrease in outstanding checks, the liability that represents checks that have been issued but that have not cleared. The entity may classify these cash flows as financing or operating activities.
Amount of interest costs capitalized disclosed as an adjusting item to interest costs incurred.
Amount of the cost of borrowed funds accounted for as interest expense for debt.
Amount of interest expense classified as other.

tlabel: oil, gas property, full cost method, gross
description: Oil and gas properties, gross, carried under the full cost method.
The cash outflow to reacquire common and preferred stock.
The cash outflow for loan and debt issuance costs.

tlabel: proceeds from long-term lines of credit
description: The cash inflow from a contractual arrangement with the lender, including letter of credit, standby letter of credit and revolving credit arrangements, under which borrowings can be made up to a specific amount at any point in time with maturities due beyond one year or the operating cycle, if longer.
Amount before accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization of other physical assets used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale.

tlabel: repayments of long-term lines of credit
description: The cash outflow for the settlement of obligation drawn from a contractual arrangement with the lender, including letter of credit, standby letter of credit and revolving credit arrangements, under which borrowings can be made up to a specific amount at any point in time with maturities due beyond one year or the operating cycle, if longer.
Amount of cash outflow for the payment of debt classified as other, maturing after one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

tlabel: stock issued during period, value, restricted stock award, net of forfeitures
description: Value of stock related to Restricted Stock Awards issued during the period, net of the stock value of such awards forfeited.
Amount of other miscellaneous assets expected to be realized or consumed within one year or operating cycle, if longer.

tlabel: capitalized costs of unproved properties excluded from amortization, cumulative
description: The sum of the capitalized costs incurred, as of the balance sheet date, of unproved properties excluded from amortization including acquisition costs, exploration costs, development costs, and production costs.

Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of the asset arising from derivative instruments and hedging activities, which are expected to be converted into cash or otherwise disposed of within a year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

tlabel: gain (loss) on derivative instruments, net, pretax
description: Aggregate net gain (loss) on all derivative instruments recognized in earnings during the period, before tax effects.

The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in interest payable, which represents the amount owed to note holders, bond holders, and other parties for interest earned on loans or credit extended to the reporting entity.

tlabel: increase (decrease) in outstanding checks, financing activities
description: The change in cash during the period due to the net increase or decrease in outstanding checks, the liability that represents checks that have been issued but that have not cleared. The entity may classify these cash flows as financing or operating activities.
Amount of interest costs capitalized disclosed as an adjusting item to interest costs incurred.
Amount of the cost of borrowed funds accounted for as interest expense for debt.
Amount of interest expense classified as other.

tlabel: oil, gas property, full cost method, gross
description: Oil and gas properties, gross, carried under the full cost method.
Amount of other miscellaneous assets expected to be realized or consumed within one year or operating cycle, if longer.

tlabel: other comprehensive income (loss), defined benefit plan, settlement, curtailment gain (loss), after tax
description: Amount, after tax, of increase (decrease) to other comprehensive income from settlement and curtailment gain (loss) of defined benefit plan.

tlabel: proceeds from long-term lines of credit
description: The cash inflow from a contractual arrangement with the lender, including letter of credit, standby letter of credit and revolving credit arrangements, under which borrowings can be made up to a specific amount at any point in time with maturities due beyond one year or the operating cycle, if longer.
Amount before accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization of other physical assets used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale.
Amount of cash outflow for the payment of debt classified as other, maturing after one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

The sum of the periodic adjustments of the differences between securities' face values and purchase prices that are charged against earnings. This is called accretion if the security was purchased at a discount and amortization if it was purchased at premium. As a noncash item, this element is an adjustment to net income when calculating cash provided by or used in operations using the indirect method.
Amount of investment in debt and equity securities categorized neither as held-to-maturity nor trading.
Earnings on or other increases in the value of the cash surrender value of bank owned life insurance policies.

tlabel: change in unrealized gain (loss) on hedged item in fair value hedge
description: Amount of the increase (decrease) in fair value of the hedged item in a fair value hedge recognized in the income statement.

tlabel: debt securities, available-for-sale, realized gain (loss), excluding other-than-temporary impairment
description: Amount of realized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), excluding other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI).

tlabel: debt securities, held-to-maturity, amortized cost, after allowance for credit loss, transfer, amount
description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) transferred to investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) and net income (trading).
Amount of paid and unpaid preferred stock dividends declared with the form of settlement in cash.

This element represents equipment expense including depreciation, repairs, rentals, and service contract costs. This item also includes equipment purchases which do not qualify for capitalization in accordance with the entity's accounting policy. This item may also include furniture expenses.

tlabel: equity securities, fv-ni, without readily determinable fair value
description: Amount of investment in equity security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (FV-NI) and investment in equity security without readily determinable fair value.

tlabel: equity securities without readily determinable fair value, upward price adjustment, annual amount
description: Amount of gain from upward price adjustment on investment in equity security without readily determinable fair value.

tlabel: federal deposit insurance corporation premium expense
description: Amount of expense for Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation (FDIC) insurance.

tlabel: federal funds purchased, securities sold under agreements to repurchase
description: Amount after offset of short term borrowing where a bank borrows, at the federal funds rate, from another bank and securities that an entity sells and agrees to repurchase at a specified date for a specified price.

tlabel: federal funds sold, securities purchased under agreements to resell
description: Includes: (1) the amount outstanding of funds lent to other depository institutions, securities brokers, or securities dealers in the form of Federal Funds sold; for example, immediately available funds lent under agreements or contracts that mature in one business day or roll over under a continuing contract, regardless of the nature of the transaction or the collateral involved, excluding overnight lending for commercial and industrial purposes. Also include Federal Funds sold under agreements to resell on a gross basis, excluding (1) sales of term Federal Funds, (2) due bills representing purchases of securities or other assets by the reporting bank that have not yet been delivered and similar instruments, (3) resale agreements that mature in more than one business day involving assets other than securities, and (4) yield maintenance dollar repurchase agreements (Federal Funds Sold) and (2) the dollar amount outstanding of funds lent in the form of security resale agreements regardless of maturity, if the agreement requires the bank to resell the identical security purchased or a security that meets the definition of substantially the same in the case of a dollar roll. Also include purchases of participations in pools of securities, regardless of maturity (Securities Purchased Under Agreements to Re-sell).

tlabel: federal home loan bank, advances, branch of fhlb bank, amount of advances
description: Amount of advances from the Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLB).

tlabel: federal home loan bank stock, federal reserve bank stock
description: Amount of Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLB) and Federal Reserve Bank stock.

Income from mortgage banking activities (fees and commissions) and servicing real estate mortgages, credit cards, and other financial assets held by others net of any related impairment of capitalized service costs. Also includes any premiums received in lieu of regular servicing fees on such loans only as earned over the life of the loans.

tlabel: gain (loss) on sale of mortgage loans
description: The gains (losses) included in earnings that represent the difference between the sale price and the carrying value of loans made to finance real estate acquisitions. This element refers to the gain (loss) and not to the cash proceeds of the sale. This element is a noncash adjustment to net income when calculating net cash generated by operating activities using the indirect method.

tlabel: increase (decrease) in accrued interest receivable, net
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amount due from borrowers for interest payments.

The increase (decrease) during the period in the net carrying value of derivative instruments reported as assets and liabilities that are due to be disposed of within one year (or the normal operating cycle, if longer).

tlabel: increase (decrease) in loans from federal home loan banks
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in loans from another Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank).
The amount of expenses incurred in the period for information technology and data processing products and services.
Total amount of interest-bearing domestic deposit liabilities, which may include brokered, retail, demand, checking, notice of withdrawal, money market and other interest-bearing deposits.

tlabel: interest expense, federal funds purchased, securities sold under agreements to repurchase
description: The aggregate expense incurred on federal funds purchased and securities sold under agreements to repurchase. If amounts recognized as payables under repurchase agreements have been offset against amounts recognized as receivables under reverse repurchase agreements and reported as a net amount on the balance sheet, the income and expense from these agreements may be reported on a net basis.
Interest expense incurred during the reporting period on other short-term borrowings.

tlabel: interest income (expense), after provision for loan loss
description: Amount of interest income or expense, including any amortization and accretion (as applicable) of discounts and premiums, including consideration of the provisions for loan, lease, credit, and other related losses.

tlabel: interest income, securities, operating, tax exempt
description: Amount of operating interest income, including amortization and accretion of premiums and discounts, on securities exempt from state, federal and other income tax.
Amount of operating interest income, including amortization and accretion of premiums and discounts, on securities subject to state, federal and other income tax.
Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of interest earned but not received. Also called accrued interest or accrued interest receivable.

tlabel: life insurance, corporate or bank owned, amount
description: This item represents the amount that could be realized under a life insurance contract or contracts owned by the Entity as of the date of the statement of financial position. Such Entity-owned life insurance policies are commonly known as corporate-owned life insurance (COLI) or bank-owned life insurance (BOLI).

Amount of allowance to cover probable credit losses on loans and leases. Includes carryover of or adjustments to the allowance for loan losses in connection with business combinations. Excludes allowance for loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

tlabel: loans, leases receivable, net of deferred income
description: Amount before allowance and after deduction of deferred interest and fees, unamortized costs and premiums and discounts from face amounts, of loans and leases held in portfolio, including but not limited to, commercial and consumer loans. Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

Amount after allowance and deduction of deferred interest and fees, unamortized costs and premiums and discounts from face amounts, of loans and leases held in portfolio, including but not limited to, commercial and consumer loans. Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements and loans held for sale.
Amount of unrealized and realized gain (loss) on investment in marketable security, including other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI).
The total expense recognized in the period for promotion, public relations, and brand or product advertising.

The adjustment to the carrying value of the rights retained or purchased to service mortgages. These adjustments are made when the estimate of the fair value is changed. This element is a noncash adjustment to net income when calculating net cash generated by operating activities using the indirect method.
Amount of money in noninterest-bearing domestic accounts that entitle the depositor to withdraw funds at any time without prior notice, also known as demand deposits.
Amount of revenue earned, classified as other, excluding interest income.
Amount of net occupancy expense that may include items, such as depreciation of facilities and equipment, lease expenses, property taxes and property and casualty insurance expense.

tlabel: other comprehensive (income) loss, defined benefit plan, prior service cost (credit), reclassification adjustment from aoci, before tax
description: Amount, before tax, of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive (income) loss for prior service cost (credit) of defined benefit plan.

tlabel: other comprehensive (income) loss, defined benefit plan, before reclassification adjustment, tax
description: Amount, before tax and reclassification adjustment, of (increase) decrease in accumulated other comprehensive income of defined benefit plan, that has not been recognized in net periodic benefit cost (credit).

tlabel: other comprehensive income (loss), defined benefit plan, gain (loss) arising during period, before tax
description: Amount, before tax, of gain (loss) for (increase) decrease in value of benefit obligation for change in actuarial assumptions and increase (decrease) in value of plan assets from experience different from that assumed of defined benefit plan, that has not been recognized in net periodic benefit (cost) credit.

tlabel: other comprehensive income (loss), reclassification adjustment from aoci for sale of securities, before tax
description: Amount before tax of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income for unrealized gain (loss) realized upon the sale of available-for-sale securities.

tlabel: other comprehensive income (loss), reclassification adjustment from aoci on derivatives, before tax
description: Amount before tax of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income of accumulated gain (loss) realized from derivative instruments designated and qualifying as the effective portion of cash flow hedges and an entity's share of an equity investee's deferred hedging gain (loss).

tlabel: other comprehensive income (loss), reclassification adjustment from aoci on derivatives, net of tax
description: Amount after tax of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income of accumulated gain (loss) realized from derivative instruments designated and qualifying as the effective portion of cash flow hedges and an entity's share of an equity investee's deferred hedging gain (loss).

tlabel: other comprehensive income, other, net of tax
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in other comprehensive income, after tax, from changes classified as other.
Amount, after discount, accretion and premium amortization, of interest income and dividend income classified as other.
