The net cash inflow or outflow from the costs of disposing of plant, whether by demolishing, dismantling, abandoning, sale, and so forth during the period.

tlabel: public utilities, allowance for funds used during construction, additions
description: Total increase in earnings in the period representing the cost of equity (based on assumed rate of return) and/or borrowed funds (based on interest rate) used to finance construction of regulated assets, which is expected to be recovered through rate adjustments.

Amount of acquisition of long-lived, physical assets used in the normal conduct of business and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, furniture and fixtures, and computer equipment.
The net cash inflow or outflow from the costs of disposing of plant, whether by demolishing, dismantling, abandoning, sale, and so forth during the period.

Amount of acquisition of long-lived, physical assets used in the normal conduct of business and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, furniture and fixtures, and computer equipment.

tlabel: public utilities, allowance for funds used during construction, additions
description: Total increase in earnings in the period representing the cost of equity (based on assumed rate of return) and/or borrowed funds (based on interest rate) used to finance construction of regulated assets, which is expected to be recovered through rate adjustments.

tlabel: discontinued operation, tax effect of gain (loss) from disposal of discontinued operation
description: Amount of tax expense (benefit) on gain (loss) not previously recognized resulting from the disposal of a discontinued operation.

The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the asset created by the regulatory convention in which costs and revenues associated with certain utility expenses (such as fuel) are accumulated but on which no return is earned.

tlabel: oci, before reclassifications, net of tax, attributable to parent
description: Amount after tax, before reclassification adjustments, of other comprehensive income (loss), attributable to parent.

tlabel: reclassification from accumulated other comprehensive income, current period, before tax
description: Amount before tax of reclassification adjustments of other comprehensive income (loss).

Financial instruments issued by insurance entities (surplus notes) that are includable in surplus for statutory accounting purposes as prescribed or permitted by state laws and regulations that are liabilities of the issuer.

tlabel: oci, before reclassifications, net of tax, attributable to parent
description: Amount after tax, before reclassification adjustments, of other comprehensive income (loss), attributable to parent.

tlabel: other comprehensive income (loss) before reclassifications, tax
description: Amount of tax expense (benefit) allocated to other comprehensive income (loss) before reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income (loss).

tlabel: reclassification from accumulated other comprehensive income, current period, before tax
description: Amount before tax of reclassification adjustments of other comprehensive income (loss).

Financial instruments issued by insurance entities (surplus notes) that are includable in surplus for statutory accounting purposes as prescribed or permitted by state laws and regulations that are liabilities of the issuer.

The adjustment to expense previously capitalized costs of drilling exploratory wells when proved reserves are not found or when the entity obtains information that raises substantial doubt about the economic or operational viability of the project.

tlabel: defined benefit plan, benefit obligation, increase (decrease) for other change
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in benefit obligation of defined benefit plan from change, classified as other.

Fair value of unearned shares for all classes of common stock and nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) held by an employee stock ownership plan (ESOP). Includes the sale of shares or the issuance treasury shares to an ESOP.

Fair value of unearned shares for all classes of common stock and nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) held by an employee stock ownership plan (ESOP). Includes the sale of shares or the issuance treasury shares to an ESOP.
Carrying value of capitalized payments made in advance for inventory that is expected to be received within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

Revenues from operations, excluding interest and dividend income. Includes revenues from the following sources: investment banking (underwriting and financial advisory), principal transactions (sales and trading, and investment gains and losses), commissions, asset management, and investment advisory and other services.

tlabel: unrealized gain (loss) on foreign currency derivatives, net, before tax
description: Amount of net unrealized gain (loss) related to the change in fair value of foreign currency exchange rate derivatives designated as cash flow hedging instruments. Recorded in accumulated other comprehensive income to the extent that the cash flow hedge is determined to be effective.
Amount of paid and unpaid stock dividends declared for award under share-based payment arrangement.

Amount of increase (decrease) to previously recorded tax expense. Includes, but is not limited to, significant settlements of income tax disputes, and unusual tax positions or infrequent actions taken by the entity, including tax assessment reversal, and IRS tax settlement.
Carrying value of capitalized payments made in advance for inventory that is expected to be received within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.
Amount before valuation and LIFO reserves of other inventory expected to be sold, or consumed within one year or operating cycle, if longer.

Revenues from operations, excluding interest and dividend income. Includes revenues from the following sources: investment banking (underwriting and financial advisory), principal transactions (sales and trading, and investment gains and losses), commissions, asset management, and investment advisory and other services.

tlabel: unrealized gain (loss) on foreign currency derivatives, net, before tax
description: Amount of net unrealized gain (loss) related to the change in fair value of foreign currency exchange rate derivatives designated as cash flow hedging instruments. Recorded in accumulated other comprehensive income to the extent that the cash flow hedge is determined to be effective.
Interest expense incurred on demand deposit accounts that represent borrowings rather than outstanding drafts.
Interest expense incurred on all savings account deposits.
The aggregate interest expense incurred on time deposits, including certificates of deposits, in domestic offices.
Amount of interest receivable and assets classified as other.

tlabel: oci, before reclassifications, before tax, attributable to parent
description: Amount before tax and reclassification adjustments of other comprehensive income (loss) attributable to parent.

tlabel: reclassification from aoci, current period, before tax, attributable to parent
description: Amount before tax of reclassification adjustments of other comprehensive income (loss) attributable to parent.

Investments which are not defined as or included in marketable (debt, equity, or other) securities whose use is restricted in whole or in part, generally by contractual agreements or regulatory requirements. For use in an unclassified balance sheet.

tlabel: long-term federal home loan bank advances
description: Including both current and noncurrent portions, Federal Home Loan Bank borrowings initially due beyond one year or beyond the normal operating cycle if longer.

tlabel: proceeds from sale of other real estate
description: The cash inflow associated with the sale of other real estate not otherwise defined in the taxonomy.

tlabel: long-term federal home loan bank advances
description: Including both current and noncurrent portions, Federal Home Loan Bank borrowings initially due beyond one year or beyond the normal operating cycle if longer.
Amount of interest receivable and assets classified as other.

tlabel: oci, before reclassifications, before tax, attributable to parent
description: Amount before tax and reclassification adjustments of other comprehensive income (loss) attributable to parent.

tlabel: reclassification from aoci, current period, before tax, attributable to parent
description: Amount before tax of reclassification adjustments of other comprehensive income (loss) attributable to parent.

Investments which are not defined as or included in marketable (debt, equity, or other) securities whose use is restricted in whole or in part, generally by contractual agreements or regulatory requirements. For use in an unclassified balance sheet.

tlabel: contract with customer, asset, after allowance for credit loss, current
description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right is conditioned on something other than passage of time, classified as current.
Aggregate carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the liabilities for all deferred compensation arrangements payable beyond one year (or the operating cycle, if longer).

tlabel: assets for plan benefits, defined benefit plan
description: Amount of asset, recognized in statement of financial position, for overfunded defined benefit pension and other postretirement plans.

tlabel: foreign currency cash flow hedge gain (loss) reclassified to earnings, net
description: The amount of net gains or losses on foreign currency cash flow hedges reclassified during the period to earnings from accumulated other comprehensive income upon the hedged transaction affecting earnings.

Total loss recognized during the period from the impairment of goodwill plus the loss recognized in the period resulting from the impairment of the carrying amount of intangible assets, other than goodwill.

tlabel: impairment of long-lived assets to be disposed of
description: The aggregate amount of write-downs for impairments recognized during the period for long-lived assets held for abandonment, exchange or sale.
The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amount of outstanding money paid in advance for goods or services that bring economic benefits for future periods.

The amount of the reduction or elimination during the period of a noncontrolling interest resulting from the parent's loss of control and deconsolidation of the entity in which one or more outside parties had a noncontrolling interest.

tlabel: noncontrolling interest, increase from business combination
description: Amount of increase in noncontrolling interest from a business combination.

tlabel: oci, debt securities, available-for-sale, unrealized holding gain (loss), before adjustment, tax
description: Amount, before adjustment, of tax expense (benefit) for unrealized holding gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale). Excludes tax expense (benefit) for unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to available-for-sale.

tlabel: payments for (proceeds from) derivative instrument, financing activities
description: The net cash outflow or inflow from derivative instruments during the period, which are classified as financing activities, excluding those designated as hedging instruments.

tlabel: payments for (proceeds from) hedge, investing activities
description: The cash outflow or inflow for a financial contract that meets the hedge criteria as either a cash flow hedge, fair value hedge, or hedge of a net investment in a foreign operation.

tlabel: payments of ordinary dividends, noncontrolling interest
description: Amount of cash outflow in the form of ordinary dividends provided by the non-wholly owned subsidiary to noncontrolling interests.
Amount of noncash expense (reversal of expense) for pension benefits. Excludes other postretirement benefits.
The cash inflow associated with the amount received from the stock plan during the period.
Amount of unrealized gain (loss) on investment.
Amount, after deduction of unamortized premium (discount) and debt issuance cost, of long-term debt classified as current. Excludes lease obligation.

tlabel: foreign currency cash flow hedge gain (loss) reclassified to earnings, net
description: The amount of net gains or losses on foreign currency cash flow hedges reclassified during the period to earnings from accumulated other comprehensive income upon the hedged transaction affecting earnings.

tlabel: payments for (proceeds from) derivative instrument, financing activities
description: The net cash outflow or inflow from derivative instruments during the period, which are classified as financing activities, excluding those designated as hedging instruments.

tlabel: proceeds from sale, collection of notes receivable
description: The cash inflow associated with the proceeds from sale of notes receivable, as well as principal collections from a borrowing supported by a written promise to pay an obligation (note receivable).
Amount of paid and unpaid cash, stock, and paid-in-kind (PIK) dividends declared, for example, but not limited to, common and preferred stock.

Aggregate amount of receivables to be collected from related parties where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party; including affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, pension trusts, and so forth, at the financial statement date. which are usually due after one year (or one business cycle).
Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of assets, including but not limited to property plant and equipment, intangible assets and equity in securities of subsidiaries or equity method investee.

tlabel: increase (decrease) in accounts payable, related parties
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the obligations due for goods and services provided by the following types of related parties: a parent company and its subsidiaries, subsidiaries of a common parent, an entity and trust for the benefit of employees, such as pension and profit-sharing trusts that are managed by or under the trusteeship of the entities' management, an entity and its principal owners, management, or member of their immediate families, affiliates, or other parties with the ability to exert significant influence.

tlabel: inventory, lifo reserve, effect on income, net
description: The difference between the change in the inventory reserve representing the cumulative difference in cost between the first in, first out and the last in, first out inventory valuation methods and any LIFO decrement which have been reflected in the statement of income during the period.
Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of notes payable (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer), excluding current portion.

tlabel: other comprehensive income (loss), cash flow hedge, gain (loss), after reclassification, tax, parent
description: Amount, after reclassification, of tax expense (benefit) for gain (loss) from derivative instrument designated and qualifying as cash flow hedge included in assessment of hedge effectiveness, attributable to parent.

tlabel: other comprehensive income (loss), tax, portion attributable to parent
description: Amount of tax expense (benefit) allocated to other comprehensive income (loss) attributable to parent entity.
Amount of long-term debt classified as other, payable after one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

tlabel: payments to acquire limited partnership interests
description: Cash outflow related to the acquisition or continued holding of limited partnership interests held for investment purposes.
The cash inflow from a borrowing supported by a written promise to pay an obligation.

tlabel: proceeds from collection of (payments to fund) long-term loans to related parties
description: The cash inflow or outflow associated with long-term loans for related parties where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party, including affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, pension trusts, and so forth. Alternate caption: Proceeds from (Payments for) Advances to Affiliates.

tlabel: proceeds from sale, maturity, collection of long-term investments
description: The cash inflow from sales, maturities, prepayments, calls and collections of all investments, including securities and other assets, having ready marketability and intended by management to be liquidated, if necessary, beyond the current operating cycle.
The cash outflow for a borrowing supported by a written promise to pay an obligation.

tlabel: shares granted, value, share-based payment arrangement, after forfeiture
description: Value, after forfeiture, of shares granted under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes employee stock ownership plan (ESOP).

tlabel: shares granted, value, share-based payment arrangement, forfeited
description: Value of forfeited shares granted under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes employee stock ownership plan (ESOP).

tlabel: other comprehensive income (loss), defined benefit plan, adjustment for settlement or curtailment gain (loss), tax
description: Amount of tax expense (benefit) for increase (decrease) to other comprehensive income from settlement and curtailment gain (loss) of defined benefit plan.

tlabel: shares granted, value, share-based payment arrangement, forfeited
description: Value of forfeited shares granted under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes employee stock ownership plan (ESOP).

tlabel: adjustments to additional paid in capital, dividends in excess of retained earnings
description: Amount of decrease in additional paid in capital (APIC) resulting from dividends legally declared (or paid) in excess of retained earnings balance.
Value of shares of other common stock instruments held by shareholders, such as exchangeable shares. May be all or portion of the number of common shares authorized.
The aggregate costs incurred in the production of goods for sale.

tlabel: adjustments to additional paid in capital, dividends in excess of retained earnings
description: Amount of decrease in additional paid in capital (APIC) resulting from dividends legally declared (or paid) in excess of retained earnings balance.
Value of shares of other common stock instruments held by shareholders, such as exchangeable shares. May be all or portion of the number of common shares authorized.
The aggregate costs incurred in the production of goods for sale.

The cash outflow from the repayment of a long-term debt instrument which can be exchanged for a specified amount of another security, typically the entity's common stock, at the option of the issuer or the holder.
Amount of interest expense on finance lease liability.
Amount of interest expense on finance lease liability.

tlabel: financial instruments subject to mandatory redemption, settlement terms, share value, amount, noncurrent
description: The amount that is required to be paid, determined under the conditions specified in the contract, if as of the reporting date, the holder of the share has exercised the right to or the shares are mandatorily redeemable after one year from the reporting date or operating cycle, if longer.

tlabel: financial instruments subject to mandatory redemption, settlement terms, share value, amount, noncurrent
description: The amount that is required to be paid, determined under the conditions specified in the contract, if as of the reporting date, the holder of the share has exercised the right to or the shares are mandatorily redeemable after one year from the reporting date or operating cycle, if longer.

tlabel: payments to acquire commercial real estate
description: The cash outflow from the acquisition of property as primarily intended to generate income for its owner.
The charge against earnings in the period to reduce the carrying amount of real property to fair value.
Amount of tax expense (benefit) allocated to accumulated other comprehensive income (loss) attributable to parent.
Amount of tax expense (benefit) allocated to accumulated other comprehensive income (loss) attributable to parent.

tlabel: inventory, work in process, raw materials, net of reserves
description: The aggregate carrying amount, net of valuation reserves and adjustments, as of the balance sheet date of items which are partially completed at the time of measurement and unprocessed items that will go through the production process and become part of the final product. This element may be used when the reporting entity combines work in process and raw materials into an aggregate amount.

tlabel: defined benefit plan, net periodic benefit cost (credit), gain (loss) due to curtailment
description: Amount of gain (loss) recognized in net periodic benefit (cost) credit from event reducing expected years of future service of present employees or eliminating accrual of defined benefits for some or all future services of present employees.

tlabel: payment for contingent consideration liability, operating activities
description: Amount of cash outflow, not made soon after acquisition date of business combination, to settle contingent consideration liability exceeding amount recognized at acquisition date. Includes, but is not limited to, measurement period adjustment and less amount paid soon after acquisition date.
Amount of cash inflow from the issuance of equity classified as other.
Amount of decrease in the reserve for full or partial settlement through consideration other than cash.

tlabel: proceeds from issuance of convertible preferred stock
description: The cash inflow from issuance of preferred stocks identified as being convertible into another form of financial instrument, typically the entity's common stock.

tlabel: proceeds from sale of machinery, equipment
description: The cash inflow from sale of machinery and equipment.

Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date and payable for advertising of the entity's goods and services. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date and payable for royalties. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

tlabel: foreign currency transaction gain (loss), before tax
description: Amount before tax of foreign currency transaction realized and unrealized gain (loss) recognized in the income statement.

tlabel: other comprehensive income (loss), derivative, excluded component, increase (decrease), before adjustments, after tax
description: Amount, after tax and before adjustments, of gain (loss) from increase (decrease) in value of excluded component of derivative designated and qualifying as hedge. Adjustments include, but are not limited to, reclassifications for sale and settlement, and amounts recognized under systematic and rational method.

tlabel: other comprehensive income (loss), derivative, excluded component, increase (decrease), before adjustments, tax
description: Amount, before adjustments, of tax expense (benefit) for gain (loss) from increase (decrease) in value of excluded component of derivative designated and qualifying as hedge. Adjustments include, but are not limited to, reclassifications for sale and settlement, and amounts recognized under systematic and rational method.

tlabel: other postretirement benefits cost (reversal of cost)
description: Amount of cost (reversal of cost) for other postretirement benefits. Excludes pension benefits.
The net cash inflow or outflow from the excess drawing from an existing cash balance, which will be honored by the bank but reflected as a loan to the drawer.

tlabel: proceeds from sale of other assets, investing activities
description: Amount of cash inflow from the sale of other assets recognized in investing activities.

Amount of cash and cash equivalents restricted as to withdrawal or usage. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

tlabel: other comprehensive income (loss), derivative, excluded component, increase (decrease), before adjustments, after tax
description: Amount, after tax and before adjustments, of gain (loss) from increase (decrease) in value of excluded component of derivative designated and qualifying as hedge. Adjustments include, but are not limited to, reclassifications for sale and settlement, and amounts recognized under systematic and rational method.

tlabel: other comprehensive income (loss), derivative, excluded component, increase (decrease), before adjustments, tax
description: Amount, before adjustments, of tax expense (benefit) for gain (loss) from increase (decrease) in value of excluded component of derivative designated and qualifying as hedge. Adjustments include, but are not limited to, reclassifications for sale and settlement, and amounts recognized under systematic and rational method.
Amount, after deferred tax asset, of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable differences, with jurisdictional netting, and liabilities classified as noncurrent and other.

Aggregate carrying amount, as of the balance sheet date, of noncurrent obligations and noncurrent portion of deferred revenue not separately disclosed in the balance sheet. Noncurrent liabilities are expected to be paid after one year (or the normal operating cycle, if longer). Deferred revenue is a liability related to a revenue producing activity for which revenue has not yet been recognized, and is not expected to be recognized in the next twelve months.
Amount, after deferred tax asset, of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable differences, with jurisdictional netting, and liabilities classified as noncurrent and other.

Aggregate carrying amount, as of the balance sheet date, of noncurrent obligations and noncurrent portion of deferred revenue not separately disclosed in the balance sheet. Noncurrent liabilities are expected to be paid after one year (or the normal operating cycle, if longer). Deferred revenue is a liability related to a revenue producing activity for which revenue has not yet been recognized, and is not expected to be recognized in the next twelve months.

tlabel: fair value, measurement with unobservable inputs reconciliation, recurring basis, liability, gain (loss) included in earnings
description: Amount of gain (loss) recognized in income from liability measured at fair value on recurring basis using unobservable input (level 3).

tlabel: fair value, measurement with unobservable inputs reconciliation, recurring basis, liability, gain (loss) included in earnings
description: Amount of gain (loss) recognized in income from liability measured at fair value on recurring basis using unobservable input (level 3).

Carrying amount of equity interests owned by noncontrolling shareholders, partners, or other equity holders in one or more of the entities consolidated into the reporting entity's financial statements other than joint ventures, limited partnerships, operating partnerships or interests held by preferred unit holders.

tlabel: proceeds from collection of other receivables
description: Amount of cash inflow from the collection of receivables classified as other.

tlabel: proceeds from sale of restricted investments
description: The cash inflow associated with the sale of investments that are pledged or subject to withdrawal restrictions during the period.
Amount of operating expense of regulated operation.

tlabel: derivative liability, subject to master netting arrangement, collateral, right to reclaim cash not offset
description: Amount of right to receive cash collateral under master netting arrangements that have not been offset against derivative liabilities.

tlabel: payments to acquire assets, investing activities
description: Aggregate cash payments for a combination of transactions that are classified as investing activities in which assets, which may include securities, other types of investments, or productive assets, are purchased from third-party sellers. This element can be used by entities to aggregate payments for all asset purchases that are classified as investing activities.

The carrying amount of a liability for an asset retirement obligation. An asset retirement obligation is a legal obligation associated with the disposal or retirement of a tangible long-lived asset that results from the acquisition, construction or development, or the normal operations of a long-lived asset, except for certain obligations of lessees.

tlabel: derivative liability, subject to master netting arrangement, collateral, right to reclaim cash not offset
description: Amount of right to receive cash collateral under master netting arrangements that have not been offset against derivative liabilities.

Carrying amount of equity interests owned by noncontrolling shareholders, partners, or other equity holders in one or more of the entities consolidated into the reporting entity's financial statements other than joint ventures, limited partnerships, operating partnerships or interests held by preferred unit holders.

tlabel: payments to acquire assets, investing activities
description: Aggregate cash payments for a combination of transactions that are classified as investing activities in which assets, which may include securities, other types of investments, or productive assets, are purchased from third-party sellers. This element can be used by entities to aggregate payments for all asset purchases that are classified as investing activities.

tlabel: proceeds from sale of restricted investments
description: The cash inflow associated with the sale of investments that are pledged or subject to withdrawal restrictions during the period.
Amount of increase (decrease) of consideration paid in advance for other costs that provide economic benefits in future periods.
Amount of operating expense of regulated operation.
The cash outflow for loan origination associated cost which is usually collected through escrow.
The cash outflow for loan origination associated cost which is usually collected through escrow.

Developers, builders, governmental agencies and municipalities will provide the entity with cash, or in some cases property, to extend its services to their properties. Nonrefundable contributions are recorded as contributions in aid of construction ("CIAC").

tlabel: payments to acquire water, waste water systems
description: The cash outflow for the purchase of a facility and equipment that provides water supply which includes wells, reservoirs, pumping stations, and control facilities; and waste water systems which includes the waste treatment and disposal facility and equipment to households and industry.

The cash inflow from borrowing by the entity from developers, builders, government agencies and municipalities for construction that are repaid in cash, generally on a straight-line basis over periods ranging from five to forty years.

tlabel: public utilities, property, plant, equipment, amount of acquisition adjustments
description: Amount of acquisition adjustments included in property, plant and equipment (PPE) for utilities.

The cash outflow for the payments made by the entity, generally on a straight-line basis over periods ranging from five to forty years to developers, builders, government agencies and municipalities for borrowings received in construction.
Amount of operating expense for taxes other than income taxes of regulated operation.

Developers, builders, governmental agencies and municipalities will provide the entity with cash, or in some cases property, to extend its services to their properties. Nonrefundable contributions are recorded as contributions in aid of construction ("CIAC").

tlabel: payments to acquire water, waste water systems
description: The cash outflow for the purchase of a facility and equipment that provides water supply which includes wells, reservoirs, pumping stations, and control facilities; and waste water systems which includes the waste treatment and disposal facility and equipment to households and industry.

The cash inflow from borrowing by the entity from developers, builders, government agencies and municipalities for construction that are repaid in cash, generally on a straight-line basis over periods ranging from five to forty years.

tlabel: public utilities, property, plant, equipment, amount of acquisition adjustments
description: Amount of acquisition adjustments included in property, plant and equipment (PPE) for utilities.

The cash outflow for the payments made by the entity, generally on a straight-line basis over periods ranging from five to forty years to developers, builders, government agencies and municipalities for borrowings received in construction.

tlabel: income (loss) from discontinued operations, net of tax, attributable to noncontrolling interest
description: Amount after tax of income (loss) from a discontinued operation attributable to the noncontrolling interest. Includes, but is not limited to, the income (loss) from operations during the phase-out period, gain (loss) on disposal, gain (loss) for reversal of write-down (write-down) to fair value, less cost to sell, and adjustments to a prior period gain (loss) on disposal.
Amount of additional paid-in capital (APIC) classified as other.

tlabel: sec schedule, 12-04, cash dividends paid to registrant, subsidiaries, equity method investees
description: This element represents disclosure of the total aggregate cash dividends paid to the entity by consolidated subsidiaries, by unconsolidated subsidiaries, and by 50 percent or less owned persons accounted for using the equity method.

tlabel: sec schedule, 12-04, cash dividends paid to registrant, subsidiaries, equity method investees
description: This element represents disclosure of the total aggregate cash dividends paid to the entity by consolidated subsidiaries, by unconsolidated subsidiaries, and by 50 percent or less owned persons accounted for using the equity method.

tlabel: income (loss) from discontinued operations, net of tax, attributable to noncontrolling interest
description: Amount after tax of income (loss) from a discontinued operation attributable to the noncontrolling interest. Includes, but is not limited to, the income (loss) from operations during the phase-out period, gain (loss) on disposal, gain (loss) for reversal of write-down (write-down) to fair value, less cost to sell, and adjustments to a prior period gain (loss) on disposal.
Amount of additional paid-in capital (APIC) classified as other.

tlabel: other comprehensive income (loss), net investment hedge, gain (loss), reclassification, before tax
description: Amount, before tax, of reclassification from accumulated other comprehensive income (AOCI) for gain (loss) from derivative designated and qualifying as net investment hedge.

tlabel: payments for repurchase of private placement
description: The cash outflow associated with the repurchase of amount received from entity's raising of capital via private rather than public placement.

tlabel: gain (loss) on repurchase of debt instrument
description: Amount of gain (loss) from the difference between the repurchase price of a debt instrument initially issued by the entity and the net carrying amount of the debt at the time of its repurchase.
Amount of increase (decrease) in interest income on short-term investment.

tlabel: noncash or part noncash acquisition, other assets acquired
description: Amount of assets, classified as other, acquired in a noncash or part noncash acquisition.

tlabel: proceeds from sale, maturity of held-to-maturity securities
description: Amount of cash inflow from the sale or maturity of long-term held-to-maturity securities.

tlabel: proceeds from sale, maturity of held-to-maturity securities
description: Amount of cash inflow from the sale or maturity of long-term held-to-maturity securities.
Interest earned on funds deposited in US domestic money market accounts.
The fair value of loans assumed in noncash investing or financing activities.

Amount of expected credit loss for credit exposure on off-balance-sheet commitment, including but not limited to, loan commitment, standby letter of credit, financial guarantee not accounted for as insurance. Excludes off-balance sheet credit exposure accounted for as insurance and instrument accounted for under derivatives and hedging.

tlabel: off-balance-sheet, credit loss, liability, credit loss expense (reversal)
description: Amount of expense (reversal of expense) for expected credit loss for off-balance sheet credit exposure. Excludes off-balance sheet credit exposure accounted for as insurance and instrument accounted for under derivatives and hedging.

tlabel: other real estate, foreclosed assets,, repossessed assets
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of other real estate and foreclosed assets. Other real estate may include real estate investments, real estate loans that qualify as investments in real estate, and premises that are no longer used in operations may also be included in real estate owned. Foreclosed assets include all assets obtained in full or partial satisfaction of a debt arrangement through foreclosure proceedings.

tlabel: other revenue (expense) from real estate operations
description: Amount of other revenue (expense) derived from real estate investments partnerships.
Amount of increase (decrease) in the fair value of derivatives recognized in the income statement.
Interest earned on funds deposited in US domestic money market accounts.

tlabel: off-balance-sheet, credit loss, liability, credit loss expense (reversal)
description: Amount of expense (reversal of expense) for expected credit loss for off-balance sheet credit exposure. Excludes off-balance sheet credit exposure accounted for as insurance and instrument accounted for under derivatives and hedging.

tlabel: other real estate, foreclosed assets,, repossessed assets
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of other real estate and foreclosed assets. Other real estate may include real estate investments, real estate loans that qualify as investments in real estate, and premises that are no longer used in operations may also be included in real estate owned. Foreclosed assets include all assets obtained in full or partial satisfaction of a debt arrangement through foreclosure proceedings.

tlabel: gain (loss) on disposition of intangible assets
description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of intangible assets.
The amount of purchased research and development assets that are acquired in a business combination have no alternative future use and are therefore written off in the period of acquisition.

tlabel: proceeds from issuance initial public offering
description: The cash inflow associated with the amount received from entity's first offering of stock to the public.
Cumulative amount of the asset for third-party recoveries related to environmental remediation obligations that is recoverable after one year from the balance sheet date.

tlabel: common stock, share subscribed but unissued, subscriptions receivable
description: Amount of subscription receivable from investors who have been allocated common stock.

Monetary value of common stock allocated to investors to buy shares of a new issue of common stock before they are offered to the public. When stock is sold on a subscription basis, the issuer does not initially receive the total proceeds. In general, the issuer does not issue the shares to the investor until it receives the entire proceeds.

Monetary value of common stock allocated to investors to buy shares of a new issue of common stock before they are offered to the public. When stock is sold on a subscription basis, the issuer does not initially receive the total proceeds. In general, the issuer does not issue the shares to the investor until it receives the entire proceeds.

tlabel: finance lease, right-of-use asset, before accumulated amortization
description: Amount, before accumulated amortization, of right-of-use asset from finance lease.
Amount recognized for the passage of time, typically for liabilities, that have been discounted to their net present values. Excludes accretion associated with asset retirement obligations.
Current portion of reclamation reserve to restore a mining or drilling site to the condition agreed upon within the mining or drilling contract.

tlabel: contract with customer, liability, revenue recognized
description: Amount of revenue recognized that was previously included in balance of obligation to transfer good or service to customer for which consideration from customer has been received or is due.

tlabel: gain (loss) on derivative instruments, net, pretax
description: Aggregate net gain (loss) on all derivative instruments recognized in earnings during the period, before tax effects.

tlabel: gain (loss) on disposition of other assets
description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of other assets.
Amount of loss from reductions in inventory due to subsequent measurement adjustments, including, but not limited to, physical deterioration, obsolescence, or changes in price levels.
Amount of investment in marketable security.

Amount of a reclamation and mine closing liability that is associated with a legal obligation for the closure and reclamation of a mine including the removal of buildings, equipment, machinery and other physical remnants of mining, closure of tailings impoundments, leach pads and other mine features, and contouring, covering and revegetation of waste rock piles and other disturbed areas.
Mineral properties, net of adjustments.
Amount of other expense (income) that is infrequent in occurrence or unusual in nature.
Total assets that cannot be used for operating purposes because of contract or regulatory requirements that are in effect for a period that extends beyond one year.

tlabel: proceeds from sale, maturity of marketable securities
description: The cash inflow associated with the aggregate amount received by the entity through sale or maturity of marketable securities (held-to-maturity or available-for-sale) during the period.

tlabel: reclassification from aoci, current period, before tax, attributable to parent
description: Amount before tax of reclassification adjustments of other comprehensive income (loss) attributable to parent.
Amount of investment in marketable security, classified as current.

tlabel: proceeds from collection of notes receivable
description: The cash inflow associated with principal collections from a borrowing supported by a written promise to pay an obligation.
Current portion of reclamation reserve to restore a mining or drilling site to the condition agreed upon within the mining or drilling contract.

Amount of a reclamation and mine closing liability that is associated with a legal obligation for the closure and reclamation of a mine including the removal of buildings, equipment, machinery and other physical remnants of mining, closure of tailings impoundments, leach pads and other mine features, and contouring, covering and revegetation of waste rock piles and other disturbed areas.
Total assets that cannot be used for operating purposes because of contract or regulatory requirements that are in effect for a period that extends beyond one year.

tlabel: payments to acquire additional interest in subsidiaries
description: The cash outflow associated with the purchase of noncontrolling interest during the period.

tlabel: defined benefit plan, benefit obligation, actuarial gain (loss)
description: Amount of gain (loss) from change in actuarial assumptions which (increases) decreases benefit obligation of defined benefit plan. Assumptions include, but are not limited to, interest, mortality, employee turnover, salary, and temporary deviation from substantive plan.
Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the obligations incurred through that date and payable for employees' services provided.

tlabel: allowance for loan, lease losses, real estate
description: The reserve to cover probable credit losses related to specifically identified fixed maturity real estate loans as well as probable credit losses inherent in the remainder of that loan portfolio.

Fair value of investment other than investment in equity security, investment in debt security and equity method investment. Includes, but is not limited to, investment in certain entities that calculate net asset value per share. Example includes, but is not limited to, investment in hedge fund, venture capital fund, private equity fund, and real estate partnership or fund.

Amount of current federal tax expense (benefit) attributable to income (loss) from continuing operations. Includes, but is not limited to, current national tax expense (benefit) for non-US (United States of America) jurisdiction.

tlabel: reinsurance recoverables on unpaid losses, gross
description: Amount before valuation allowance of reinsurance recoverables for losses reported to the ceding insurer but not yet paid, and for amounts expected based upon statistical projections and other measures of incurred losses and loss settlement expenses which have not yet been reported to the ceding insurer.

tlabel: allowance for loan, lease losses, real estate
description: The reserve to cover probable credit losses related to specifically identified fixed maturity real estate loans as well as probable credit losses inherent in the remainder of that loan portfolio.

Fair value of investment other than investment in equity security, investment in debt security and equity method investment. Includes, but is not limited to, investment in certain entities that calculate net asset value per share. Example includes, but is not limited to, investment in hedge fund, venture capital fund, private equity fund, and real estate partnership or fund.

Amount of current federal tax expense (benefit) attributable to income (loss) from continuing operations. Includes, but is not limited to, current national tax expense (benefit) for non-US (United States of America) jurisdiction.

tlabel: reinsurance recoverables on unpaid losses, gross
description: Amount before valuation allowance of reinsurance recoverables for losses reported to the ceding insurer but not yet paid, and for amounts expected based upon statistical projections and other measures of incurred losses and loss settlement expenses which have not yet been reported to the ceding insurer.

tlabel: payments for purchase of securities, operating activities
description: Cash paid to purchase debt and equity securities, classified as operating activities, during the period; includes trading securities and any other investments classified as operating.

tlabel: proceeds from sale of securities, operating activities
description: Cash received from sale of investments in debt and equity securities, classified as operating activities, during the period; includes trading securities and any other investments classified as operating.
Amount of unrecognized tax benefits.

tlabel: other income tax expense (benefit), continuing operations
description: Amount of other current and other deferred income tax expense (benefit) attributable to continuing operations.

tlabel: other income tax expense (benefit), continuing operations
description: Amount of other current and other deferred income tax expense (benefit) attributable to continuing operations.

tlabel: accounts receivable, allowance for credit loss
description: Amount of allowance for credit loss on accounts receivable.
Amount of long-term debt and lease obligation, classified as current.

tlabel: other comprehensive income (loss), cash flow hedge, gain (loss), after reclassification, tax, parent
description: Amount, after tax and reclassification, of gain (loss) from derivative instrument designated and qualifying as cash flow hedge included in assessment of hedge effectiveness, attributable to parent.
Amount of deferred cost, excluding capitalized cost related to contract with customer; classified as noncurrent.
Accumulated amount of amortization of assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with a finite life.
Amount of loss contingency liability expected to be resolved within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.
Amount of loss contingency liability expected to be resolved after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.
Amount of loss contingency liability expected to be resolved within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.
Amount of loss contingency liability expected to be resolved after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.
The carrying amount of capitalized costs of materials, supplies, and other assets, which are not included in inventory but used in production.

tlabel: proceeds from collection of loans held-for-sale
description: The cash inflow from collection of repayments from borrowers on loans that are held with the intention to resell in the near future; includes mortgages and other types of loans.
The cash inflow from collection of repayments from borrowers on loans that are held with the intention to resell in the near future; includes mortgages and other types of loans.

tlabel: fair value, option, changes in fair value, gain (loss)
description: For each line item in the statement of financial position, the amounts of gains and losses from fair value changes included in earnings.

tlabel: financing receivable, accrued interest, after allowance for credit loss
description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of accrued interest on financing receivable.
Gain (loss) incurred in hedging activities.

tlabel: other comprehensive income (loss), pension, other postretirement benefit plans, plan amendments, tax effect
description: Tax effect of plan amendments that occurred that has not been recognized in net periodic benefit cost.

tlabel: fair value, option, changes in fair value, gain (loss)
description: For each line item in the statement of financial position, the amounts of gains and losses from fair value changes included in earnings.

tlabel: financing receivable, accrued interest, after allowance for credit loss
description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of accrued interest on financing receivable.

tlabel: other comprehensive income (loss), pension, other postretirement benefit plans, plan amendments, tax effect
description: Tax effect of plan amendments that occurred that has not been recognized in net periodic benefit cost.
Current regulatory liabilities generally represent obligations to make refunds to customers for various reasons including overpayment.
Current regulatory liabilities generally represent obligations to make refunds to customers for various reasons including overpayment.

tlabel: business combination, contingent consideration arrangements, change in amount of contingent consideration, liability
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the value of a contingent consideration liability, including, but not limited to, differences arising upon settlement.

tlabel: employee stock ownership plan (esop), cash contributions to esop
description: This item represents the amount of cash contributions during the period made by the entity to the Employee Stock Ownership Plan (ESOP).
Amount of increase (decrease) of consideration paid in advance for income and other taxes that provide economic benefits in future periods.

Amount of other deferred income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to income (loss) from continuing operations. For example, but not limited to, acquisition-date income tax benefits or expenses recognized from changes in the acquirer's valuation allowance for its previously existing deferred tax assets resulting from a business combination and adjustments to beginning-of-year balance of a valuation allowance because of a change in circumstance causing a change in judgment about the realizability of the related deferred tax asset in future periods.

tlabel: proceeds from issuance of secured debt
description: The cash inflow from amounts received from issuance of long-term debt that is wholly or partially secured by collateral. Excludes proceeds from tax exempt secured debt.

tlabel: employee stock ownership plan (esop), cash contributions to esop
description: This item represents the amount of cash contributions during the period made by the entity to the Employee Stock Ownership Plan (ESOP).
The charge against earnings in the period to reduce the carrying amount of real property to fair value.

tlabel: oci, debt securities, available-for-sale, transfer from held-to-maturity, gain (loss), before adjustment, after tax
description: Amount, after tax and before adjustment, of unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).
The cash outflow to settle a bank borrowing during the year.

tlabel: revenue not from contract with customer, excluding interest income
description: Amount, excluding interest income, of revenue not accounted for under Topic 606.

tlabel: share-based payment arrangement, expensed, capitalized, amount
description: Amount of cost expensed and capitalized for award under share-based payment arrangement.
The cash inflow associated with the amount received from holders exercising their stock warrants.
Amount of increase (decrease) of investment in equity security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (FV-NI).
The cash inflow associated with the amount received from holders exercising their stock warrants.

tlabel: revenue not from contract with customer, excluding interest income
description: Amount, excluding interest income, of revenue not accounted for under Topic 606.

tlabel: share-based payment arrangement, expensed, capitalized, amount
description: Amount of cost expensed and capitalized for award under share-based payment arrangement.

tlabel: contractual interest expense on prepetition liabilities not recognized in statement of operations
description: The amount of contractual interest expense on prepetition liabilities not included in the statement of operations.
Amounts due from an entity in which the reporting entity shares joint control with another party or group, due after 1 year (or 1 business cycle).
Total amount of reorganization items.

tlabel: repayment of notes receivable from related parties
description: The cash inflow from a loan, supported by a promissory note, granted to related parties where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party; including affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, pension trusts, and so forth.

tlabel: other receivable, after allowance for credit loss, noncurrent
description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of receivable classified as other and noncurrent.

Aggregate carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the liabilities for all deferred compensation arrangements payable within one year (or the operating cycle, if longer). Represents currently earned compensation under compensation arrangements that is not actually paid until a later date.

Aggregate carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the liabilities for all deferred compensation arrangements payable within one year (or the operating cycle, if longer). Represents currently earned compensation under compensation arrangements that is not actually paid until a later date.

tlabel: allowance for loan, lease loss, recovery of bad debts
description: Amount of recovery of loans and lease receivables which had previously been fully or partially written-off as bad debts.

Total of (1) improvements, (2) held-for-sale, (3) land and land under development, (4) construction-in-process, (5) mortgage loans held-in-inventory, and (6) other real estate investments which are considered inventory due to being held for sale or disposition.

tlabel: payments for repurchase of trust preferred securities
description: The cash outflow to reacquire preferred stocks issued by a business trust or other special purpose entity, mainly established by a bank holding entity, to third party investors. The trust's assets are deeply subordinated debentures of the bank holding entity. Most trust preferred securities are subject to a mandatory redemption upon the repayment of the debentures.

Total of (1) improvements, (2) held-for-sale, (3) land and land under development, (4) construction-in-process, (5) mortgage loans held-in-inventory, and (6) other real estate investments which are considered inventory due to being held for sale or disposition.
Amount of general expenses not normally included in Other Operating Costs and Expenses.

Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of expenditures made in advance of when the economic benefit of the cost will be realized, and which will be expensed in future periods with the passage of time or when a triggering event occurs.

tlabel: revenue not from contract with customer, other
description: Amount of revenue that is not accounted for under Topic 606, classified as other.

tlabel: payments to acquire federal reserve bank stock
description: Amount of cash outflow to acquire Federal Reserve Bank (FRB) stock.

tlabel: proceeds from sale of federal reserve bank stock
description: Amount of cash inflow from sale of Federal Reserve Bank (FRB) stock.

tlabel: advance from federal home loan bank
description: Amount of borrowings as of the balance sheet date from the Federal Home Loan Bank, which are primarily used to cover shortages in the required reserve balance and liquidity shortages.

tlabel: advance from federal home loan bank
description: Amount of borrowings as of the balance sheet date from the Federal Home Loan Bank, which are primarily used to cover shortages in the required reserve balance and liquidity shortages.

tlabel: payments to acquire federal reserve bank stock
description: Amount of cash outflow to acquire Federal Reserve Bank (FRB) stock.

tlabel: proceeds from sale of federal reserve bank stock
description: Amount of cash inflow from sale of Federal Reserve Bank (FRB) stock.

tlabel: interest expense, long-term debt, capital securities
description: Total interest expense on long-term debt and capital securities.
The increase (decrease) in interest-bearing deposits domestic.
The increase (decrease) in domestic noninterest bearing deposits.
Includes other investments and securities that are not at fair value as of the balance sheet date and those that are not accounted for under the equity method.

tlabel: accounts, financing receivables, held-for-sale, not part of disposal group, after valuation allowance
description: Amount, after valuation allowance, of accounts and financing receivables held for sale and not part of disposal group. Excludes loan covered under loss sharing agreement and loan classified as investment in debt security.
Amount of expense recognized during the period for the foreclosure on real estate assets.

tlabel: interest expense, long-term debt, capital securities
description: Total interest expense on long-term debt and capital securities.
The increase (decrease) in interest-bearing deposits domestic.
The increase (decrease) in domestic noninterest bearing deposits.
Includes other investments and securities that are not at fair value as of the balance sheet date and those that are not accounted for under the equity method.

tlabel: proceeds from sale of wholly owned real estate, real estate acquired in settlement of loans
description: The cash inflow from proceeds From Sales of Wholly Owned Real Estate and Real Estate Acquired in Settlement of Loans.
Amount of impairment loss from capitalized computer software costs.

The sum of the periodic adjustments of the differences between securities' face values and purchase prices that are charged against earnings. This is called accretion if the security was purchased at a discount and amortization if it was purchased at premium. As a noncash item, this element is an adjustment to net income when calculating cash provided by or used in operations using the indirect method.

tlabel: business combination, recognized identifiable assets acquired, liabilities assumed, intangible assets, other than goodwill
description: Amount of intangible assets, excluding goodwill, acquired at the acquisition date.
Amount before tax of foreign currency transaction unrealized gain (loss) recognized in the income statement.

tlabel: issuance of stock, warrants for services or claims
description: Fair value of share-based compensation granted to nonemployees as payment for services rendered or acknowledged claims.
The fair value of liabilities assumed in noncash investing or financing activities.
Amount of cash outflow for purchase of marketable security.
The amount of purchased research and development assets that are acquired in a business combination have no alternative future use and are therefore written off in the period of acquisition.
The fair value of stock issued in noncash financing activities.
Amount allocated to previously issued common shares repurchased by the issuing entity and held in treasury.
The increase (decrease) during the period in book value of long-lived assets that the reporting entity plans to sell within one year (or one business cycle).

tlabel: debt securities, available-for-sale, excluding accrued interest, current
description: Amount excluding accrued interest, of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), classified as current.

tlabel: deferred income taxes, other assets, noncurrent
description: Amount after allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences and other assets expected to be realized or consumed after one year or normal operating cycle, if longer.

tlabel: deferred income taxes, other liabilities, noncurrent
description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences, after deferred tax asset, and other liabilities expected to be paid after one year or operating cycle, if longer.

tlabel: increase (decrease) in accounts payable, other operating liabilities
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in obligations incurred but not paid, and operating obligations classified as other.
The total expense recognized in the period for promotion, public relations, and brand or product advertising.

tlabel: other comprehensive income, other, net of tax
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in other comprehensive income, after tax, from changes classified as other.
Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from long-term debt supported by a written promise to pay an obligation.

tlabel: policyholder benefits, claims incurred, net, life, annuity
description: Amount, after effect of policies assumed or ceded, of expense related to provision for policy benefits and costs incurred for life and annuity insurance contracts.

tlabel: policyholder benefits, claims incurred, net, other
description: Amount, after effect of policies assumed or ceded, of expense related to provision for benefits and costs incurred for other insurance contracts.

tlabel: liability for future policy benefit, after reinsurance
description: Amount, after effect of reinsurance, of liability for future policy benefit.

tlabel: liability for future policy benefit, after reinsurance
description: Amount, after effect of reinsurance, of liability for future policy benefit.

tlabel: policyholder benefits, claims incurred, net, life, annuity
description: Amount, after effect of policies assumed or ceded, of expense related to provision for policy benefits and costs incurred for life and annuity insurance contracts.

tlabel: policyholder benefits, claims incurred, net, other
description: Amount, after effect of policies assumed or ceded, of expense related to provision for benefits and costs incurred for other insurance contracts.

tlabel: proceeds from sale of property held-for-sale
description: The cash inflow from the sale of formerly productive land held for sale, anything permanently fixed to it, including buildings, structures on it, and so forth.

tlabel: gain (loss) on sale of financing receivable
description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale of financing receivable.
The cash inflow from the sale of formerly productive land held for sale, anything permanently fixed to it, including buildings, structures on it, and so forth.

tlabel: due from other related parties, current
description: Amount receivable from related parties classified as other, due within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

tlabel: financial instruments, owned, us government, agency obligations, at fair value
description: The fair value as of the balance sheet date of firm holdings in debt obligations issued by the US government including short-term Treasury bills, medium-term Treasury notes, and long-term Treasury bonds, as well as debt issued by agencies. Includes both pledged (to counterparties as collateral for financing transactions) and unpledged holdings.

tlabel: financial instruments, owned, us government, agency obligations, at fair value
description: The fair value as of the balance sheet date of firm holdings in debt obligations issued by the US government including short-term Treasury bills, medium-term Treasury notes, and long-term Treasury bonds, as well as debt issued by agencies. Includes both pledged (to counterparties as collateral for financing transactions) and unpledged holdings.
The loan servicing fees paid to third parties that relate to loan expenses for a portfolio containing the entire group of loans owned by the company.

tlabel: proceeds from collection of mortgage loans held-for-sale
description: The cash inflow from collection of repayments from borrowers on loans that are secured with real estate mortgages and are held with the intention to resell in the near future.

tlabel: proceeds from sale of mortgage servicing rights (msr)
description: The cash inflow from the sale of servicing rights, which contractually entitle the servicer to receive fees and ancillary revenues for performing billing, collection, disbursement and recordkeeping services in connection with a mortgage portfolio. Rights may be obtained via (1) acquisition or assumption of a servicing obligation that does not relate to financial assets of the servicer or its consolidated affiliates; or (2) by originating mortgage loans and then (a) transferring the loans to a Variable Interest Entity (VIE) in a transaction that meets the necessary transfer and classification requirements, or (b) transferring the loans in a transaction that meets the requirements for sale accounting.
Amount of expense related to credit loss from transactions other than loan and lease transactions.
Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of land and buildings obtained through foreclosure proceedings or defeasance in full or partial satisfaction of a debt arrangement.

tlabel: cash, cash equivalents,, federal funds sold
description: The sum of cash and cash equivalents plus Federal Funds Sold. Cash and cash equivalents consist of short term, highly liquid investments that are readily convertible to known amounts of cash and are so near their maturity that they present negligible risk of changes in value due to changes in interest rates -- usually with an original maturity less than 90 days.
The loan servicing fees paid to third parties that relate to loan expenses for a portfolio containing the entire group of loans owned by the company.

tlabel: proceeds from collection, loan, mortgage, held-for-sale
description: The cash inflow from collection of repayments from borrowers on loans that are secured with real estate mortgages and are held with the intention to resell in the near future.
Amount of expense related to credit loss from transactions other than loan and lease transactions.
Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of land and buildings obtained through foreclosure proceedings or defeasance in full or partial satisfaction of a debt arrangement.
Capitalized costs of unproved properties incurred for any combination mineral interests acquisitions and other costs not previously disclosed within this table.
Other costs for oil and gas producing activities.
Capitalized costs of unproved properties incurred for any combination mineral interests acquisitions and other costs not previously disclosed within this table.
Other costs for oil and gas producing activities.
The carrying amount of the asset transferred to a third party to serve as a deposit, which typically serves as security against failure by the transferor to perform under terms of an agreement.
The cash outflow associated with other payments to acquire businesses including deposit on pending acquisitions and preacquisition costs.

tlabel: consideration received for beneficial interest obtained for transferring financial asset
description: Amount of beneficial interest received as consideration for transferring noncash financial asset. Includes, but is not limited to, trade receivable in securitization transaction.

The increase (decrease) during the period in the carrying value of derivative instruments reported as liabilities that are due to be disposed of within one year (or the normal operating cycle, if longer).

tlabel: increase (decrease) in other fossil fuel inventories
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the value of fossil fuel, other than coal, held in inventory.

tlabel: proceeds from collection of retained interest in securitized receivables
description: Amount of cash inflow from collection on beneficial interest in securitization of receivables.
The amount of regulated other operating revenues recognized during the period.

tlabel: consideration received for beneficial interest obtained for transferring financial asset
description: Amount of beneficial interest received as consideration for transferring noncash financial asset. Includes, but is not limited to, trade receivable in securitization transaction.

The increase (decrease) during the period in the carrying value of derivative instruments reported as liabilities that are due to be disposed of within one year (or the normal operating cycle, if longer).

tlabel: proceeds from collection of retained interest in securitized receivables
description: Amount of cash inflow from collection on beneficial interest in securitization of receivables.
The amount of regulated other operating revenues recognized during the period.

tlabel: finance lease, right-of-use asset, accumulated amortization
description: Amount of accumulated amortization of right-of-use asset from finance lease.

tlabel: finance lease, right-of-use asset, accumulated amortization
description: Amount of accumulated amortization of right-of-use asset from finance lease.

tlabel: aoci, derivative qualifying as hedge, excluded component, after tax
description: Amount, after tax, of accumulated gain (loss) from increase (decrease) in value of excluded component of derivative hedge.

tlabel: common stocks, including additional paid in capital, net of discount
description: Amount after discount on shares of par value plus amounts in excess of par value or issuance value for common stock held by shareholders. Includes common stock repurchased and held as treasury stock.

Amount, before unamortized (discount) premium and debt issuance costs, of long-term debt. Includes, but is not limited to, notes payable, bonds payable, commercial loans, mortgage loans, convertible debt, subordinated debt and other types of debt.
Amount, after accumulated amortization, of debt discount.
Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLB) stock represents an equity interest in a FHLB. It does not have a readily determinable fair value because its ownership is restricted and it lacks a market (liquidity).

The difference between the carrying value and the sale price of an investment. A gain would be recognized when the sale price of the investment is greater than the carrying value of the investment. This element refers to the Gain included in earnings and not to the cash proceeds of the sale.

tlabel: increase (decrease) in raw materials, packaging materials, supplies inventories
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the value of raw materials, packaging materials and supplies held in inventory.
Amount of cash outflow for payments made by the Federal Home Loan Banks (FHLBanks) to the Affordable Housing Program (AHP).

tlabel: property, plant, equipment, other, accumulated depreciation
description: Amount of accumulated depreciation of long-lived, physical assets used to produce goods and services and not intended for resale, classified as other.

tlabel: public utilities, property, plant, equipment, land
description: Period end book value of land owned by the public utility.
The amount for the individual regulatory asset as itemized in a table of regulatory assets as of the end of the period.
The amount for the individual regulatory liability as itemized in a table of regulatory liabilities as of the end of the period.

tlabel: common stocks, including additional paid in capital, net of discount
description: Amount after discount on shares of par value plus amounts in excess of par value or issuance value for common stock held by shareholders. Includes common stock repurchased and held as treasury stock.
Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLB) stock represents an equity interest in a FHLB. It does not have a readily determinable fair value because its ownership is restricted and it lacks a market (liquidity).

tlabel: increase (decrease) in raw materials, packaging materials, supplies inventories
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the value of raw materials, packaging materials and supplies held in inventory.
Amount of liability, recognized in statement of financial position, for defined benefit pension and other postretirement plans.

tlabel: property, plant, equipment, other, accumulated depreciation
description: Amount of accumulated depreciation of long-lived, physical assets used to produce goods and services and not intended for resale, classified as other.

tlabel: public utilities, property, plant, equipment, land
description: Period end book value of land owned by the public utility.
The amount for the individual regulatory asset as itemized in a table of regulatory assets as of the end of the period.
The amount for the individual regulatory liability as itemized in a table of regulatory liabilities as of the end of the period.

Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of liabilities incurred through that date and payable for statutory sales and use taxes, including value added tax. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of liabilities incurred through that date and payable for statutory sales and use taxes, including value added tax. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

tlabel: payments for repurchase of convertible preferred stock
description: The cash outflow to reacquire preferred stock originally issued and identified as a security that can be exchanged for another type of financial security. This repurchased stock is held in treasury.

tlabel: payments for repurchase of convertible preferred stock
description: The cash outflow to reacquire preferred stock originally issued and identified as a security that can be exchanged for another type of financial security. This repurchased stock is held in treasury.

tlabel: equity securities without readily determinable fair value, amount
description: Amount of investment in equity security without readily determinable fair value.

The difference between the carrying value and the sale price of an investment. A loss would be recognized when the sale price of the investment is less than the carrying value of the investment. This element refers to the Loss included in earnings and not to the cash proceeds of the sale.

The difference between the carrying value and the sale price of an investment. A gain would be recognized when the sale price of the investment is greater than the carrying value of the investment. This element refers to the Gain included in earnings and not to the cash proceeds of the sale.

The difference between the carrying value and the sale price of an investment. A loss would be recognized when the sale price of the investment is less than the carrying value of the investment. This element refers to the Loss included in earnings and not to the cash proceeds of the sale.
Amount, after allowance, receivable from customers, clients, or other third-parties, and receivables classified as other due within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

tlabel: cash surrender value of life insurance
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of amounts which could be received based on the terms of the insurance contract upon surrendering life policies owned by the entity.
Amount of deferred income and obligation to transfer product and service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable, classified as current.
Amount of cash outflow for principal payment on finance lease.
The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amount due from customers for the credit sale of goods and services; includes accounts receivable and other types of receivables.
The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amount due from lessees arising from lease agreements.
The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amount due within one year (or one business cycle) of receivables that were originally due beyond one year (or one business cycle).
Amount of increase (decrease) in noncurrent operating liabilities classified as other.
Amount of interest expense classified as other.
Amount of interest income earned from interest bearing assets classified as other.

tlabel: life insurance, corporate or bank owned, change in value
