Amount of restricted investment in equity security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (FV-NI).
A payment from an investee, in which the investment basis has previously been reduced to zero. This amount reduces net cash used in operating activities.

tlabel: reinsurance recoverables on paid losses, allowance
description: Amount of valuation allowance for reinsurance recoverables on paid losses.
A payment from an investee, in which the investment basis has previously been reduced to zero. This amount reduces net cash used in operating activities.

tlabel: reinsurance recoverables on paid losses, allowance
description: Amount of valuation allowance for reinsurance recoverables on paid losses.
Amount of deferred income excluding obligation to transfer product and service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable.
The cash outflow for acquisition of machinery and equipment.
Amount of deferred income excluding obligation to transfer product and service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable.
Amount, before accumulated amortization, of debt issuance costs. Includes, but is not limited to, legal, accounting, underwriting, printing, and registration costs.

The increase (decrease) during the reporting period of obligations, not classified as trade payables, incurred and payable for the acquisition of merchandise, materials, supplies, and services pertaining to construction projects.

tlabel: payments to acquire other real estate
description: The cash outflow associated with the purchase of other real estate investments held by the entity for investment purposes not otherwise defined in the taxonomy.
The amount of an asset, typically cash, provided to a counterparty to provide certain assurance of performance by the entity pursuant to the terms of a written or oral agreement, such as a lease.

tlabel: interest rate cash flow hedge gain (loss) reclassified to earnings, net
description: The amount of net gains or losses on interest rate cash flow hedges reclassified during the period to earnings from accumulated other comprehensive income upon the hedged transaction affecting earnings.

The expense charged against earnings to eliminate the capitalized costs of projects that have been terminated during the reporting period, which is added back to net income when calculating cash provided by (used in) operations using the indirect method.
The amount of an asset, typically cash, provided to a counterparty to provide certain assurance of performance by the entity pursuant to the terms of a written or oral agreement, such as a lease.

tlabel: payments to acquire other real estate
description: The cash outflow associated with the purchase of other real estate investments held by the entity for investment purposes not otherwise defined in the taxonomy.

tlabel: adjustments to additional paid in capital, stock issued, own-share lending arrangement, issuance costs
description: Amount of increase in additional paid in capital (APIC) resulting from issuance costs from a share-lending arrangement entered into, in contemplation of a convertible debt offering or other financing.
Cash inflow representing an adjustment to the purchase price of a previous acquisition.

tlabel: gain (loss) on discontinuation of cash flow hedge due to forecasted transaction probable of not occurring, net
description: The amount of net gain (loss) reclassified into earnings in the period when cash flow hedge is discontinued because it is probable that the original forecasted transactions will not occur by the end of the original period or an additional two month time period.
Amount of paid and unpaid preferred stock dividends declared with the form of settlement in payment-in-kind (PIK).
Amount of revenue recognized that was previously reported as deferred or unearned revenue.

tlabel: deferred income taxes, other assets, current
description: Amount after allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences and other assets expected to be realized or consumed within one year or normal operating cycle, if longer.

tlabel: deferred income taxes, other assets, current
description: Amount after allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences and other assets expected to be realized or consumed within one year or normal operating cycle, if longer.

tlabel: accelerated share repurchases, settlement (payment) or receipt
description: Amount of cash receipt from (payment to) bank; or stock received from (issuance to) bank in the settlement of the accelerated share repurchase agreement.

tlabel: business combination, contingent consideration, liability, current
description: Amount of liability recognized arising from contingent consideration in a business combination, expected to be settled within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

tlabel: business combination, provisional information, initial accounting incomplete, adjustment, inventory
description: This element represents the amount of any measurement period adjustment (as defined) realized during the reporting period to inventory acquired in connection with a business combination for which the initial accounting was incomplete.

tlabel: deferred income taxes, other tax liabilities, noncurrent
description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences, after deferred tax asset, and other tax liabilities expected to be paid after one year or operating cycle, if longer.

tlabel: equity method investment, realized gain (loss) on disposal
description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of an equity method investment.

tlabel: foreign currency transaction gain, before tax
description: Amount before tax of foreign currency transaction realized and unrealized gain recognized in the income statement.
Amount of expenses incurred but not yet paid nor invoiced, and liabilities classified as other.

The capitalized costs incurred during the period (excluded from amortization) to purchase, lease or otherwise acquire an unproved property, including costs of lease bonuses and options to purchase or lease properties, the portion of costs applicable to minerals when land including mineral rights is purchased in fee, brokers' fees, recording fees, legal costs, and other costs incurred in acquiring properties.

tlabel: income (loss) from continuing operations before interest expense, interest income, income taxes, noncontrolling interests, net
description: Amount of income (loss) from continuing operations, nonoperating income (expense) and income (loss) from equity method investments, before deduction of income tax expense (benefit) and income (loss) attributable to noncontrolling interest, and addition of interest income (expense).

The capitalized costs incurred during the period (excluded from amortization) to purchase, lease or otherwise acquire an unproved property, including costs of lease bonuses and options to purchase or lease properties, the portion of costs applicable to minerals when land including mineral rights is purchased in fee, brokers' fees, recording fees, legal costs, and other costs incurred in acquiring properties.

tlabel: payments for leasing costs, commissions,, tenant improvements
description: Net cash outflow for the allowance granted to lessee and/or direct costs incurred by lessor used to prepare the leased premises for tenant's occupancy; for costs that are essential to originating the lease and would not otherwise have been incurred without the lease agreement, including but not limited to, evaluating the lessee's credit condition, guarantees, and collateral and costs incurred in negotiating, processing, and executing the lease agreement; and for any commission(s) incurred.

Amount of gain (loss) from deconsolidation of subsidiary and derecognition of group of assets constituting transfer of business or nonprofit activity, excluding conveyance of oil and gas mineral rights and transfer of good or service in contract with customer.

tlabel: payments for leasing costs, commissions,, tenant improvements
description: Net cash outflow for the allowance granted to lessee and/or direct costs incurred by lessor used to prepare the leased premises for tenant's occupancy; for costs that are essential to originating the lease and would not otherwise have been incurred without the lease agreement, including but not limited to, evaluating the lessee's credit condition, guarantees, and collateral and costs incurred in negotiating, processing, and executing the lease agreement; and for any commission(s) incurred.

tlabel: variable interest entity, initial consolidation, gain (loss)
description: The gain (loss) recognized on initial consolidation of a variable interest entity (VIE) when the VIE is not a business (as defined).
Amount of investment in equity security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (FV-NI), classified as noncurrent.
Payments of cash to employees, including wages and salaries, during the current period.
Payments of cash to employees, including wages and salaries, during the current period.

The amount of the original debt being converted in a noncash (or part noncash) transaction. "Part noncash" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period.

tlabel: adjustments to additional paid in capital, other
description: Amount of other increase (decrease) in additional paid in capital (APIC).

tlabel: cash, cash equivalents, restricted cash, restricted cash equivalents, disposal group, including discontinued operations
description: Amount of cash and cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage; attributable to disposal group, including, but not limited to, discontinued operations. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.
Amount of unrealized and realized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading).
Amount of unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading).
Amount of increase (decrease) in the fair value of derivatives recognized in the income statement.

tlabel: discontinued operation, income (loss) from discontinued operation, before income tax
description: Amount before tax of income (loss) from a discontinued operation. Includes, but is not limited to, the income (loss) from operations during the phase-out period, gain (loss) on disposal, gain (loss) for reversal of write-down (write-down) to fair value, less cost to sell, and adjustments to a prior period gain (loss) on disposal.

tlabel: discontinued operation, provision for loss (gain) on disposal, net of tax
description: Amount after tax of (gain) loss recognized for the (reversal of write-down) write-down to fair value, less cost to sell, of a discontinued operation.

tlabel: effect of exchange rate on cash, cash equivalents, restricted cash, restricted cash equivalents, disposal group, including discontinued operations
description: Amount of increase (decrease) from effect of exchange rate changes on cash and cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage; held in foreign currencies; attributable to disposal group, including, but not limited to, discontinued operations. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

tlabel: finance lease, right-of-use asset, after accumulated amortization
description: Amount, after accumulated amortization, of right-of-use asset from finance lease.

tlabel: income tax expense (benefit), continuing operations, discontinued operations
description: Amount of current tax expense (benefit) and deferred tax expense (benefit) pertaining to income (loss) from continuing operations and income (loss) from discontinued operations.

The increase (decrease) during the period in the net carrying value of derivative instruments reported as assets and liabilities that are due to be disposed of within one year (or the normal operating cycle, if longer).
The increase (decrease) in the beginning and end of period in insurance industry assets which are classified as cash flows from operating activities.
The increase (decrease) in insurance liability balances during the period.
The current portion of nonphysical assets, excluding financial assets, if these assets are classified into the current and noncurrent portions.

tlabel: noncontrolling interest, increase from sale of parent equity interest
description: Amount of increase in noncontrolling interest from sale of a portion of the parent's controlling interest.
The cash outflow associated with the acquisition of business during the period. The cash portion only of the acquisition price.

tlabel: payments to acquire loans, leases held-for-investment
description: The cash outflow from (a) purchases of loans held-for-investment, (b) purchases of leases held-for-investment, and (c) both.
The cash inflow associated with the amount received by a corporation from a shareholder during the period.

Primarily represents commissions incurred in the period based upon the sale by commissioned employees or third parties of the entity's goods or services, and fees for sales assistance or product enhancements performed by third parties (such as a distributor or value added reseller).

tlabel: debt securities, trading,, equity securities, fv-ni
description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading) and investment in equity security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (FV-NI).

The difference between the price paid by the public and the contract price less the related expenses. A broker-dealer may underwrite a security offering by contracting to buy the issue either at a fixed price or a price based on selling the offering on a best-effort basis.

The current portion of money or property received from customers which is either to be returned upon satisfactory contract completion or applied to customer receivables in accordance with the terms of the contract or the understandings.

tlabel: discontinued operation, tax effect of discontinued operation
description: Amount of tax expense (benefit) related to a discontinued operation. Includes, but is not limited to, tax expense (benefit) related to income (loss) from operations during the phase-out period, tax expense (benefit) related to gain (loss) on disposal, tax expense (benefit) related to gain (loss) for reversal of write-down (write-down) to fair value, less cost to sell, and tax expense (benefit) related to adjustments of a prior period gain (loss) on disposal.

tlabel: foreign currency transaction gain (loss), before tax
description: Amount, before tax, of realized and unrealized gain (loss) from foreign currency transaction.
Amount of cash outflow from the purchase of receivables classified as other.

tlabel: proceeds from sale of loans receivable
description: The cash inflow associated with the sale of loans receivables arising from the financing of goods and services.
Amount of realized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

tlabel: effect of exchange rate on cash, cash equivalents, discontinued operations
description: The effect of exchange rate changes on cash balances in discontinuing operations held in foreign currencies.
The cash outflow associated with purchasing loans held for investment purposes during the period.
The increase (decrease) in the beginning and end of period in insurance industry assets which are classified as cash flows from operating activities.
The current portion of nonphysical assets, excluding financial assets, if these assets are classified into the current and noncurrent portions.
Amount of deposits held by the entity for a related party (entity, shareholder, employee).

The difference between the price paid by the public and the contract price less the related expenses. A broker-dealer may underwrite a security offering by contracting to buy the issue either at a fixed price or a price based on selling the offering on a best-effort basis.
Amount of unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading).

tlabel: employee stock ownership plan (esop), compensation expense
description: The amount of plan compensation cost recognized during the period.
The increase (decrease) in the beginning and end of period in insurance industry assets which are classified as cash flows from operating activities.
The current portion of nonphysical assets, excluding financial assets, if these assets are classified into the current and noncurrent portions.

The difference between the price paid by the public and the contract price less the related expenses. A broker-dealer may underwrite a security offering by contracting to buy the issue either at a fixed price or a price based on selling the offering on a best-effort basis.
Carrying amount of the equity interests owned by noncontrolling shareholders, partners, or other equity holders in joint ventures included in the entity's consolidated financial statements.

tlabel: proceeds from (payments for) deposits applied to debt retirements
description: The net cash inflow or outflow from payments to deposit account and application of deposits to retire or pay down debt during the period.
Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of improvements having a life longer than one year that were made for the benefit of one or more tenants.

tlabel: proceeds from (payments for) deposits applied to debt retirements
description: The net cash inflow or outflow from payments to deposit account and application of deposits to retire or pay down debt during the period.
Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of improvements having a life longer than one year that were made for the benefit of one or more tenants.

tlabel: adjustments to additional paid in capital, convertible debt with conversion feature
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in additional paid in capital (APIC) resulting from recognition of deferred taxes for convertible debt with a beneficial conversion feature.
Amount of impairment loss from capitalized computer software costs.

tlabel: net investment in lease, after allowance for credit loss, noncurrent
description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases, classified as noncurrent.
The value of notes retired (or transferred to another entity) in noncash investing or financing transactions.

tlabel: line of credit facility, decrease, forgiveness
description: Amount of decrease in line of credit facility from forgiveness by the holder of the line of credit.
A bank's noninterest bearing demand deposits in other banks (such as correspondents).
A bank's noninterest bearing demand deposits in other banks (such as correspondents).

tlabel: increase (decrease) in advance payments by borrowers for taxes, insurance
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in prepayments received from borrowers for taxes and insurance remitted to the appropriate tax authority or insurer on behalf of the borrower.

tlabel: long-term federal home loan bank advances, noncurrent
description: The noncurrent portion of Federal Home Loan Bank borrowings initially due beyond one year or beyond the normal operating cycle if longer.

Carrying amount of estimated litigation liability for known or estimated probable loss from litigation, which may include attorneys' fees and other litigation costs, which is expected to be paid after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

Carrying amount of estimated litigation liability for known or estimated probable loss from litigation, which may include attorneys' fees and other litigation costs, which is expected to be paid after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

tlabel: capitalized costs, oil, gas producing activities, net
description: Net amount of capitalized costs relating to oil and gas producing activities.

tlabel: capitalized costs, oil, gas producing activities, net
description: Net amount of capitalized costs relating to oil and gas producing activities.

tlabel: gain (loss) on disposition of oil, gas, timber property
description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of oil and gas property or timber property.

The value of the financial instrument issued [noncash or part noncash] in the conversion of stock. Noncash is defined as transactions during a period that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. "Part noncash" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period.

The value of the financial instrument issued [noncash or part noncash] in the conversion of stock. Noncash is defined as transactions during a period that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. "Part noncash" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period.

tlabel: debt instrument, unamortized discount (premium), debt issuance costs, net
description: Amount of unamortized debt discount (premium) and debt issuance costs.

tlabel: debt instrument, unamortized discount (premium), debt issuance costs, net
description: Amount of unamortized debt discount (premium) and debt issuance costs.

tlabel: interest, fee income, nonmortgage loans, leases held-for-sale
description: Amount of interest and fee income earned from loans held-for-sale, including interest earned from direct financing and sales-type leases held-for-sale, but excluding mortgage loans held-for sale.

tlabel: interest expense, beneficial interests issued by consolidated variable interest entities
description: Interest expense on beneficial interests issued by consolidated variable interest entities.

tlabel: interest, fee income, loans, commercial, residential, real estate
description: Interest and fee income from commercial and residential real estate loans.

tlabel: interest, fee income, loans, commercial, residential, real estate
description: Interest and fee income from commercial and residential real estate loans.

tlabel: interest expense, beneficial interests issued by consolidated variable interest entities
description: Interest expense on beneficial interests issued by consolidated variable interest entities.
Amount of obligations incurred and payable classified as other.
Amount of net assets (liabilities).
Cost of the investment.

Value of the investment at close of period. For schedules of investments that are categorized, the value would be aggregated by category. For investment in and advances to affiliates, if operations of any controlled companies are different in character from those of the company, group such affiliates within divisions and by type of activities.
Amount of expenses related to the managing member or general partner for management of the day-to-day business functions of the limited liability company (LLC) or limited partnership (LP).
Carrying amount of the unpaid portion of the fee payable to the managing member or general partner for management of the fund or trust.

tlabel: noninterest expense transfer agent, custodian fees
description: Fees paid to an agent employed by a corporation or mutual fund to maintain shareholder records, including purchases, sales, and account balances. Also includes custodian fees incurred during an accounting period from an agent, bank, trust company, or other organization that holds and safeguards an individual's, mutual fund's, or investment company's assets for them. These fees will be billed back to the client and are a component of noninterest expense.
The amount of cash paid for deposits on goods and services during the period; excludes time deposits and deposits with other institutions, which pertain to financial service entities.
Amount of net assets (liabilities).
Cost of the investment.
Fair value of investment in security owned.
Amount of fee payable for management of fund or trust.

tlabel: noninterest expense transfer agent, custodian fees
description: Fees paid to an agent employed by a corporation or mutual fund to maintain shareholder records, including purchases, sales, and account balances. Also includes custodian fees incurred during an accounting period from an agent, bank, trust company, or other organization that holds and safeguards an individual's, mutual fund's, or investment company's assets for them. These fees will be billed back to the client and are a component of noninterest expense.

Fees paid to advisors who provide certain management support and administrative oversight services including the organization and sale of stock, investment funds, limited partnerships and mutual funds.
The amount of cash paid for deposits on goods and services during the period; excludes time deposits and deposits with other institutions, which pertain to financial service entities.

tlabel: related party transaction, amounts of transaction
description: Amount of transactions with related party during the financial reporting period.

tlabel: embedded derivative, fair value of embedded derivative liability
description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of the embedded derivative or group of embedded derivatives classified as a liability.
Amount of increase (decrease) of consideration paid in advance for interest that provides economic benefits in future periods.

tlabel: adjustments to additional paid in capital, increase in carrying amount of redeemable preferred stock
description: Amount of decrease (increase) in additional paid in capital (APIC) for the increase in carrying amount of redeemable preferred stock.

tlabel: embedded derivative, fair value of embedded derivative liability
description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of the embedded derivative or group of embedded derivatives classified as a liability.

The redemption (or callable) amount of currently redeemable preferred stock. Includes amounts representing dividends not currently declared or paid but which will be payable under the redemption features or for which ultimate payment is solely within the control of the issuer.
Amount of increase (decrease) of consideration paid in advance for interest that provides economic benefits in future periods.

Obligations not otherwise itemized or categorized in the footnotes to the financial statements that are expected to be paid after one year (or the normal operating cycle, if longer), from the balance sheet date.
Amount of operating expense for products and services of regulated operation.

tlabel: financing receivable, excluding accrued interest, after allowance for credit loss, noncurrent
description: Amortized cost excluding accrued interest, after allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable classified as noncurrent. Excludes net investment in lease.

Obligations not otherwise itemized or categorized in the footnotes to the financial statements that are expected to be paid after one year (or the normal operating cycle, if longer), from the balance sheet date.
Amount of operating expense for products and services of regulated operation.
The interest expense recognized during the period on customer deposits or security deposits held in interest bearing accounts.

tlabel: net investment in lease, after allowance for credit loss
description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases.

tlabel: net investment in lease, allowance for credit loss
description: Amount of allowance for credit loss on net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases.

tlabel: net investment in lease, after allowance for credit loss
description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases.

tlabel: net investment in lease, allowance for credit loss
description: Amount of allowance for credit loss on net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases.

tlabel: income tax effects allocated directly to equity, other
description: The tax effect of items occurring during the period that have been charged or credited directly to components of shareholders' equity and are not otherwise defined.

tlabel: interest income, federal home loan bank advances
description: Amount of interest income from Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) advances to member financial institutions.

Amount of noncash expense included in interest expense to amortize debt discount and premium associated with the related debt instruments. Excludes amortization of financing costs. Alternate captions include noncash interest expense.

The periodic amortization (in proportion to and over the period of estimated net servicing income or loss) of capitalized servicing rights, which contractually entitle the servicer to receive fees and ancillary revenues for performing billing, collection, disbursement and recordkeeping services in connection with a mortgage portfolio. As a noncash expense, this element is added back to net income when calculating cash provided by or used in operations using the indirect method.
Earnings on or other increases in the value of the cash surrender value of bank owned life insurance policies.

tlabel: certificates of deposit, at carrying value
description: A savings certificate entitling the Entity (that is, bearer) to receive interest at an established maturity date, based upon a fixed interest rate. A certificate of deposit may be issued in any denomination. Certificates of deposit are generally issued by commercial banks and, therefore, insured by the FDIC (up to the prescribed limit). Certificates of deposit generally restrict holders from withdrawing funds on demand without the incurrence of penalties. Generally, only certificates of deposit with original maturities of three months or less qualify as cash equivalents. Original maturity means original maturity to the entity holding the investment. As a related example, both a three-month US Treasury bill and a three-year Treasury note purchased three months from maturity qualify as cash equivalents. However, a Treasury note purchased three-years ago does not become a cash equivalent when its remaining maturity is three months.
Amount of current state and local tax expense (benefit) pertaining to income (loss) from continuing operations.
The expense recognized in the current period that allocates the cost of nonproduction tangible assets over their useful lives.

tlabel: expense related to distribution or servicing, underwriting fees
description: Expense related to distribution, servicing and underwriting fees.

tlabel: debt securities, held-to-maturity, amortized cost, before allowance for credit loss
description: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity).
The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in net unamortized loan origination fees and other fees that are collected at origination but recorded as income over the life of the loan.
Amount of increase (decrease) in loans classified as other.
The net cash inflow or outflow for the increase (decrease) associated with investments (not to include restricted cash) that are pledged or subject to withdrawal restrictions.

tlabel: interest income, deposits with financial institutions
description: Interest income derived from funds deposited with both domestic and foreign financial institutions including funds in money market and other accounts.
Amount of operating interest income, including amortization and accretion of premiums and discounts, on securitized, pass-through debt securities collateralized by real estate mortgage loans.
Amount of dividend income on nonoperating securities.

tlabel: mortgage-backed securities available-for-sale, fair value disclosure
description: Fair value of securitized, pay-through debt securities collateralized by real estate mortgage loans classified as available-for-sale.

Amount of liabilities incurred and payable to vendors for goods and services received classified as other, and expenses incurred but not yet paid, payable within one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

tlabel: other comprehensive loss, held-to-maturity security, adjustment from aoci for accretion of noncredit portion of otti, after tax
description: Amount, after tax, of adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive loss for accretion of other than temporary impairment (OTTI) on investment in held-to-maturity security.

tlabel: payment to acquire life insurance policy, operating activities
description: Amount of cash outflow for payment of premium on corporate-owned life insurance policy, classified as operating activities. Includes, but is not limited to, bank-owned life insurance policy.

tlabel: payments for origination, purchases of loans held-for-sale
description: The aggregate amount of cash outflow for loans purchased and created with the intention to resell them in the near future.

tlabel: payments to acquire mortgage backed securities (mbs) categorized as held-to-maturity
description: The cash outflow for the purchase of securities issued by a governmental agency or corporation (for example, GNMA or FHLMC) or by private issuers (for example, banks and mortgage banking enterprises) secured by and repaid from underlying mortgages, which were designated as held to maturity when acquired.
Amount of expense associated with postage.

tlabel: proceeds from maturities, prepayments, calls of held-to-maturity securities
description: The cash inflow associated with the maturity, prepayments and calls (requests for early payments) of debt securities designated as held-to-maturity.

tlabel: proceeds from sale, collection of loans held-for-sale
description: The cash inflow from sale proceeds and collection of repayments from borrowers on loans classified as held-for-sale, including proceeds from loans sold through mortgage securitization; includes mortgages and other types of loans.

tlabel: stock or unit option plan expense
description: Amount of noncash expense for option under share-based payment arrangement.
Amount of dividend income on nonoperating securities.

tlabel: oci, debt securities, available-for-sale, transfer from held-to-maturity, gain (loss), before adjustment, tax
description: Amount, before adjustment, of tax expense (benefit) for unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

tlabel: real estate owned, valuation allowance, amounts applied
description: Amount of the valuation allowance for real estate owned that was applied in the period against the carrying amount of real estate owned that was sold, written down or written off.

Amount of current state and local tax expense (benefit) attributable to income (loss) from continuing operations. Includes, but is not limited to, current regional, territorial, and provincial tax expense (benefit) for non-US (United States of America) jurisdiction.
Amount, before valuation allowance, of financing receivable classified as held-for-sale.
Amount of investment in land held for sale.

tlabel: payments to acquire mortgage-backed securities (mbs), available-for-sale
description: Amount of cash outflow for purchase of mortgage-backed security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

Amount of current state and local tax expense (benefit) attributable to income (loss) from continuing operations. Includes, but is not limited to, current regional, territorial, and provincial tax expense (benefit) for non-US (United States of America) jurisdiction.

tlabel: gain (loss) on sales of mortgage-backed securities (mbs)
description: Net gain (loss) resulting from the sales of securitized, pay-through debt securities collateralized by real estate mortgage loans (mortgages).
Amount of dividend income on nonoperating securities.

tlabel: debt security, mortgage-backed, available-for-sale, fair value disclosure
description: Fair value of securitized, pay-through debt securities collateralized by real estate mortgage loans classified as available-for-sale.

tlabel: other comprehensive loss, held-to-maturity security, adjustment from aoci for accretion of noncredit portion of otti, after tax
description: Amount, after tax, of adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive loss for accretion of other than temporary impairment (OTTI) on investment in held-to-maturity security.

tlabel: payment to acquire life insurance policy, operating activities
description: Amount of cash outflow for payment of premium on corporate-owned life insurance policy, classified as operating activities. Includes, but is not limited to, bank-owned life insurance policy.

tlabel: payments to acquire mortgage-backed securities (mbs) categorized as held-to-maturity
description: The cash outflow for the purchase of securities issued by a governmental agency or corporation (for example, GNMA or FHLMC) or by private issuers (for example, banks and mortgage banking enterprises) secured by and repaid from underlying mortgages, which were designated as held to maturity when acquired.

tlabel: federal home loan bank, advances, general debt obligations, disclosures, collateral pledged
description: Amount of the collateral pledged in support of federal home loan bank advances outstanding.

tlabel: federal home loan bank, advances, general debt obligations, disclosures, collateral pledged
description: Amount of the collateral pledged in support of federal home loan bank advances outstanding.

tlabel: interest income, federal home loan bank advances
description: Amount of interest income from Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) advances to member financial institutions.

tlabel: income tax effects allocated directly to equity, other
description: The tax effect of items occurring during the period that have been charged or credited directly to components of shareholders' equity and are not otherwise defined.

tlabel: other than temporary impairment losses, investments, portion in other comprehensive loss, tax, portion attributable to noncontrolling interest, held-to-maturity securities
description: Amount of tax (expense) benefit of other than temporary impairment (OTTI) on investment in held-to-maturity debt security, recognized in other comprehensive loss, attributable to noncontrolling interest.

tlabel: payments to acquire in process research, development
description: The cash outflows from the purchase of net carrying value allocated to in-process research and development costs and materials acquired in a business combination.

tlabel: cash flows between transferor, transferee, beneficial interest
description: Cash flows between transferee and transferor in payment of the transferor's beneficial interest related to a securitization, asset-backed financing arrangement, or similar transfer in which the transferor has continuing involvement with the transferred financial assets underlying the transaction.

tlabel: cash flows between transferor, transferee, beneficial interest
description: Cash flows between transferee and transferor in payment of the transferor's beneficial interest related to a securitization, asset-backed financing arrangement, or similar transfer in which the transferor has continuing involvement with the transferred financial assets underlying the transaction.

tlabel: equity securities without readily determinable fair value, impairment loss, annual amount
description: Amount of impairment loss on investment in equity security without readily determinable fair value.

tlabel: gain on business interruption insurance recovery
description: The net amount (to the extent disclosed within this portion of the income statement) by which an insurance settlement exceeds incremental costs incurred from the event causing an interruption of business, plus the insurance award for earnings lost from the event, such as a natural catastrophe, explosion or fire.

tlabel: payments of merger related costs, financing activities
description: The cash outflow for financing costs associated with business combinations.
The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in intangible assets (for example patents and licenses).

Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the portion of long-term debt due within one year or the operating cycle if longer identified as Convertible Notes Payable. Convertible Notes Payable is a written promise to pay a note which can be exchanged for a specified amount of another, related security, at the option of the issuer and the holder.

The amount for notes payable (written promise to pay), due to related parties. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable to third parties for oil and gas that has been sold but not delivered. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable to third parties for oil and gas that has been sold but not delivered. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).
Amount of increase (decrease) in loans classified as other.

Amount of liabilities incurred and payable to vendors for goods and services received classified as other, and expenses incurred but not yet paid, payable within one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

tlabel: real estate held for development, sale, net
description: For banks, amount of real estate assets held for development or sale, net of associated liabilities.

tlabel: deferred employee stock ownership plan, issuance of shares or sale of treasury shares
description: The issuance of shares or sale of treasury shares to an Employee Stock Ownership Plan (ESOP).

tlabel: federal home loan bank borrowings, fair value disclosure
description: Fair value portion of borrowing from Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank).

tlabel: other revenue (expense) from real estate operations
description: Amount of other revenue (expense) derived from real estate investments partnerships.

tlabel: deferred employee stock ownership plan, issuance of shares or sale of treasury shares
description: The issuance of shares or sale of treasury shares to an Employee Stock Ownership Plan (ESOP).
Amount of increase (decrease) in debt instruments, classified as other.

tlabel: debt securities, available-for-sale, amortized cost, excluding accrued interest, after allowance for credit loss, current
description: Amortized cost excluding accrued interest, after allowance for credit loss, of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), classified as current.
Amount of government assistance recognized.

tlabel: other comprehensive income (loss), net investment hedge, gain (loss), before reclassification, tax
description: Amount, before tax and reclassification, of gain (loss) from derivative designated and qualifying as net investment hedge.
Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of current portion of long-term loans payable to bank due within one year or the operating cycle if longer.
Amount of other expense that is infrequent in occurrence or unusual in nature.
Amount of gain that is infrequent in occurrence or unusual in nature.

tlabel: unrealized gain (loss) on interest rate cash flow hedges, pretax, accumulated other comprehensive income (loss)
description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) related to the increase or decrease in fair value of interest rate derivatives designated as cash flow hedging instruments, which was recorded in accumulated other comprehensive income to the extent that the cash flow hedge was determined to be effective.
Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of current portion of long-term loans payable to bank due within one year or the operating cycle if longer.
Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of loans from a bank with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer, excluding current portion.
Amount of other expense that is infrequent in occurrence or unusual in nature.
Amount of gain that is infrequent in occurrence or unusual in nature.

tlabel: assets disposed of by method other than sale, in period of disposition, gain (loss) on disposition
description: Amount of gain (loss) from the disposal of an asset through means other than sale, for example, but not limited to, abandonment, spin-off, and expropriation.

The adjustment to exclude the noncash portion of, and include cash payments for environmental costs when calculating operating cash flows under the indirect method. The adjustment can include the increase (decrease) during an accounting period in total estimated obligations recorded for probable future loss attributable to environmental contamination issues.

tlabel: business combination, provisional information, initial accounting incomplete, adjustment, consideration transferred
description: This element represents the amount of any measurement period adjustment (as defined) realized during the reporting period to items of consideration transferred in connection with a business combination for which the initial accounting was incomplete.

tlabel: deferred compensation arrangement with individual, compensation expense
description: The compensation expense recognized during the period pertaining to the deferred compensation arrangement.
Amount of capitalized film cost for film predominantly monetized on its own and films predominantly monetized with other films and license agreements as group.

tlabel: gain (loss) on disposition of stock in subsidiary
description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of equity in securities of subsidiaries.

tlabel: nonmonetary transaction, gross operating revenue recognized
description: The amount of gross operating revenue recognized in a nonmonetary transaction.

Cash payments related to direct negative costs incurred in the physical production of a film, as well as allocations of production overhead and capitalized interest. Examples of direct negative costs include costs of story and scenario; compensation of cast, directors, producers, extras, and miscellaneous staff; costs of set construction and operations, wardrobe, and accessories; costs of sound synchronization; rental facilities on location; and postproduction costs such as music, special effects, and editing.

Amount of asset related to consideration paid in advance for costs that provide economic benefits in future periods, and amount of other assets that are expected to be realized or consumed after one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.
Direct costs arising from transactions with related parties who are not affiliates or joint Ventures. These costs are categorized as cost of goods sold.

tlabel: asset acquisition, contingent consideration, liability, current
description: Amount of liability recognized from contingent consideration in asset acquisition, classified as current.

tlabel: embedded derivative, gain (loss) on embedded derivative, net
description: Net Increase or Decrease in the fair value of the embedded derivative or group of embedded derivatives included in earnings in the period.

tlabel: payments to acquire oil, gas equipment
description: The cash outflow to purchase long lived physical asset use for the normal oil and gas operations and not intended for resale.

tlabel: contract with customer, refund liability, current
description: Amount of liability for consideration received or receivable from customer which is not included in transaction price, when consideration is expected to be refunded to customer, classified as current.

Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of deferred costs capitalized at the end of the reporting period that are expected to be charged against earnings within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.
For an unclassified balance sheet, amounts due from an entity in which the reporting entity shares joint control with another party or group.

tlabel: other comprehensive income (loss), derivative, excluded component, increase (decrease), before adjustments, tax
description: Amount, before tax and adjustments, of gain (loss) from increase (decrease) in value of excluded component of derivative designated and qualifying as hedge. Adjustments include, but are not limited to, reclassifications for sale and settlement, and amounts recognized under systematic and rational method.

This element represents the excess of the cost (face amount, notional amount) of an investment (security, contract) over its fair value which deficiency has not been recognized in earnings of the entity.

Fees paid to advisors who provide certain management support and administrative oversight services including the organization and sale of stock, investment funds, limited partnerships and mutual funds.

tlabel: other oil, gas property, successful effort method
description: Amount of oil and gas properties accounted for using the successful effort method, classified as other.
Amount of deferred income excluding obligation to transfer product and service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable, classified as noncurrent.

Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of long-term unsecured obligations issued by corporations and other borrowers to investors (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer), excluding current portion.
Amount of valuation reserve for inventory.

tlabel: accumulated amortization of debt issuance costs, line of credit arrangements
description: Amount of accumulated amortization of debt issuance costs related to line of credit arrangements.

tlabel: debt issuance costs, line of credit arrangements, net
description: Amount, after accumulated amortization, of debt issuance costs related to line of credit arrangements. Includes, but is not limited to, legal, accounting, underwriting, printing, and registration costs.

tlabel: fair value, liability, recurring basis, still held, unrealized gain (loss)
description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) recognized in income from liability measured at fair value on recurring basis using unobservable input (level 3) and still held.

tlabel: other comprehensive income (loss), net investment hedge, gain (loss), before reclassification, tax
description: Amount, before tax and reclassification, of gain (loss) from derivative designated and qualifying as net investment hedge.

Carrying amount, net of valuation reserves and adjustments, as of the balance sheet date of products used directly or indirectly in the manufacturing or production process, which may or may not become part of the final product. May also include items used in the storage, presentation or transportation of physical goods.
Amount allocated to previously issued preferred shares repurchased by the issuing entity and held in treasury.

The capitalized costs incurred during the period (excluded from amortization) to purchase, lease or otherwise acquire an unproved property, including costs of lease bonuses and options to purchase or lease properties, the portion of costs applicable to minerals when land including mineral rights is purchased in fee, brokers' fees, recording fees, legal costs, and other costs incurred in acquiring properties.
Amount of unrealized gain on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

tlabel: fair value, net derivative asset (liability), recurring basis, still held, unrealized gain (loss)
description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) recognized in income for derivative asset (liability) after deduction of derivative liability (asset), measured at fair value using unobservable input (level 3) and still held.

tlabel: registration payment arrangement, maximum potential consideration
description: Describes the maximum potential amount of consideration, undiscounted, that could be transferred under the registration payment arrangement.
Amount of cost for defined contribution plan.
A segregation of retained earnings which is unavailable for dividend distribution. Includes also retained earnings appropriated for loss contingencies.

tlabel: induced conversion of convertible debt expense
description: Consideration given by issuer of convertible debt to provide an incentive for debt holders to convert the debt to equity securities. The expense is equal to the fair value of all securities and other consideration transferred in the transaction in excess of the fair value of securities issuable pursuant to the original conversion terms.
Face (par) amount of debt instrument at time of issuance.

The amount of expense in the period for fees charged by securities exchanges for the privilege of trading securities listed on that exchange. Some fees vary with the related volume, while others are fixed.

Change in the balance of the gas balancing receivable account. Gas imbalances occur when the entity sells more or less than its entitled ownership percentage of total gas production. If the entity receives less than it is entitled, the underproduction is recorded as a receivable.

tlabel: public utilities, property, plant, equipment, common
description: Period end amount of property, plant and equipment (PPE) related to regulated assets common to business units.

tlabel: public utilities, property, plant, equipment, transmission, distribution
description: Period end amount of property, plant and equipment (PPE) related to transmission and distribution owned by public utility.
The amount of weighted average cost inventory present at the reporting date when inventory is valued using different valuation methods.

tlabel: direct financing lease, net investment in lease, credit loss expense (reversal)
description: Amount of expense (reversal of expense) for expected credit loss on net investment in direct financing lease.

tlabel: preferred units, preferred partners' capital accounts
description: The amount of the preferred partners' ownership interests.

tlabel: increase (decrease) in due from affiliates, current
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in current receivables (due within one year or one operating cycle) to be collected from an entity that is controlling, under the control of, or within the same control group as the reporting entity by means of direct or indirect ownership.

tlabel: net investment in lease, after allowance for credit loss, current
description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases, classified as current.

tlabel: net investment in lease, after allowance for credit loss, noncurrent
description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases, classified as noncurrent.

tlabel: net investment in lease, allowance for credit loss, current
description: Amount of allowance for credit loss on net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases, classified as current.

tlabel: net investment in lease, allowance for credit loss, noncurrent
description: Amount of allowance for credit loss on net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases, classified as noncurrent.

tlabel: stock issued during period, value, stock dividend
description: Value of stock issued to shareholders as a dividend during the period.

tlabel: adjustment of warrants granted for services
description: Adjustment for noncash service expenses paid for by granting of warrants.

tlabel: liability for unpaid claims, claims adjustment expense, incurred claims
description: Amount, after effects of reinsurance, of expense (reversal of expense) for claims incurred and costs incurred in the claim settlement process.

The adjustment to reduce the value of existing agreements that specify the lessee's rights to use the leased property. This expense is charged when the estimates of future profits generated by the leased property are reduced.
Amount of accumulated amortization of leases acquired as part of a real property acquisition at below market lease rate with a finite life.

tlabel: real estate investments, unconsolidated real estate, other joint ventures
description: The carrying amount of investments in unconsolidated real estate and other joint ventures not separately presented. This includes direct and indirect investments.

tlabel: amount of deferred costs related to long-term contracts
description: Amount of deferred costs for long-term contracts and programs. Includes, but is not limited to, initial tooling costs and deferred production costs.
Amount of cost capitalized for award under share-based payment arrangement.
Amount of expense for incentive rights held by the managing member or general partner, of limited liability company (LLC) or limited partnership (LP).

tlabel: participating mortgage loans, participation liabilities, amount
description: The aggregate amount of the participation liability at the end of the accounting period.
Amount of expense (reversal of expense) for expected credit loss on premium receivable.

tlabel: liability, pension, other postretirement, postemployment benefits, current
description: Amount of liability, recognized in statement of financial position, for pension, other postretirement and postemployment benefits, classified as current.
Period expense related to postemployment benefits.

tlabel: settlement of asset retirement obligations through noncash payments, amount
description: Amount of asset retirement obligations settled through noncash transactions. An asset retirement obligation is a legal obligation associated with the disposal or retirement from service of a tangible long-lived asset.

tlabel: malpractice loss contingency, accrual, undiscounted, noncurrent
description: Amount of the noncurrent portion of the accrued liability on an undiscounted basis for malpractice claims (including general and professional liability).
The amount of cash paid for royalties during the current period.
Amount of accumulated amortization of asset recognized from cost incurred to obtain or fulfill contract with customer.
Amount of debt discount to be amortized after one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

tlabel: sec schedule, 12-29, real estate companies, investment in mortgage loans on real estate, new mortgage loan
description: Amount of increase in mortgage loan on real estate by entity with substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate or interest in real estate, from new investment.

tlabel: payments to acquire partners interest in real estate partnership, net of cash acquired
description: The cash outflow from the purchase of ownership in a partnership, the purpose of which is to construct, sell, hold or invest in real estate.
The amount of revenue derived from managing real estate properties.
Current portion of reclamation reserve to restore a mining or drilling site to the condition agreed upon within the mining or drilling contract.

tlabel: foreign currency cash flow hedge gain (loss) reclassified to earnings, net
description: The amount of net gains or losses on foreign currency cash flow hedges reclassified during the period to earnings from accumulated other comprehensive income upon the hedged transaction affecting earnings.

tlabel: gain (loss) on foreign currency cash flow hedge ineffectiveness
description: The net gain (loss) during the reporting period due to ineffectiveness in foreign currency cash flow hedges. Recognized in earnings.

tlabel: construction contractor, receivable, excluding contract retainage, year one
description: Amount of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer under long-term contract or program when right to consideration is unconditional, excluding amount withheld under retainage provision in contract, to be collected in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable for statutory payroll taxes incurred through that date and withheld from employees pertaining to services received from them, including entity's matching share of the employees FICA taxes and contributions to the state and federal unemployment insurance programs. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

tlabel: adjustment for long-term intercompany transactions, net of tax
description: Current period adjustment resulting from gains and losses on intercompany foreign currency transactions that are of a long-term-investment nature because settlement is not planned or anticipated in the foreseeable future. Resulting from the entities to the transaction being consolidated, combined, or accounted for by the equity method in the reporting entity's financial statements.

tlabel: adjustment for long-term intercompany transactions, tax expense (benefit)
description: Amount of tax expense (benefit) related to gain (loss) on intercompany foreign currency transactions that are of a long-term-investment nature or settlement is not planned or anticipated in the foreseeable future.

tlabel: disposal group, including discontinued operation, deferred tax assets
description: Amount classified as deferred tax assets attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of.

tlabel: other comprehensive income (loss), derivative, excluded component, increase (decrease), after adjustments, before tax
description: Amount, before tax and after adjustments, of gain (loss) from increase (decrease) in value of excluded component of derivative designated and qualifying as hedge. Adjustments include, but are not limited to, reclassifications for sale and settlement, and amounts recognized under systematic and rational method.

tlabel: gain (loss) on sale of interest in projects
description: Gain (loss) included in earnings resulting from the sale of interest in projects.
The cash outflow from the amount invested for projects in hopes of getting a future return or interest from it.

tlabel: proceeds from (repurchase of) redeemable preferred stock
description: Cash inflows (outflows) from issuing and redeeming redeemable preferred stock; includes convertible and nonconvertible redeemable preferred stock.
Amount of amortization of nuclear fuel.

Carrying amount of reserve for known or estimated probable loss from litigation, which may include attorneys' fees and other litigation costs, which is expected to be paid within one year of the date of the statement of financial position.

tlabel: public utilities, property, plant, equipment, amount of construction work in process included in rate base
description: Discloses the amount of construction work in process that is included in the rate making process at period end.
Total of noncurrent other assets held by public utility entities.
Amount of operating expense for impairments of regulated operation.
Amount of cost capitalized for award under share-based payment arrangement.

Current portion of the total carrying amount as of the balance sheet date due within one year or the operating cycle, if longer, on all notes payable to banks paid on an installment with long term maturities. This can include the amount of any loans from the applicant firm. This does not, however, include any mortgage balances.
Amount before accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization of other physical assets used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale.

All taxes not related to income of the entity or excise or sales taxes levied on the revenue of the entity that are not reported elsewhere. These taxes could include production, real estate, personal property, and pump tax.

tlabel: business combination, consideration transferred, liabilities incurred
description: Amount of liabilities incurred by the acquirer as part of consideration transferred in a business combination.

tlabel: debt securities, held-to-maturity, excluding accrued interest, after allowance for credit loss, current
description: Amount excluding accrued interest, after allowance for credit loss, of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), classified as current.
Amount of realized gain (loss) on investment in marketable security, including other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI).
Amount of consideration paid in advance for supplies that provide economic benefits within a future period of one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

tlabel: property, plant,, equipment, lessor asset under operating lease, before accumulated depreciation
description: Amount, before accumulated depreciation, of lessor's underlying asset for which right to use has been conveyed to lessee under operating lease.
Amount of accumulated amortization of debt issuance costs.

tlabel: proceeds from secured lines of credit
description: The cash inflow from a contractual arrangement with the lender, including letter of credit, standby letter of credit and revolving credit arrangements, under which borrowings can be made up to a specific amount at any point in time with either short term or long term maturity that is collateralized (backed by pledge, mortgage or other lien in the entity's assets).

tlabel: gain on business interruption insurance recovery
description: The net amount (to the extent disclosed within this portion of the income statement) by which an insurance settlement exceeds incremental costs incurred from the event causing an interruption of business, plus the insurance award for earnings lost from the event, such as a natural catastrophe, explosion or fire.
Amount of increase (decrease) in partners' capital classified as other.

This element represents those amounts set aside for the repair and replacement of real or personal property in the foreseen future. Such amount may be funded from sales revenue (for example; timeshare sales) or operating revenues; in a lump sum or installments (such as monthly); as per internal policy (for example: hotel operators), as required by contractual agreement (for example: sales contract); or by the terms of debt agreements.

tlabel: adjustments to additional paid in capital, stock split
description: Amount of decrease in additional paid in capital (APIC) resulting from a stock split in which per-share par value or stated value is not changed proportionately.
The aggregate costs of direct communications and utilities incurred during the reporting period.
Amount of tax incurred and cost of license directly related to good produced or service rendered.
Amount before accumulated depreciation of additions or improvements to assets held under a lease arrangement.
Insurance and claims costs directly related to goods produced and sold, or services rendered, during the reporting period.

Carrying amount of accrued known and estimated losses incurred as of the balance sheet date for which no insurance coverage exists, and for which a claim has been made or is probable of being asserted, typically arising from workmen's compensation-type of incidents and personal injury to nonemployees from accidents on the entity's property that are expected to be paid within one year (or the normal operating cycle, if longer).

tlabel: energy related inventory, crude oil, products, merchandise
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of finished goods inventories for petroleum products, crude oil, petrochemical products, and other oil and gas inventories.

Including the current and noncurrent portions, carrying amount of debt identified as being convertible into another form of financial instrument (typically the entity's common stock) as of the balance sheet date, which originally required full repayment more than twelve months after issuance or greater than the normal operating cycle of the company.

tlabel: derivative instruments, gain recognized in income, ineffective portion, amount excluded from effectiveness testing
description: The portion of gains on derivative instruments designated and qualifying as hedging instruments representing (a) the amount of the hedge ineffectiveness and (b) the amount, if any, excluded from the assessment of hedge effectiveness.

Amount of increase (decrease) in direct negative costs incurred in the physical production of a film. Examples include, but are not limited to, costs of story and scenario, compensation, set construction and postproduction costs.

tlabel: statutory accounting practices, retained earnings not available for dividends
description: The amount of retained earnings as of the balance sheet date that cannot be distributed to stockholders pursuant to statutory rules and regulations.

tlabel: convertible preferred stock converted to other securities
description: Value of convertible preferred stock that was converted to other securities.
Interest expense on all foreign deposits.
Cash inflow representing an adjustment to the purchase price of a previous acquisition.

tlabel: cash, cash equivalents, restricted cash,, restricted cash equivalents, disposal group, including discontinued operations
description: Amount of cash and cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage; attributable to disposal group, including, but not limited to, discontinued operations. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.
Amount, after accumulated amortization, of debt discount (premium).

The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the value of the asset or liability created by an over or under recovery. An over under-recovery means that the basic energy price based on the daily product price and exchange rate is less (over) or more (under) than the basic energy price used in the calculation of the monthly retail energy product.

tlabel: business combination, step acquisition, equity interest in acquiree, remeasurement gain (loss), net
description: In a business combination achieved in stages, this element represents the amount of net gain (loss) recognized by the entity as a result of remeasuring to fair value the equity interest in the acquiree it held before the business combination.

tlabel: aoci before tax, attributable to parent
description: Amount before tax of increase (decrease) in accumulated equity from transactions and other events and circumstances from non-owner sources, attributable to parent. Excludes net income (loss), and accumulated changes in equity from transactions resulting from investments by owners (distributions to owners).
Amount of sublease income excluding finance and operating lease expense.

tlabel: payments for repurchase of initial public offering
description: The cash outflow associated with the repurchase of amount received from entity's first offering of stock to the public.

tlabel: proceeds from issuance of redeemable convertible preferred stock
description: The cash inflow from issuance of callable preferred stock which is identified as being convertible to another type of financial security at the option of the issuer or the holder.
The cost for fuel, incurred during the period, before considering the impacts of any related hedging activities.

Amount of unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) and investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading).

tlabel: financing receivable, allowance for credit loss, recovery
description: Amount of increase in allowance for credit loss on financing receivable from recovery.

tlabel: partners' capital account, treasury units, reissued
description: Value of units that were previously issued and then were repurchased and classified as treasury units. This element represents the monetary value of these units which were reissued during the period.

tlabel: proceeds from sale of land held-for-investment
description: The cash inflow from the sale of land held for investment; excludes sales of land held as inventory or productive use.

tlabel: common stock issued, employee trust, deferred
description: Aggregate value of common stock held in a trust that has been set up specifically to accumulate stock for the sole purpose of distribution to participating employees but not yet earned.
Amount of liability recognized from contingent consideration in asset acquisition.
Amount of the entity's equity method investment which has been sold.

tlabel: other comprehensive income (loss), reclassification adjustment from aoci for investment transferred from available-for-sale to equity method, tax
description: Amount of tax expense (benefit) for reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income (loss) for unrealized gain (loss) of investment classified as available-for-sale transferred to equity method.

tlabel: direct financing lease, net investment in lease, before allowance for credit loss
description: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of net investment in direct financing lease.

tlabel: interest rate derivative assets, at fair value
description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of interest rate derivative assets, which includes all such derivative instruments in hedging and nonhedging relationships that are recognized as assets.

tlabel: sales-type lease, net investment in lease, before allowance for credit loss
description: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of net investment in sales-type lease.

tlabel: contract with customer, receivable, after allowance for credit loss, current
description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right to consideration is unconditional, classified as current.

tlabel: contract with customer, receivable, after allowance for credit loss, noncurrent
description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right to consideration is unconditional, classified as noncurrent.

tlabel: contract with customer, receivable, allowance for credit loss, current
description: Amount of allowance for credit loss for right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right to consideration is unconditional, classified as current.

tlabel: contract with customer, receivable, allowance for credit loss, noncurrent
description: Amount of allowance for credit loss for right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right to consideration is unconditional, classified as noncurrent.

tlabel: contract with customer, receivable, before allowance for credit loss, current
description: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right to consideration is unconditional, classified as current.

tlabel: contract with customer, receivable, before allowance for credit loss, noncurrent
description: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right to consideration is unconditional, classified as noncurrent.

Including the current and noncurrent portions, carrying value as of the balance sheet date of a written promise to pay a note, initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer, which can be exchanged for a specified amount of one or more securities (typically common stock), at the option of the issuer or the holder.

tlabel: business combination, separately recognized transactions, expenses, losses recognized
description: The expenses and losses recorded for each transaction with the acquiree that was recognized separately from the acquisition of assets and assumptions of liabilities in the business combination.

tlabel: increase (decrease) in due from employee, current
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amount due within one year (or one business cycle) from employees for floats, allowances and loans (generally evidenced by promissory notes).
Total costs accrued as of the balance sheet date for environmental loss contingencies.

tlabel: mortgage loan related to property sales
description: Mortgage loan related to property sales in noncash investing and financing activities.

tlabel: proceeds from issuance of redeemable preferred stock
description: The cash inflow from issuance of preferred stock that is classified as callable.

tlabel: other comprehensive income (loss), net investment hedge, gain (loss), reclassification, before tax
description: Amount, before tax, of reclassification from accumulated other comprehensive income (AOCI) for gain (loss) from derivative designated and qualifying as net investment hedge.
Amount of accelerated depreciation charged against earnings associated with exit from or disposal of business activities or restructuring plan.

tlabel: securities borrowed, fair value of collateral
description: Fair value of the securities received as collateral against securities borrowed.

This element represents the noncurrent portion of investments which are not defined as or included in marketable (debt, equity, or other) securities that are pledged or subject to withdrawal restrictions.

tlabel: cash acquired in excess of payments to acquire business
