The change during the period, either increase or decrease, in total debt and equity financial instruments including: (1) securities held-to-maturity, (2) trading securities, and (3) securities available-for-sale that are pledged to one or more secured parties who have the right to buy, sell, or re-pledge the collateral.

For the asset that is reclassified back to held and use from held-for-sale, the depreciation expense recognized when the asset is reclassified. This represents the difference between the carrying value at the time the decision to reclassify is made and the carrying amount that the asset would have had if it had never been classified as held for sale (including consideration of depreciation expense).

tlabel: discontinued operation, amounts of material contingent liabilities remaining
description: Amounts of material contingent liabilities, for example, but not limited to, product or environmental liabilities or litigation, that remain with the entity despite the disposal of the disposal group that is classified as a component of the entity.

tlabel: business combination, recognized identifiable assets acquired, liabilities assumed, current liabilities, long-term debt
description: Amount of long-term debt due within one year or within the normal operating cycle, if longer, assumed at the acquisition date.

tlabel: certain loans acquired in transfer accounted for as debt securities, accretable yield, disposals of loans
description: Sale or transfer of a loan during the period resulting in a reduction in the excess of a loan's cash flows expected to be collected over the investor's initial investment. This relates to loans accounted for as debt securities, with evidence of deterioration of credit quality since origination that was acquired by completion of a transfer for which it is probable, at acquisition, that the investor will be unable to collect all contractually required payments receivable.

tlabel: increase (decrease) in payable for investment purchased
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in payable for purchase of investment.

tlabel: sec schedule, 12-28, real estate companies, investment in real estate, accumulated depreciation, depreciation expense
description: Amount of depreciation expense of real estate investments for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

tlabel: sec schedule, 12-28, real estate companies, investment in real estate, accumulated depreciation, depreciation expense
description: Amount of depreciation expense of real estate investments for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

tlabel: credit risk derivative liabilities, at fair value
description: Fair value of credit risk derivative liability.

The estimated amount as of the balance sheet date to be received by an insurer from the sale of property (usually damaged) on which the insurer has paid a total claim to the insured and has obtained title to the property and the right of an insurer to pursue any course of recovery of damages, in its name or in the name of the policyholder, against a third party who is liable for costs relating to an insured event that have been paid by the insurer. Estimated salvage and subrogation is generally deducted from the liability for unpaid claims.
Carrying amount due after one year of the balance sheet date (or one operating cycle, if longer) of amounts due under the terms of governmental, corporate, or foundation grants.

tlabel: noncash or part noncash acquisition, net nonmonetary assets acquired (liabilities assumed)
description: The net book value of a nonmonetary asset transferred or exchanged in connection with the acquisition of a business or asset in a noncash transaction. Noncash is defined as transactions during a period that affect recognized assets or liabilities but that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. "Part noncash" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. Nonmonetary assets and liabilities are assets and liabilities that will not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the future.
Represents total insurance tax expense reflected in the income statement for each period presented.
Amount of interest earning assets classified as other.
Amount of interest earning assets classified as other.
Value of capital units or capital shares. This element is relevant to issuers of face-amount certificates and registered investment companies.

tlabel: securitization or asset-backed financing arrangement, financial asset for which transfer is accounted as sale, gain (loss) on sale
description: Reflects, by transferred financial asset type, the amount of sales proceeds in excess of or deficient from the sum of the carrying amounts of transferred financial assets plus transaction costs, including those transactions in which the seller/transferor has continuing involvement with the financial assets that have been transferred.

tlabel: securitization or asset-backed financing arrangement, financial asset for which transfer is accounted as sale, gain (loss) on sale
description: Reflects, by transferred financial asset type, the amount of sales proceeds in excess of or deficient from the sum of the carrying amounts of transferred financial assets plus transaction costs, including those transactions in which the seller/transferor has continuing involvement with the financial assets that have been transferred.
Amount receivable from correspondent broker-dealer.

tlabel: other-than-temporary impairment loss, debt securities, available-for-sale, portion in other comprehensive loss, before tax, including portion attributable to noncontrolling interest
description: Amount, before tax, of other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), recognized in other comprehensive income (OCI).

tlabel: other than temporary impairment losses, investments, portion in other comprehensive loss, net of tax, portion attributable to parent, available-for-sale securities
description: Amount after tax of other than temporary impairment (OTTI) on investment in available-for-sale debt security, recognized in other comprehensive loss, attributable to parent entity.
The cash outflow for cost incurred in the modification of term of existing debt agreement in order for the entity to achieve some advantage.

tlabel: income tax expense (benefit), continuing operations, adjustment of deferred tax (asset) liability
description: Amount of income tax expense (benefit) from continuing operations attributable to an adjustment of a deferred tax liability or asset for enacted changes in tax laws or rates or a change in the tax status of the entity.

tlabel: income tax expense (benefit), continuing operations, adjustment of deferred tax (asset) liability
description: Amount of income tax expense (benefit) from continuing operations attributable to an adjustment of a deferred tax liability or asset for enacted changes in tax laws or rates or a change in the tax status of the entity.
Amount of unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt and equity securities.

tlabel: payment to acquire life insurance policy, investing activities
description: Amount of cash outflow for payment of premium on corporate-owned life insurance policy, classified as investing activities. Includes, but is not limited to, bank-owned life insurance policy.

tlabel: distributions payable to real estate partnerships
description: The cash outflow or inflow increase (decrease) in distribution due to real estate partnership based upon payments and accruals.

tlabel: proceeds from divestiture of real estate partnership
description: The cash inflow from the sale of interest in partnership during the period.

tlabel: distributions payable to real estate partnerships
description: The cash outflow or inflow increase (decrease) in distribution due to real estate partnership based upon payments and accruals.
Total change in each class of partners' capital accounts during the year due to option exercise. All partners include general, limited and preferred partners.

tlabel: proceeds from divestiture of real estate partnership
description: The cash inflow from the sale of interest in partnership during the period.

tlabel: oci, equity method investment, after tax, parent
description: Amount, after tax, of other comprehensive income (loss) (OCI) for proportionate share of equity method investee's OCI, attributable to parent.
Losses recognized in the current period on contracts which are expected to generate losses, which are probable and can be reasonably estimated, in a future period.

tlabel: discontinued operation, amount of adjustment to prior period gain (loss) on disposal, net of tax
description: Amount after tax of an increase (decrease) to a gain (loss) previously reported in discontinued operations in a prior period.

tlabel: interest income, operating, paid in kind
description: Amount of interest income from investment paid in kind, classified as operating.

tlabel: liability, defined benefit pension plan, current
description: Amount of liability, recognized in statement of financial position, for defined benefit pension plan, classified as current. Excludes other postretirement benefit plan.

Including the current and noncurrent portions, aggregate carrying value as of the balance sheet date of loans payable (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer).

tlabel: unrecognized tax benefits that would impact effective tax rate
description: The total amount of unrecognized tax benefits that, if recognized, would affect the effective tax rate.
Amount for accounts payable to related parties. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).
Amount of receivables arising from transactions with related parties due within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

tlabel: due from other related parties, noncurrent (deprecated 2023)
description: Amount receivable from related parties classified as other, due after one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), and investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading), classified as current.

tlabel: discontinued operation, income (loss) from discontinued operation during phase-out period, before income tax
description: Amount before tax of income (loss) from operations classified as a discontinued operation. Excludes gain (loss) on disposal and provision for gain (loss) until its disposal.

tlabel: contract with customer, receivable, credit loss expense (reversal)
description: Amount of expense (reversal of expense) for expected credit loss on right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right to consideration is unconditional.

tlabel: other comprehensive income (loss), reclassification adjustment from aoci for investment transferred from available-for-sale to equity method, after tax
description: Amount, after tax, of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income (loss) for unrealized gain (loss) of investment classified as available-for-sale transferred to equity method.

tlabel: other comprehensive income (loss), reclassification adjustment from aoci for investment transferred from available-for-sale to equity method, after tax
description: Amount, after tax, of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income (loss) for unrealized gain (loss) of investment classified as available-for-sale transferred to equity method.
Amount of interest expense incurred on a debt or other obligation to related party.

tlabel: business combination, recognized identifiable assets acquired, liabilities assumed, intangible assets, other than goodwill
description: Amount of intangible assets, excluding goodwill, acquired at the acquisition date.

tlabel: business combination, recognized identifiable assets acquired, liabilities assumed, noncurrent liabilities, long-term debt
description: Amount of long-term debt due after one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer, assumed at the acquisition date.
Cash inflow received in association with a commitment to issue a mortgage.

The amount of expense in the period for fees charged by securities exchanges for the privilege of trading securities listed on that exchange. Some fees vary with the related volume, while others are fixed.
Fair value of Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) advances carried under the fair value option.

tlabel: office of finance, cost assessed on federal home loan bank
description: Amount of a Federal Home Loan Bank's (FHLBank) proportionate share of the costs of operating the Office of Finance.
Amount of income earned, after hedging basis adjustments, from fees charged for prepayment of certain Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) advances before original maturity.

tlabel: regulator expenses, cost assessed on federal home loan bank
description: Amount of fees or assessments to fund the operations of the regulator of Federal Home Loan Banks (FHLBanks).

tlabel: accumulated other comprehensive income (loss), before federal home loan bank assessments
description: Amount, before Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) assessment, of accumulated increase (decrease) in equity from transaction and other event and circumstance from nonowner source.
Fair value of Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) advances carried under the fair value option.
Amount of expense for Affordable Housing Program (AHP) assessments required by the Federal Home Loan Bank Act of 1932.

tlabel: comprehensive income (loss), net of federal home loan bank assessments, attributable to parent
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in equity after Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) assessments from transactions and other events and circumstances from non-owner sources attributable to the reporting entity. Includes changes in equity except those resulting from investments by owners and distributions to owners. Excludes transactions directly or indirectly attributable to that ownership interest in subsidiary equity which is not attributable to the parent.
Amount of Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) advances to member financial institutions.

tlabel: federal home loan bank, consolidated obligations, bonds
description: Amount of joint and several obligations consisting of bonds issued by Federal Home Loan Banks (FHLBanks).

tlabel: federal home loan bank, consolidated obligations, discount notes
description: Amount of joint and several obligations consisting of discount notes issued by Federal Home Loan Banks (FHLBanks).
Interest expense incurred during the reporting period on capital securities issued by the reporting entity.

tlabel: net income (loss) attributable to parent, net of federal home loan bank assessments
description: Amount of profit (loss) after Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) assessments attributable to the parent.

tlabel: net shares reclassified to mandatorily redeemable capital stock, value
description: Value of net shares reclassified to mandatorily redeemable capital stock.

tlabel: office of finance, cost assessed on federal home loan bank
description: Amount of a Federal Home Loan Bank's (FHLBank) proportionate share of the costs of operating the Office of Finance.

tlabel: regulator expenses, cost assessed on federal home loan bank
description: Amount of fees or assessments to fund the operations of the regulator of Federal Home Loan Banks (FHLBanks).
Amount of increase (decrease) of consideration paid in advance for royalties that provide economic benefits in future periods.

The amount paid to music publishers, record producers, songwriters, or other artists in advance of their earning royalties from record or music sales. Such an amount is based on contractual terms and is generally nonrefundable. This amount is expected to be consumed within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

tlabel: defined benefit plan, net periodic benefit cost (credit), gain (loss) due to settlement
description: Amount of gain (loss) recognized in net periodic benefit (cost) credit from irrevocable action relieving primary responsibility for benefit obligation and eliminating risk related to obligation and assets used to effect settlement.

The current cash, cash equivalents and investments that are restricted as to withdrawal or usage. Restrictions may include legally restricted deposits held as compensating balances against short-term borrowing arrangements, contracts entered into with others, or entity statements of intention with regard to particular deposits; however, time deposits and short-term certificates of deposit are not generally included in legally restricted deposits. Excludes compensating balance arrangements that are not agreements which legally restrict the use of cash amounts shown on the balance sheet. Includes current cash equivalents and investments that are similarly restricted as to withdrawal, usage or disposal.

The noncurrent cash, cash equivalents and investments that is restricted as to withdrawal or usage. Restrictions may include legally restricted deposits held as compensating balances against borrowing arrangements, contracts entered into with others, or entity statements of intention with regard to particular deposits classified as long-term; that is not expected to be released from such existing restrictions within one year of the balance sheet date or operating cycle, whichever is longer. Excludes compensating balance arrangements that are not agreements which legally restrict the use of cash amounts shown on the balance sheet. Includes noncurrent cash equivalents and investments that are similarly restricted as to withdrawal, usage or disposal.

tlabel: repayments of debt, maturing in more than three months
description: The cash outflow from a repayment of a borrowing having initial term of repayment of more than three months. Includes repayments of short-term and long-term debt.

tlabel: loans from other federal home loan banks
description: Amount of Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) loans from another FHLBank.

tlabel: loans to other federal home loan banks
description: Amount of Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) loans to another FHLBank.

tlabel: payments for bonds transferred to other federal home loan banks
description: Amount of cash outflow from transfers and assumptions of primary liability of consolidated obligations to another Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank).

Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), and investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading), classified as current.

tlabel: proceeds from bonds transferred from other federal home loan banks
description: Amount of cash inflow from transfers and assumptions of primary liability for consolidated obligations of another Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank).

tlabel: fair value, option, credit risk, gains (losses) on assets
description: This item represents the estimated amount of gains or losses included in earnings during the period attributable to changes in instrument-specific credit risk arising from loans and other receivables held as assets.

tlabel: fair value, option, credit risk, gains (losses) on assets
description: This item represents the estimated amount of gains or losses included in earnings during the period attributable to changes in instrument-specific credit risk arising from loans and other receivables held as assets.

tlabel: increase (decrease) in deposits with other federal home loan banks
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in interest-bearing funds deposited into another Federal Home Loan Banks (FHLBanks).

tlabel: proceeds from bonds transferred from other federal home loan banks
description: Amount of cash inflow from transfers and assumptions of primary liability for consolidated obligations of another Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank).

tlabel: deposits with other federal home loan banks
description: Amount of interest-bearing funds deposited into another Federal Home Loan Banks (FHLBanks).

tlabel: deposits with other federal home loan banks
description: Amount of interest-bearing funds deposited into another Federal Home Loan Banks (FHLBanks).

tlabel: payments for bonds transferred to other federal home loan banks
description: Amount of cash outflow from transfers and assumptions of primary liability of consolidated obligations to another Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank).

tlabel: other comprehensive loss, held-to-maturity security, adjustment from aoci for accretion of noncredit portion of otti, before tax
description: Amount, before tax, of adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive loss for accretion of other than temporary impairment (OTTI) on investment in held-to-maturity security.

tlabel: derivative liability, subject to master netting arrangement, collateral, right to reclaim security not offset
description: Amount of right to receive securities collateral under master netting arrangements that have not been offset against derivative liabilities.

tlabel: debt securities, held-to-maturity, sold, realized gain (loss)
description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), including other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI).

tlabel: derivative liability, subject to master netting arrangement, collateral, right to reclaim security not offset
description: Amount of right to receive securities collateral under master netting arrangements that have not been offset against derivative liabilities.

tlabel: debt securities, held-to-maturity, sold, realized gain (loss)
description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), including other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI).

tlabel: other comprehensive loss, held-to-maturity security, adjustment from aoci for accretion of noncredit portion of otti, before tax
description: Amount, before tax, of adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive loss for accretion of other than temporary impairment (OTTI) on investment in held-to-maturity security.
Amount of income earned, after hedging basis adjustments, from fees charged for prepayment of certain Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) advances before original maturity.

tlabel: oci, liability for future policy benefit, gain (loss), after reclassification adjustment, tax
description: Amount, after reclassification adjustment, of tax expense (benefit) for unrealized gain (loss) from (increase) decrease in liability for future policy benefit from change in discount rate.

tlabel: disposal group, including discontinued operation, other liabilities, noncurrent
description: Amount classified as other liabilities attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of beyond one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.
The value of gas balancing asset or liability as of the end of the period.

Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable to an underproduced working interest owner when an overproduced working interest owner has sold gas in excess of the party's ownership percentage. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

tlabel: inventory, gas in storage underground, noncurrent
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of natural gas stored underground in depleted gas reservoirs, aquifers, or salt caverns to meet future seasonal and peak load demands and also as insurance against unforeseen supply disruptions, and deemed to be a noncurrent asset because it is not expected to be used within 12 months or in the normal operating cycle.
The value of gas balancing asset or liability as of the end of the period.

Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable to an underproduced working interest owner when an overproduced working interest owner has sold gas in excess of the party's ownership percentage. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

tlabel: inventory, gas in storage underground, noncurrent
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of natural gas stored underground in depleted gas reservoirs, aquifers, or salt caverns to meet future seasonal and peak load demands and also as insurance against unforeseen supply disruptions, and deemed to be a noncurrent asset because it is not expected to be used within 12 months or in the normal operating cycle.

tlabel: accumulated amortization, debt issuance costs, noncurrent
description: Amount of accumulated amortization of debt issuance costs classified as noncurrent.

tlabel: accumulated amortization, debt issuance costs, noncurrent
description: Amount of accumulated amortization of debt issuance costs classified as noncurrent.

tlabel: property, plant,, equipment, excluding lessor asset under operating lease, accumulated depreciation
description: Amount, excluding lessor's underlying asset for which right to use has been conveyed to lessee under operating lease, of accumulated amortization, depreciation, depletion for physical asset used in normal conduct of business to create and distribute product and service.

tlabel: property, plant,, equipment, excluding lessor asset under operating lease, accumulated depreciation
description: Amount, excluding lessor's underlying asset for which right to use has been conveyed to lessee under operating lease, of accumulated amortization, depreciation, depletion for physical asset used in normal conduct of business to create and distribute product and service.

Amount of accumulated impairment loss for an asset representing future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

tlabel: inventory, raw materials, purchased parts, net of reserves
description: Carrying amount, net of valuation reserves and adjustments, as of the balance sheet date of items purchased for use as components of a finished product or pieces of machinery and equipment plus any items in their natural and unrefined state. This element may be used when the reporting entity combines raw materials and purchased parts into an aggregate amount.

tlabel: sec schedule, 12-09, valuation allowances, reserves, deduction
description: Amount of decrease in valuation and qualifying accounts and reserves.
Net amount applicable to investors of capital units or shares.
Amount of distribution payable to ownership interest holder from investment income and return of capital.
Amount of distribution payable to ownership interest holder from investment income and return of capital.
Amount payable to correspondent broker-dealer.
The increase (decrease) during the period in the amount of participation liabilities.
Amount of increase (decrease) in interest expense on long-term debt.
The increase (decrease) during the period in the amount of participation liabilities.
Amount of dividend distribution from ordinary income and capital gain. Excludes distribution for tax return of capital.
Amount of registration fee expense for issuance of shares or units.

tlabel: investment company, shareholder service fee expense
description: Amount of expense for shareholder services. Includes, but is not limited to, fee and expense for transfer and dividend disbursing agent.

tlabel: investment sold, not yet purchased, at fair value
description: Value of the short position.

tlabel: securities loaned, fair value of collateral
description: Fair value of the securities pledged as collateral against securities loaned.

tlabel: increase (decrease) in payable for investment purchased
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in payable for purchase of investment.
Amount of tax expense (benefit) on investment income classified as operating. Excludes realized and unrealized gain (loss) on investment.
Amount of realized gain on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

tlabel: loss from hedged firm commitment not qualifying as fair value hedge
description: Amount of loss recognized in earnings when a hedged firm commitment no longer qualifies as a fair value hedge.
Amount of patronage earnings withheld by agricultural cooperatives from distributions and allocated to patrons' capital accounts.
Amount of loss recognized on firm purchase commitment for inventory.

tlabel: loss from hedged firm commitment not qualifying as fair value hedge
description: Amount of loss recognized in earnings when a hedged firm commitment no longer qualifies as a fair value hedge.
Amount of patronage earnings retained within the agricultural cooperative.

tlabel: interest income, financing receivable, before allowance for credit loss
description: Amount of interest income from financing receivable before allowance for credit loss.

tlabel: interest income, financing receivable, before allowance for credit loss
description: Amount of interest income from financing receivable before allowance for credit loss.

tlabel: accumulated amortization of other deferred costs
description: Accumulated amortization of other deferred costs capitalized at the end of the reporting period. Does not include deferred finance costs, deferred acquisition costs of insurance companies, or deferred leasing costs for real estate operations.
Amount, before accumulated amortization, of debt issuance costs classified as current. Includes, but is not limited to, legal, accounting, underwriting, printing, and registration costs.
The cumulative amount of offering costs allocated to the general partner.
Amount of profit (loss) for sales-type lease and (loss) for direct financing lease recognized at commencement.

tlabel: current year claims, claims adjustment expense
description: Amount, after effects of reinsurance, of expense for claims incurred in the current reporting period and related claims settlement costs.

tlabel: prior year claims, claims adjustment expense
description: Amount, after effects of reinsurance, of expense (reversal of expense) for claims incurred in prior reporting periods and related claims settlement costs.

tlabel: oci, liability for future policy benefit, gain (loss), reclassification adjustment from aoci, after tax
description: Amount, after tax, of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income (loss) (AOCI) for gain (loss) from (increase) decrease in liability for future policy benefit from change in discount rate.

tlabel: current year claims, claims adjustment expense
description: Amount, after effects of reinsurance, of expense for claims incurred in the current reporting period and related claims settlement costs.

tlabel: prior year claims, claims adjustment expense
description: Amount, after effects of reinsurance, of expense (reversal of expense) for claims incurred in prior reporting periods and related claims settlement costs.

tlabel: capitalized interest costs, including allowance for funds used during construction
description: Amount of interest capitalized, including amount of allowance for funds used during construction.

tlabel: capitalized interest costs, including allowance for funds used during construction
description: Amount of interest capitalized, including amount of allowance for funds used during construction.

tlabel: servicing asset at amortized cost, other changes that affect balance, amount
description: Amount of other increase (decrease) to contract to service financial assets under which the benefits of servicing are expected to more than adequately compensate the servicer.

tlabel: servicing asset at amortized cost, other changes that affect balance, amount
description: Amount of other increase (decrease) to contract to service financial assets under which the benefits of servicing are expected to more than adequately compensate the servicer.
Amount of patronage earnings retained within the agricultural cooperative.

tlabel: increase (decrease) in earnest money deposits outstanding
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amount of deposits given by the reporting entity to a seller which shows that the prospective buyer is serious about purchasing a property.

tlabel: share-based compensation arrangement by share-based payment award, options, outstanding, intrinsic value
description: Amount by which the current fair value of the underlying stock exceeds the exercise price of options outstanding.
Amount of difference between fair value of the underlying shares reserved for issuance and exercise price of vested portions of options outstanding and currently exercisable.

tlabel: deferred tax assets, net of valuation allowance
description: Amount after allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences and carryforwards.

tlabel: unrealized gain (loss) on marketable securities, cost method investments,, other investments
description: The aggregate net change in the difference between the fair value and the carrying value, or in the comparative fair values, of marketable securities categorized as trading held at each balance sheet date, that was included in earnings for the period, which may have arisen from (a) securities classified as trading, (b) the unrealized holding gain (loss) on held-to-maturity securities transferred to the trading security category, and (c) the cumulative unrealized gain (loss) which was included in other comprehensive income (a separate component of shareholders' equity) on available-for-sale securities transferred to trading securities during the period and/or any unrealized gains or losses on investments that are separately or otherwise not categorized as trading or available-for-sale.

tlabel: restructuring reserve, foreign currency translation gain (loss)
description: Amount of foreign currency translation gain (loss) which decreases (increases) the restructuring reserve.
Amount of deferred tax consequences attributable to taxable temporary differences derived from prepaid expenses.
Amount after allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences and carryforwards.
Amount of deferred tax consequences attributable to taxable temporary differences derived from prepaid expenses.
Amount of receivable reflecting the cost incurred on uncompleted contracts in excess of related billings.
The expense charged against earnings during the period to allocate the capitalized costs of regulatory assets over the periods expected to benefit from such costs.
Amount of investment in debt and equity securities categorized neither as trading securities nor held-to-maturity securities and intended be sold or mature one year or operating cycle, if longer.

Investments in debt and equity securities which are categorized neither as held-to-maturity nor trading and which are intended to be sold or mature more than one year from the balance sheet date or operating cycle, if longer. Such securities are reported at fair value; unrealized gains (losses) related to Available-for-sale Securities are excluded from earnings and reported in a separate component of shareholders' equity (other comprehensive income), unless the Available-for-sale security is designated as a hedge or is determined to have had an other than temporary decline in fair value below its amortized cost basis. All or a portion of the unrealized holding gain (loss) of an Available-for-sale security that is designated as being hedged in a fair value hedge is recognized in earnings during the period of the hedge, as are other than temporary declines in fair value below the cost basis for investments in equity securities and debt securities that an entity intends to sell or it is more likely than not that it will be required to sell before the recovery of its amortized cost basis. Other than temporary declines in fair value below the cost basis for debt securities categorized as Available-for-sale that an entity does not intend to sell and for which it is not more likely than not that the entity will be required to sell before the recovery of its amortized cost basis are bifurcated into credit losses and losses related to all other factors. Other than temporary declines in fair value below cost basis related to credit losses are recognized in earnings, and losses related to all other factors are recognized in other comprehensive income.

tlabel: direct financing lease, net investment in lease, after allowance for credit loss
description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of net investment in direct financing lease.

tlabel: adjustments to additional paid in capital, dividends in excess of retained earnings
description: Amount of decrease in additional paid in capital (APIC) resulting from dividends legally declared (or paid) in excess of retained earnings balance.

tlabel: accrued liabilities for commissions, expense, taxes
description: The carrying amount for commissions, taxes and other expenses that were incurred but unpaid as of the balance sheet date.

tlabel: accrued liabilities for commissions, expense, taxes
description: The carrying amount for commissions, taxes and other expenses that were incurred but unpaid as of the balance sheet date.
Cash deposited in a special reserve account for the exclusive benefit of customers pursuant to SEC Regulations.
Securities deposited in a special reserve account for the exclusive benefit of customers pursuant to SEC Regulations.
Cash deposited in a special reserve account for the exclusive benefit of customers pursuant to SEC Regulations.
Securities deposited in a special reserve account for the exclusive benefit of customers pursuant to SEC Regulations.

tlabel: proceeds from securitizations of loans held-for-sale
description: The cash inflow from securitizing loans held with the intention to resell in the near future.

tlabel: employee stock ownership plan (esop), dividends paid to esop
description: Dividends paid on stock held by an employee stock ownership plan.

tlabel: servicing asset at fair value, other changes in fair value
description: Amount of increase (decrease) from changes in fair value classified as other for a contract to service financial assets under which the benefits of servicing are expected to more than adequately compensate the servicer.

tlabel: interest, fee income, loans, commercial, industrial,, agricultural loans
description: Interest and fee income generated from all commercial, industrial, and agricultural loans.
Amount of capitalized cost for obtaining membership with right to do business on trading exchange.

tlabel: employee stock ownership plan (esop), dividends paid to esop
description: Dividends paid on stock held by an employee stock ownership plan.

tlabel: servicing asset at fair value, other changes in fair value
description: Amount of increase (decrease) from changes in fair value classified as other for a contract to service financial assets under which the benefits of servicing are expected to more than adequately compensate the servicer.

tlabel: accumulated amortization of other deferred costs
description: Accumulated amortization of other deferred costs capitalized at the end of the reporting period. Does not include deferred finance costs, deferred acquisition costs of insurance companies, or deferred leasing costs for real estate operations.
The noncash expense charged against earnings to recognize the consumption of oil and gas reserves that are part of an entities' assets.
Amount of fee payable for management of operations based on performance under arrangement, including, but not limited to, investment.

tlabel: interest, fee income, loans, commercial, industrial,, agricultural loans
description: Interest and fee income generated from all commercial, industrial, and agricultural loans.

tlabel: other comprehensive income (loss), defined benefit plan, transition asset (obligation), reclassification adjustment from aoci, before tax
description: Amount, before tax, of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income (loss) for transition asset (obligation) of defined benefit plan.

tlabel: debt securities, available-for-sale, held-to-maturity, amortized cost, after allowance for credit loss
description: Amortized cost, after allowance for credit loss, of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) and investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

Noncurrent portion of a debt security issued by a state, certain agencies or authorities, a local government, or development corporation to finance the construction of air- or water-pollution control facilities or sewage or solid waste disposal facilities pursuant to federal law. The bonds are backed by the credit of the beneficiary of the financing rather than the credit of the issuer.

Noncurrent portion of a debt security issued by a state, certain agencies or authorities, a local government, or development corporation to finance the construction of air- or water-pollution control facilities or sewage or solid waste disposal facilities pursuant to federal law. The bonds are backed by the credit of the beneficiary of the financing rather than the credit of the issuer.

Current portion of a debt security issued by a state, certain agencies or authorities, a local government, or development corporation to finance the construction of air- or water-pollution control facilities or sewage or solid waste disposal facilities pursuant to federal law. The bonds are backed by the credit of the beneficiary of the financing rather than the credit of the issuer.

tlabel: unrealized gain (loss), foreign currency transaction, after tax
description: Amount, after tax, of unrealized gain (loss) from foreign currency transaction.

tlabel: interest, fee income, loans, consumer installment, credit card
description: Interest and fee income from credit card balances due from individuals. Such loans are considered revolving credit arrangements.

tlabel: interest, fee income, loans, consumer installment, credit card
description: Interest and fee income from credit card balances due from individuals. Such loans are considered revolving credit arrangements.

tlabel: allowance for loan, lease losses, write-offs
description: Amount of loans and leases that have been written off from both loan receivables and allowance reserve for credit loss.

tlabel: increase (decrease) in deferred revenue, customer advances, deposits
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amount of (a) prepayments by customers for goods or services to be provided at a later date, (b) the amount of customer money held in customer accounts, including security deposits, collateral for current or future transactions, initial payment of the cost of an acquisition or for the right to enter into a contract or agreement, (c) the increase (decrease) during the reporting period, excluding the portion taken into income, in the liability reflecting services yet to be performed by the reporting entity for which cash or other forms of consideration was received or recorded as a receivable, or (d) some combination of (a), (b), and (c).

The net amount of long-lived, depreciable flight assets owned by the entity and used in the entity's principle business operations (owned aircraft and capitalized improvements) and capitalized assets classified as property, plant and equipment that are owned by the entity. Excludes assets subject to a capital lease.
Amount of liability accrued for the employer's obligation related to an employee's right to receive compensation for future absences that have been earned by employee.
The premium (cost) of a hedge, expensed during the period.

tlabel: issuance of common stock to vendor

description: Amount of significant reductions in the period of other assets (current, noncurrent, or unclassified).

tlabel: financing receivable, allowance for credit loss, current
description: Amount of allowance for credit loss on financing receivable, classified as current.
Amount of paid and unpaid preferred stock dividends declared with the form of settlement in payment-in-kind (PIK).
The increase (decrease) in cash during the period due to the net increase or decrease in book overdrafts.
The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in outstanding loans including accrued interest.
The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the liability arising from securities loaned transactions.

tlabel: payment for contingent consideration liability, operating activities
description: Amount of cash outflow, not made soon after acquisition date of business combination, to settle contingent consideration liability exceeding amount recognized at acquisition date. Includes, but is not limited to, measurement period adjustment and less amount paid soon after acquisition date.

tlabel: proceeds from sale of long-term investments
description: The cash inflow from sales of all investments, including securities and other assets, having ready marketability and intended by management to be liquidated, if necessary, beyond the current operating cycle.

tlabel: transfers accounted for as secured borrowings, associated liabilities, carrying amount
description: Carrying amount of liabilities associated with financial assets accounted for as secured borrowings recognized in the transferor's statement of financial position at the end of each period presented.

Carrying amount, net of valuation reserves and adjustments, as of the balance sheet date of products used directly or indirectly in the manufacturing or production process, which may or may not become part of the final product. May also include items used in the storage, presentation or transportation of physical goods.
Amount of commission revenue from buying and selling securities on behalf of customers.

tlabel: cash, securities segregated under federal, other regulations
description: Amount of cash subject to withdrawal restrictions, restricted deposits held as compensating balances, and cash and securities segregated in compliance with regulations (such as cash deposited in a special reserve account for the exclusive benefit of customers).

Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), and investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading).
The amount of expense during the period for floor brokerage fees paid to other broker-dealers to execute trades on their behalf, stock exchange fees, order flow fees, and clearance fees.

tlabel: increase (decrease) in receivables from brokers-dealers, clearing organizations
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the total amount due to the entity related to activities and operations with other broker dealers, and clearing organizations, including deposits.

tlabel: increase (decrease) in payables to broker-dealers, clearing organizations
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the aggregate amount of obligations incurred arising from transactions with broker-dealers, such as amounts due on margin and unsettled cash transactions; includes payables to brokers, dealers and clearing organizations.
Amount due from customers for fees and charges arising from transactions related to the entity's brokerage activities and operations.
Amount, after deduction of unamortized premium (discount) and debt issuance cost, of long-term debt. Excludes lease obligation.

tlabel: share-based compensation arrangement by share-based payment award, options, exercises in period, intrinsic value
description: Amount of accumulated difference between fair value of underlying shares on dates of exercise and exercise price on options exercised (or share units converted) into shares.

tlabel: payments to acquire retained interest in securitized receivables
description: The cash outflow for the purchase of a retained interest in a receivable securitized via a structured process whereby interests in loans and other receivables are packaged, underwritten, and sold in the form of asset-backed securities.

Amount of divestiture of long-lived, physical assets used in the normal conduct of business and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, furniture and fixtures, and computer equipment.

tlabel: securities loaned, fair value of collateral
description: Fair value of the securities pledged as collateral against securities loaned.
Amount after amortization of leases acquired as part of a real property acquisition at below market lease rate with a finite life.
The carrying amount of deferred costs.

tlabel: distribution made to limited partner, cash distributions paid
description: Amount of cash distribution paid to unit-holder of limited partnership (LP).

tlabel: limited partners' capital account, distribution amount
description: The total amount of distributions to limited partners.

tlabel: financing receivable, before allowance for credit loss
description: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable.
Amount of long-term notes payable classified as other.
The amount of ownership interest of different classes of partners in limited partnership.

tlabel: payments for (proceeds from) deposits on real estate acquisitions
description: Net cash outflow or inflow from the amount given in advance to show intention to complete the acquisition piece of land, anything permanently fixed to it, including buildings, structures on it, and so forth.

Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of expenditures made in advance of when the economic benefit of the cost will be realized, and which will be expensed in future periods with the passage of time or when a triggering event occurs.
A tax based on the assessed value of real estate by the local government. The tax is usually based on the value of property (including the land).

This element represents money paid in advance to protect the provider of a product or service, such as a lessor, against damage or nonpayment by the buyer or tenant (lessee) during the term of the agreement. Such damages may include physical damage to the property, theft of property, and other contractual breaches. Security deposits held may be interest or noninterest bearing.

Including the current and noncurrent portions, carrying value as of the balance sheet date of Notes with the highest claim on the assets of the issuer in case of bankruptcy or liquidation (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer). Senior note holders are paid off in full before any payments are made to junior note holders.

tlabel: sec schedule, 12-28, real estate companies, investment in real estate, gross
description: Amount, before accumulated depreciation, of real estate investment by entity with substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate or interest in real estate. Excludes real estate not held as investment or interest.

tlabel: interest, fee income, loan, lease, nonmortgage, held-for-sale
description: Amount of interest and fee income earned from loans held-for-sale, including interest earned from direct financing and sales-type leases held-for-sale, but excluding mortgage loans held-for sale.

tlabel: employee benefit, share-based payment arrangement, noncash
description: Amount of noncash expense (reversal of expense) for employee benefits and share-based payment arrangement. Includes, but is not limited to, pension, other postretirement, postemployment and termination benefits.

The change in the inventory reserve representing the cumulative difference in cost between the first in, first out and the last in, first out inventory valuation methods, which change has been reflected in the statement of income during the period.
Expenses recognized in the period that are directly related to the selling and distribution of products or services.

tlabel: statutory accounting practices, statutory capital, surplus, balance
description: The amount of statutory capital and surplus (stockholders' equity) as of the balance sheet date using prescribed or permitted statutory accounting practices (rather than GAAP, if different) of the state or country.

The value of the financial instrument issued [noncash or part noncash] in the conversion of stock. Noncash is defined as transactions during a period that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. "Part noncash" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period.
For an unclassified balance sheet, amount of receivables due from an entity that is affiliated with the reporting entity by means of direct or indirect ownership.

tlabel: settlement of asset retirement obligations through noncash payments, amount
description: Amount of asset retirement obligations settled through noncash transactions. An asset retirement obligation is a legal obligation associated with the disposal or retirement from service of a tangible long-lived asset.
Amount of liabilities incurred and payable to vendors for goods and services received, and accrued liabilities classified as other.

Fair value portion of borrowing which can be exchanged for a specified number of another security at the option of the issuer or the holder, for example, but not limited to, the entity's common stock.
Specific incremental costs directly attributable to a proposed or actual offering of securities which are deferred at the end of the reporting period.

tlabel: due to officers or stockholders, current
description: Amounts due to recorded owners or owners with a beneficial interest of more than 10 percent of the voting interests or officers of the company. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

tlabel: due to officers or stockholders, noncurrent
description: Amounts due to recorded owners or owners with a beneficial interest of more than 10 percent of the voting interests or officers of the company, which are due after one year (or one business cycle).
Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of obligations due all related parties.
This element represents interest incurred for borrowed money which was used to produce goods or render services.
Amount of addition (reduction) to the amount at which a liability could be incurred (settled) in a current transaction between willing parties.
Value of outstanding derivative securities that permit the holder the right to purchase securities (usually equity) from the issuer at a specified price.

tlabel: other comprehensive loss, held-to-maturity security, reclassification adjustment from aoci for noncredit portion of otti, tax
description: Amount of tax (expense) benefit for reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive loss for other than temporary impairment (OTTI) realized in earnings for investment in held-to-maturity security.

tlabel: other-than-temporary impairment loss, debt securities, available-for-sale
description: Amount of other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), recognized in earnings and other comprehensive loss (OCI).
Amount of assets pledged to secure a debt instrument.
For an unclassified balance sheet, amounts due from owners or owners with a beneficial interest of more than 10 percent of the voting interests or officers of the company.

tlabel: redeemable noncontrolling interest, equity, common, redemption value
description: Redemption value, as if currently redeemable, of redeemable noncontrolling interest for common shares, units or ownership interests classified as temporary equity and the election has been made to accrete changes in redemption value to the earliest redemption date.

tlabel: disposal group, including discontinued operation, rental income
description: Amount of rental income attributable to disposal group, including, but not limited to, discontinued operation.

tlabel: mandatorily redeemable preferred stock, fair value disclosure
description: Fair value portion of shares that an entity is required to redeem for cash or other assets at a fixed or determinable date or upon the occurrence of an event.
Amount of increase (decrease) in interest expense on interest-bearing liability.

tlabel: employee stock ownership plan (esop), deferred shares
description: Represents the carrying amount of shares held by the ESOP as of the balance sheet date in which no ESOP participant has a vested interest and no lender has a claim.
Amount of interest expense on interest-bearing liability.

tlabel: proceeds from (repurchase of) trust preferred securities
description: The cash inflow from issuance of trust preferred securities, net of the cash outflow for repurchasing trust preferred securities, by a business trust or other special purpose entity, mainly established by a bank holding entity, to third party investors. The trust's assets are deeply subordinated debentures of the bank holding entity. Most trust preferred securities are subject to a mandatory redemption upon the repayment of the debentures.

tlabel: due from officers or stockholders, current
description: Amounts due from owners or owners with a beneficial interest of more than 10 percent of the voting interests or officers of the company, which are usually due within 1 year (or 1 business cycle).
Amounts due from an entity in which the reporting entity shares joint control with another party or group, due within 1 year (or 1 business cycle).

tlabel: aoci, cash flow hedge, reference rate reform, increase (decrease), after tax
description: Amount, after tax, of increase (decrease) to accumulated other comprehensive income (AOCI) for receipt (payment) of compensation for modification of interest rate related to reference rate reform for cash flow hedge.

Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of amounts paid in advance for expenses which will be charged against earnings in periods after one year or beyond the operating cycle, if longer.

tlabel: adjustment to additional paid in capital, income tax effect from share-based compensation, net
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in additional paid in capital (APIC) resulting from a tax benefit (deficiency) associated with an share-based compensation plan other than an employee stock ownership plan (ESOP).

tlabel: gain (loss) on disposition of stock in subsidiary
description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of equity in securities of subsidiaries.

tlabel: noncontrolling interest, change in redemption value
description: Change in noncontrolling interest during the period as a result of a change in the redemption value of redeemable noncontrolling interest.

Carrying amount of collateralized debt obligations with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle, if longer, excluding the current portion. Obligations include, but not limited to, mortgage loans, chattel loans, and other borrowings secured by assets.

tlabel: debt securities, held-to-maturity, excluding accrued interest, after allowance for credit loss, noncurrent
description: Amount excluding accrued interest, after allowance for credit loss, of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), classified as noncurrent.

tlabel: film, monetized on its own,, film, monetized in film group, amortization expense
description: Amount of amortization expense for capitalized film cost for film predominantly monetized on its own and film predominantly monetized with other films and license agreements.

tlabel: temporary equity, accretion to redemption value, adjustment
description: Amount of decrease to net income for accretion of temporary equity to its redemption value to derive net income apportioned to common stockholders.

tlabel: derivative credit risk valuation adjustment, derivative liabilities
description: Amount of credit risk valuation adjustment to derivative liabilities to properly reflect the credit quality of the entity.
Amount of assets pledged to secure a debt instrument.
Nominal or face amount on the investment owned.
The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in receivables to be collected from the reporting entity's executives and owners.

tlabel: aoci, cash flow hedge, reference rate reform, increase (decrease), after tax
description: Amount, after tax, of increase (decrease) to accumulated other comprehensive income (AOCI) for receipt (payment) of compensation for modification of interest rate related to reference rate reform for cash flow hedge.

tlabel: other comprehensive loss, held-to-maturity security, otti, after adjustments, tax
description: Amount, after adjustments, of tax (expense) benefit for increase (decrease) in other than temporary impairment (OTTI) on investment in held-to-maturity security, recognized in other comprehensive loss.

tlabel: other comprehensive loss, held-to-maturity security, reclassification adjustment from aoci for noncredit portion of otti, tax
description: Amount of tax (expense) benefit for reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive loss for other than temporary impairment (OTTI) realized in earnings for investment in held-to-maturity security.

tlabel: other-than-temporary impairment loss, debt securities, available-for-sale
description: Amount of other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), recognized in earnings and other comprehensive loss (OCI).

tlabel: other comprehensive loss, held-to-maturity security, reclassification adjustment from aoci for noncredit portion of otti, before tax
description: Amount, before tax, of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income for other than temporary impairment (OTTI) realized in earnings for investment in held-to-maturity security.

tlabel: debt securities, held-to-maturity, amortized cost, after allowance for credit loss, noncurrent
description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), classified as noncurrent.

tlabel: debt securities, available-for-sale, amortized cost, excluding accrued interest, after allowance for credit loss, current
description: Amortized cost excluding accrued interest, after allowance for credit loss, of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), classified as current.

tlabel: interest income, loans to other federal home loan banks
description: Amount of interest income from loans to another Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank).

tlabel: sec schedule, 12-28, real estate companies, investment in real estate, accumulated depreciation
description: Amount of accumulated depreciation pertaining to real estate investments for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

tlabel: sec schedule, 12-28, real estate companies, investment in real estate, gross
description: Amount, before accumulated depreciation, of real estate investment by entity with substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate or interest in real estate. Excludes real estate not held as investment or interest.
Amount of increase (decrease) in cost for defined contribution plan.
Amount of profit (loss) recognized at commencement from sales-type lease.
The current carrying amount of the liability for the freestanding or embedded guarantor's obligations under the guarantee or each group of similar guarantees.
Carrying amount of an option or options to acquire real property.

tlabel: film, monetized on its own,, film, monetized in film group, amortization expense
description: Amount of amortization expense for capitalized film cost for film predominantly monetized on its own and film predominantly monetized with other films and license agreements.

The cash inflow from an obligation which places a lender in a lien position behind debt having a higher priority of repayment (senior loan) in liquidation of the entity's assets scheduled to be repaid within one year or in the normal operating cycle of the entity, if longer.

The cash outflow for an obligation which places a lender in a lien position behind debt having a higher priority of repayment (senior loan) in liquidation of the entity's assets scheduled to be repaid within one year or in the normal operating cycle of the entity, if longer.

tlabel: net income (loss) from real estate investment partnership
description: Amount of net income (loss) recognized from investments in real estate partnerships and variable interest entities.

tlabel: assets sold under agreements to repurchase, repurchase liability
description: Amount to be repaid to the counterparty to the repurchase agreement when the carrying amount (or market value, if higher than the carrying amount) of securities or other assets sold under the repurchase agreement exceeds 10 percent of total assets.

tlabel: business combination, bargain purchase, gain recognized, amount
description: In a business combination in which the amount of net identifiable assets acquired and liabilities assumed exceeds the aggregate consideration transferred or to be transferred (as defined), this element represents the amount of gain recognized by the entity.

Fair value, after the effects of master netting arrangements, of a financial asset or other contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset. Includes assets not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

Fair value, after the effects of master netting arrangements, of a financial liability or contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset. Includes liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

tlabel: equity method investments, fair value disclosure
description: Fair value portion of investments accounted under the equity method.

tlabel: financial instruments sold, not yet purchased, at fair value
description: Fair value of obligations incurred from short sales.
The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the value of mortgage loans that are held with the intention to sell or be securitized in the near future.

The fair value amount of long-term debt whether such amount is presented as a separate caption or as a parenthetical disclosure. Additionally, this element may be used in connection with the fair value disclosures required in the footnote disclosures to the financial statements. The element may be used in both the balance sheet and disclosure in the same submission.
Carrying amount of the unpaid portion of the fee payable to the managing member or general partner for management of the fund or trust.
Amount of additional paid-in capital (APIC) classified as other.

tlabel: other payables to broker-dealers, clearing organizations
description: Amount of other payables due to broker-dealers or clearing organizations.
Secured financing other than securities sold under agreements to repurchase and securities loaned.

tlabel: payments for derivative instrument, investing activities
description: The cash outflow for derivative instruments during the period, which are classified as investing activities, excluding those designated as hedging instruments.

tlabel: payments for securities purchased under agreements to resell
description: The cash outflow associated with agreements to purchase and then resell securities to counterparties (reverse repurchase agreements).
Value of the difference between preference in liquidation and the par or stated values of the preferred shares.

Value of all nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) held by shareholders, which is net of related treasury stock. May be all or a portion of the number of preferred shares authorized. These shares represent the ownership interest of the preferred shareholders.

tlabel: proceeds from derivative instrument, investing activities
description: The cash inflow provided by derivative instruments during the period, which are classified as investing activities, excluding those designated as hedging instruments.

tlabel: proceeds from securities purchased under agreements to resell
description: The cash inflow associated with agreements to purchase and then resell securities to counterparties (reverse repurchase agreements).
Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of land and buildings obtained through foreclosure proceedings or defeasance in full or partial satisfaction of a debt arrangement.

tlabel: salary, wage, nonofficer, excluding cost of good, service sold
description: Amount of expense for salary and wage arising from service rendered by nonofficer employee. Excludes allocated cost, labor-related nonsalary expense, and direct and overhead labor cost included in cost of good and service sold.

tlabel: securities purchased under agreements to resell, not subject to master netting arrangement
description: Amount of funds outstanding loaned in the form of a security resale agreement between the entity and another party for the purchase and resale of identical or substantially the same securities at a date certain for a specified price, not subject to a master netting arrangement.

tlabel: servicing asset at fair value, amount
description: Fair value of an asset representing net future revenue from contractually specified servicing fees, late charges, and other ancillary revenues, in excess of future costs related to servicing arrangements.
Amount of expense for investment management fee, including, but not limited to, expense in connection with research, selection, supervision, and custody of investment.
Amount of fee payable for management of fund or trust.

tlabel: securities purchased under agreements to resell, not subject to master netting arrangement
description: Amount of funds outstanding loaned in the form of a security resale agreement between the entity and another party for the purchase and resale of identical or substantially the same securities at a date certain for a specified price, not subject to a master netting arrangement.

tlabel: unrecognized tax benefits, income tax penalties, interest expense
description: Amount of expense for interest on an underpayment of income taxes and penalties related to a tax position claimed or expected to be claimed in the tax return.

tlabel: unrecognized tax benefits, income tax penalties, interest expense
description: Amount of expense for interest on an underpayment of income taxes and penalties related to a tax position claimed or expected to be claimed in the tax return.
Fair value portion of notes payable.

tlabel: loan, held-for-sale or securitization or asset-backed financing arrangement, principal outstanding
description: This is the principal amount outstanding for loans which are in the process of being securitized as of the date of the statement of financial position (across all types of loans).

tlabel: derivative liability, security sold under agreement to repurchase,, security loaned, subject to master netting arrangement, before offset
description: Amount, before effects of master netting arrangements, of derivative liabilities, securities sold under agreements to repurchase and securities loaned. Includes liabilities elected not to be offset. Excludes liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement.
Amount of unrealized and realized gain (loss) on investment in equity security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (FV-NI).

tlabel: other comprehensive (income) loss, defined benefit plan, reclassification adjustment from aoci, tax
description: Amount of tax (expense) benefit for reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive (income) loss of defined benefit plan.
The change in equity as a result of a spin-off transaction (a regular or reverse spin-off) which is based on the recorded amounts.

tlabel: equity securities without readily determinable fair value, downward price adjustment, annual amount
description: Amount of loss from downward price adjustment on investment in equity security without readily determinable fair value.

tlabel: other receivable from broker-dealer, clearing organization
description: Amount of other receivables due from broker-dealers or clearing organizations.

tlabel: other receivable from broker-dealer, clearing organization
description: Amount of other receivables due from broker-dealers or clearing organizations.
Amount of interest revenue (income derived from investments in debt securities and on cash and cash equivalents) net of interest expense (cost of borrowed funds accounted for as interest).

tlabel: contract with customer, asset, before allowance for credit loss, current
description: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right is conditioned on something other than passage of time, classified as current.

tlabel: property, plant,, equipment, finance lease right-of-use asset, accumulated depreciation, amortization
description: Amount of accumulated depreciation and amortization from plant, property, and equipment and right-of-use asset from finance lease.

tlabel: business combination, provisional information, initial accounting incomplete, adjustment, financial liabilities
description: This element represents the amount of any measurement period adjustment (as defined) realized during the reporting period to financial liabilities assumed in connection with a business combination for which the initial accounting was incomplete.

tlabel: debt securities, available-for-sale, allowance for credit loss, not previously recorded
description: Amount of expense for credit loss on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), for which no credit loss was previously recorded.
Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of product derived from petroleum during the processing of oil or natural gas which is then used as a heat source or fuel.
Fair value of asset after deduction of liability.

tlabel: investment in physical commodities, fair value disclosure
description: Fair value of investment held in physical commodities, for example, but not limited to, gold, silver, platinum, crude oil, coal, sugar, rice, wheat.
Total amount of cash paid for operating activities during the current period.

tlabel: liability for asbestos, environmental claims, gross, payment for claims
description: Amount of cash outflow to settle insured claims and pay costs incurred in the claims settlement process attributable to asbestos and environmental claims.

Gross carrying amount before accumulated amortization as of the balance sheet date to an asset acquired in a business combination representing a favorable existing relationship with customers having a finite beneficial life.
Fair value of financial and nonfinancial obligations.
Amount of cash outflow for fees classified as other.
The cost of the restricted investment.

tlabel: oil, gas property, full cost method, depletion
description: Depletion of oil and gas property carried under the full cost method.
Amount of lease income from variable lease payments, interest income from net investment on sales-type lease, and profit (loss) recognized at commencement.

tlabel: payments for (proceeds from) other real estate partnerships
description: The net cash inflow or outflow from other real estate partnerships not otherwise defined in the taxonomy (buyouts, other agreements).
Amount of asset related to consideration paid in advance for royalties that provide economic benefits within a future period of one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

tlabel: disposal group, including discontinued operation, other liabilities, noncurrent
description: Amount classified as other liabilities attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of beyond one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

tlabel: financial instruments, owned, physical commodities, at fair value
description: The fair value as of the balance sheet date of firm holdings in physical commodity contracts (for example, agricultural products, metals and energy). Includes both pledged (to counterparties as collateral for financing transactions) and unpledged holdings.
Amount of expense reduction under arrangement in which third party explicitly reduces its fee by specified amount for service provided in exchange for use of investment company's assets.

tlabel: subordinated debt obligations, fair value disclosure
description: Fair value of subordinated debt obligations including, but not limited to, subordinated loan, subordinated bond, subordinated debenture or junior debt.
Amount of operating lease income from variable lease payments paid and payable to lessor, excluding amount included in measurement of lease receivable.

tlabel: sales-type lease, net investment in lease, excluding accrued interest, after allowance for credit loss, current
description: Amount excluding accrued interest, after allowance for credit loss, of net investment in sales-type lease, classified as current.

tlabel: defined benefit plan, amortization of prior service cost (credit)
description: Amount of prior service cost (credit) recognized in net periodic benefit cost (credit) of defined benefit plan.
Amount of decrease from sale of accounts receivable.

tlabel: proceeds from sale of real estate
description: Cash received for the sale of real estate that is not part of an investing activity during the current period.
Payments of cash to suppliers for goods and services during the current period.
Amount of current foreign income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to income (loss) from continuing operations.
