This form of debt can be exchanged for a specified amount of another security, typically the entity's common stock, at the option of the issuer or the holder, and places a lender in a lien position behind debt having a higher priority of repayment in liquidation of the entity's assets.

Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the portion of long-term, collateralized debt obligations due within one year or the operating cycle, if longer. Such obligations include mortgage loans, chattel loans, and any other borrowings secured by assets of the borrower.
Cash received for royalties during the current period.

tlabel: disposal group, including discontinued operation, other income
description: Amount of other income attributable to disposal group, including, but not limited to, discontinued operation.
Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable for statutory income, sales, use, payroll, excise, real, property and other taxes.

tlabel: other comprehensive (income) loss, reclassification adjustment from aoci for write-down of securities, before tax
description: Amount before tax of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income for unrealized loss realized upon the write-down of available-for-sale securities.

tlabel: dilutive securities, effect on basic earnings per share
description: Amount of increase (decrease) to net income used for calculating diluted earnings per share (EPS), resulting from the assumed exercise stock options, restrictive stock units (RSUs), convertible preferred stock of an employee stock ownership plan (ESOP), and other dilutive convertible securities.

tlabel: debt securities, available-for-sale, amortized cost, excluding accrued interest, before allowance for credit loss
description: Amortized cost excluding accrued interest, before allowance for credit loss, of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

tlabel: financing receivable, allowance for credit loss, excluding accrued interest
description: Amount excluding accrued interest, of allowance for credit loss on financing receivable. Excludes net investment in lease.

tlabel: financing receivable, excluding accrued interest, after allowance for credit loss
description: Amortized cost excluding accrued interest, after allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable. Excludes net investment in lease.

tlabel: financing receivable, excluding accrued interest, before allowance for credit loss
description: Amortized cost excluding accrued interest, before allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable. Excludes net investment in lease.

tlabel: financing receivable, after allowance for credit loss, current
description: Amortized cost, after allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable classified as current. Excludes net investment in lease.

tlabel: capitalized costs, oil, gas producing activities, gross
description: The sum of capitalized costs relating to oil and gas producing activities before accounting for accumulated depreciation.

tlabel: derivative, excluded component, gain (loss), recognized in earnings
description: Amount of gain (loss) from excluded component of derivative hedge, recognized in earnings. Excludes recognition under systematic and rational method.
Amount of undisbursed portion of financing receivable balance. Excludes financing receivable covered under loss sharing agreement.
Interest expense incurred on all savings account deposits.
The aggregate interest expense incurred on time deposits, including certificates of deposits, in domestic offices.

tlabel: off-balance sheet, credit loss, liability, credit loss expense (reversal)
description: Amount of expense (reversal of expense) for expected credit loss for off-balance sheet credit exposure. Excludes off-balance sheet credit exposure accounted for as insurance and instrument accounted for under derivatives and hedging.

tlabel: proceeds from (repayments of) other long-term debt
description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from other long-term debt.
Amount of expense for administrative fee from service provided, including, but not limited to, salary, rent, or overhead cost.

tlabel: increase (decrease) in due to other related parties
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in related party payables classified as other.

tlabel: deferred finance costs, own-share lending arrangement, issuance costs, amortization expense
description: Amount of expense for amortization of deferred issuance costs associated with an own-share lending arrangement.

tlabel: marketable securities, gain (loss), excluding other-than-temporary impairment loss
description: Amount of realized and unrealized gain (loss) on investment in marketable security.

tlabel: other comprehensive income (loss), financial liability, fair value option, reclassification adjustment from aoci for derecognition, after tax
description: Amount, after tax, of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income (loss) for unrealized gain (loss) from increase (decrease) in instrument-specific credit risk, realized upon derecognition of financial liability measured under fair value option.

tlabel: debt securities, available-for-sale, excluding accrued interest, allowance for credit loss, not previously recorded
description: Amount, excluding accrued interest, of credit loss expense on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) with no credit loss previously recorded.

tlabel: other comprehensive income (loss), available-for-sale securities adjustment, before tax, portion attributable to parent
description: Amount, before tax and after reclassification adjustment, of gain (loss) in value of unsold investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), attributable to parent.

tlabel: payments to acquire, develop real estate
description: The cash outflow from the acquisition of a piece of land and anything permanently fixed to it, including buildings, structures on it and so forth, and payments to develop real estate assets by adding improvements on or to a parcel of land. Such improvements may include drainage, utilities, subdividing, access, buildings, and any combination of these elements. Including real estate intended to generate income for the owner; excluding real estate acquired for use by the owner.

tlabel: fair value, concentration of risk, investment in federal home loan bank stock
description: This item represents disclosure of all significant concentrations of credit risk or market risk arising from the subject financial instrument (as defined), whether from an individual counterparty or groups of counterparties.

tlabel: cash, securities segregated under securities exchange commission regulation
description: Cash and securities deposited in a special reserve account for the exclusive benefit of customers.
The loss recognized on termination of a contract.
Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of merchandise or supplies held which are related to plants and animals.

tlabel: debt instrument, convertible, carrying amount of equity component
description: The carrying amount of the equity component of convertible debt which may be settled in cash upon conversion.

tlabel: real estate inventory, capitalized interest costs
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of interest costs that were capitalized to properties under development during the land development and construction period of a project, and which are included in inventory.

tlabel: inventory, ore stockpiles on leach pads, gross
description: Amount before last-in first-out (LIFO) and valuation reserves of ore stockpile material contained on a leach pad, for example, but not limited to, copper or gold ore.

tlabel: disposal group, including discontinued operation, other income
description: Amount of other income attributable to disposal group, including, but not limited to, discontinued operation.

tlabel: other real estate, covered, valuation adjustments
description: Valuation adjustments made to other real estate covered by loss sharing agreements not separately disclosed, including, but not limited to, real estate investments, real estate loans that qualify as investments in real estate, and premises that are no longer used in operations that may also be included in real estate owned. Excludes real estate assets taken in settlement of troubled loans through surrender or foreclosure by banks.
Aggregate amount of servicing liabilities that are subsequently measured at fair value and servicing liabilities that are subsequently measured using the amortization method.

tlabel: consolidation, less than wholly owned subsidiary, parent ownership interest, changes, repurchase of shares by subsidiary
description: Represents the repurchase of equity (treasury stock) by a subsidiary during the period, thereby effecting a change in total (consolidated) equity attributable to the parent; but not deconsolidation by the parent.

tlabel: debt, equity securities, gain (loss), excluding other-than-temporary impairment loss
description: Amount of unrealized and realized gain (loss) on investment in debt and equity securities, excluding other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI).
The amount of proceeds received resulting from the short sale of a security.

tlabel: business combination, recognized identifiable assets acquired, liabilities assumed, current assets, marketable securities
description: Amount of investments in debt and equity securities, including, but not limited to, held-to-maturity, trading and available-for-sale expected to be converted to cash, sold or exchanged within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer, acquired at the acquisition date.

tlabel: business combination, recognized identifiable assets acquired, liabilities assumed, current assets, receivables
description: Amount due from customers or clients for goods or services, including trade receivables, that have been delivered or sold in the normal course of business, and amounts due from others, including related parties expected to be converted to cash, sold or exchanged within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer, acquired at the acquisition date.

tlabel: business combination, recognized identifiable assets acquired, liabilities assumed, noncurrent liabilities, other
description: Amount of other liabilities due after one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer, assumed at the acquisition date.

tlabel: business combination, recognized identifiable assets acquired, liabilities assumed, other noncurrent assets
description: Amount of other assets expected to be realized or consumed after one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer, acquired at the acquisition date.

tlabel: derivative, fair value hedge, included in effectiveness, gain (loss)
description: Amount of gain (loss) on derivative instrument designated and qualifying as fair value hedge included in assessment of hedge effectiveness, recognized in earnings.
Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of capitalized amounts paid for mineral royalties which will be charged against earnings after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.
Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of amounts received from and refundable to customers unless used by them to obtain goods and services from the entity.

tlabel: derivative instruments not designated as hedging instruments, asset, at fair value
description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of derivative instrument not designated as hedging instrument and classified as an asset.

tlabel: derivative instruments not designated as hedging instruments, liability, at fair value
description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of derivative instrument not designated as hedging instrument and classified as a liability.

tlabel: debt security, mortgage-backed, held-to-maturity, fair value disclosure
description: Fair value of securitized, pay-through debt securities collateralized by real estate mortgage loans classified as held-to-maturity.
Cash payments related to participation costs.

tlabel: payment for acquisition, real estate, held-for-sale
description: The cash outflow from the acquisition of a piece of land held for sale, anything permanently fixed to it, including buildings, structures on it, and so forth.

tlabel: dilutive securities, effect on basic earnings per share
description: Amount of increase (decrease) to net income used for calculating diluted earnings per share (EPS), resulting from the assumed exercise stock options, restrictive stock units (RSUs), convertible preferred stock of an employee stock ownership plan (ESOP), and other dilutive convertible securities.
Amount of undisbursed portion of financing receivable balance. Excludes financing receivable covered under loss sharing agreement.

tlabel: loans, leases receivable, loans in process
description: Amount of undisbursed portion of the loan receivable balance (loans in process). Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

tlabel: construction contractor, receivable, excluding contract retainage
description: Amount billed to customers under long-term contracts or programs but not paid. Excludes amounts due that have been withheld because of retainage provisions in a contract.

tlabel: affordable housing tax credits, other tax benefits, amount
description: Amount of affordable housing tax credits and other tax benefits recognized.

tlabel: oci, debt securities, available-for-sale, transfer from held-to-maturity, gain (loss), before adjustment, tax
description: Amount, before adjustment, of tax expense (benefit) for unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

tlabel: hosting arrangement, service contract, implementation cost, expense, amortization
description: Amount of amortization expense for capitalized implementation cost from hosting arrangement that is service contract.

tlabel: interest-bearing domestic deposit, negotiable order of withdrawal (now)
description: Amount of interest-bearing domestic negotiable order of withdrawal (NOW) demand deposit liabilities.

tlabel: loss on fair value hedge ineffectiveness
description: Amount of recognized loss from the hedging ineffectiveness of a fair value hedge.

tlabel: interest, fee income, loans, commercial, real estate
description: Interest and fee income generated from loans secured by commercial properties. Examples of properties commonly securing commercial real estate loans may include office buildings, apartment buildings, shopping centers, industrial property, and hotels.

tlabel: debt securities, available-for-sale, held-to-maturity, fair value
description: Fair value of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) and investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

tlabel: receivable from officers, directors for issuance of capital stock
description: Amounts receivable from officers and directors resulting from the sale of stock to officers or directors before the cash payment is received.

tlabel: foreign income tax expense (benefit), continuing operations
description: Amount of current and deferred foreign income tax expense (benefit) attributable to income (loss) from continuing operations.
Capital account balance of the other unit holders in a limited partnership or master limited partnership. Does not include limited or general partners' ownership interests.

tlabel: proceeds from issuance of preferred limited partners units
description: The cash inflow from the issuance of preferred limited partners units during the period.
Cash received for royalties during the current period.

Amounts due for billed services rendered or to be rendered, actions taken or to be taken, or a promise to refrain from taking certain actions in accordance with the terms of a legally binding agreement between the Company and, at a minimum, one other party. An example would be amounts billed to customers under contracts or programs but not paid as of the balance sheet date.
Amount of incentive received by lessee from lessor.

tlabel: deferred compensation cash-based arrangements, liability, classified, noncurrent
description: Aggregate carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the liabilities for deferred compensation arrangements payable after one year (or the normal operating cycle, if longer). Represents currently earned compensation under cash arrangements (such as a profit-sharing plan, rabbi trust, and employee contract--excluding equity-based arrangements) that is not actually paid until a later date.

tlabel: debt securities, held-to-maturity, excluding accrued interest, before allowance for credit loss, current
description: Amount excluding accrued interest, before allowance for credit loss, of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), classified as current.

tlabel: other-than-temporary impairment loss, debt securities, available-for-sale, recognized in earnings
description: Amount of other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), recognized in earnings.
Amount of revenue from market data services, including, but not limited to, information about current quotes and most recent prices for a specific security.

tlabel: deferred finance costs, own-share lending arrangement, issuance costs, net
description: Amount of issuance costs recognized in a share-lending arrangement entered into by the entity, in contemplation of a convertible debt offering or other financing, after deduction of accumulated amortization or the effects of subsequent adjustments.
Amount of decreases to the indemnification asset due to write offs of loans, net of recoveries, relating to loss sharing agreements with the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation (FDIC).

tlabel: foreign income tax expense (benefit), continuing operations
description: Amount of current and deferred foreign income tax expense (benefit) attributable to income (loss) from continuing operations.
Amount of expense (income) related to reorganization items classified as other.
Amount of unrealized gain on investment in equity security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (FV-NI).

tlabel: financial instruments, owned, mortgages, mortgage-backed, asset-backed securities, at fair value
description: The fair value as of the balance sheet date of firm holdings in mortgages, mortgage backed securities (investment instruments that represent ownership of an undivided interest in a group of mortgages, where principal and interest from the individual mortgages are used to pay investors' principal and interest on the mortgage backed security) and asset-backed securities that are primarily paid from the cash flows of a discrete pool of receivables or other financial assets (such as credit-card receivables), either fixed or revolving, that by their terms convert into cash within a finite time period. Includes both pledged (to counterparties as collateral for financing transactions) and unpledged holdings.

tlabel: financial instruments, owned, other, at fair value
description: Fair value of firm holdings in securities classified as other. Includes pledged and unpledged holdings.

tlabel: financial instruments sold, not yet purchased, us government, agency obligations
description: Fair value of obligations arising from US treasury and other US government and agency debt obligations sold short.

tlabel: financial instruments sold, not yet purchased, us government, agency obligations
description: Fair value of obligations arising from US treasury and other US government and agency debt obligations sold short.

tlabel: payment for acquisition, loan, lease, held-for-investment, credit card securitization
description: The cash outflow from the purchase of securitized credit card receivables which are held for investment purposes. Securitization is the structured process whereby interests in loans and other receivables are packaged, underwritten, and sold in the form of asset-backed securities.

tlabel: financing receivable, excluding accrued interest, reclassification to held-for-sale
description: Amount excluding accrued interest, of financing receivable reclassified to held-for-sale. Excludes net investment in lease.

tlabel: redeemable noncontrolling interest, equity, common, carrying amount
description: As of the reporting date, the carrying amount of noncontrolling interests which are redeemable by the (parent) entity (1) at a fixed or determinable price on a fixed or determinable date, (2) at the option of the holder of the noncontrolling interest, or (3) upon occurrence of an event that is not solely within the control of the (parent) entity. The noncontrolling interest holder's ownership (or holders' ownership) may be in the form of common shares (regardless of class), limited partnership units (regardless of class), non-preferential membership interests, or any other form of common equity regardless of investee entity legal form.

tlabel: payments to acquire waste water systems
description: The cash outflow for the purchase of waste water systems which includes the waste treatment and disposal facility and equipment to households and industry.

The adjustment to reduce the value of existing agreements that specify the lessee's rights to use the leased property. This expense is charged when the estimates of future profits generated by the leased property are reduced.
The aggregate amount of gains or losses resulting from nonoperating activities (for example, interest and dividend revenue, property, plant and equipment impairment loss, and so forth).

tlabel: payments to acquire waste water systems
description: The cash outflow for the purchase of waste water systems which includes the waste treatment and disposal facility and equipment to households and industry.
Amount of increase (decrease) in fee payable for management of fund or trust.

tlabel: tax basis of investments, unrealized appreciation (depreciation), net
description: The net unrealized appreciation or depreciation.
Amount, after deferred tax asset, of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable differences, with jurisdictional netting, and liabilities classified as noncurrent and other.

Carrying value of the obligation (known or estimated) arising from requirements to perform activities to remediate one or more sites, payable after twelve months or beyond the next operating cycle if longer.

tlabel: accelerated share repurchases, adjustment to recorded amount
description: The adjustment needed to reconcile previously recorded amounts to the actual aggregate amount paid, whether in cash or other consideration, to acquire all of the shares purchased under an Accelerated Share Repurchase arrangement.

tlabel: asset acquisition, consideration transferred, other assets
description: Amount of tangible and intangible assets included as part of consideration transferred in asset acquisition, classified as other. Excludes cash.

tlabel: construction contractor, receivable, including contract retainage
description: Amount of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer under long-term contract or program when right to consideration is unconditional, including amount withheld under retainage provision in contract.

tlabel: construction contractor, receivable, including contract retainage
description: Amount of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer under long-term contract or program when right to consideration is unconditional, including amount withheld under retainage provision in contract.
Amount of cash outflow for lease commissions incurred.

tlabel: salary, wage, excluding cost of good, service sold
description: Amount of expense for salary and wage arising from service rendered by nonofficer and officer employees. Excludes allocated cost, labor-related nonsalary expense, and direct and overhead labor cost included in cost of good and service sold.

tlabel: other than temporary impairment losses, investments, portion in other comprehensive loss, tax, portion attributable to parent, available-for-sale securities
description: Amount of tax (expense) benefit of other than temporary impairment (OTTI) on investment in available-for-sale debt security, recognized in other comprehensive loss, attributable to the parent entity.
Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from finance lease.

tlabel: net investment in lease, before allowance for credit loss
description: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases.

tlabel: payments to acquire other real estate
description: The cash outflow associated with the purchase of other real estate investments held by the entity for investment purposes not otherwise defined in the taxonomy.

tlabel: revenue not from contract with customer
description: Amount of revenue that is not accounted for under Topic 606.
Amount of the adjustment to rental revenues to measure escalating leasing revenues on a straight line basis.

tlabel: increase (decrease) in property, other taxes payable
description: The increase (decrease) during the period in the amount of cash payments due to taxing authorities for non-income-related taxes.

tlabel: interest, fee income, loans, commercial, real estate
description: Interest and fee income generated from loans secured by commercial properties. Examples of properties commonly securing commercial real estate loans may include office buildings, apartment buildings, shopping centers, industrial property, and hotels.

tlabel: interest, fee income, loans, real estate construction
description: Interest and fee income from loans used for real estate development and construction costs. Such loans are referred to as "Construction" loans or mortgages.

For a classified balance sheet, the carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of the portion of the obligations recognized for the various benefits provided to former or inactive employees, their beneficiaries, and covered dependents after employment but before retirement that is payable within one year of the balance sheet date.
Amount of dividend distribution from ordinary income and capital gain. Excludes distribution for tax return of capital.

tlabel: investment company, tax return of capital distribution
description: Amount of distribution in excess of tax-basis earnings and profit of investment company.

tlabel: derivative assets (liabilities), at fair value, net
description: Fair values as of the balance sheet date of the net amount of all assets and liabilities resulting from contracts that meet the criteria of being accounted for as derivative instruments.

tlabel: derivative assets (liabilities), at fair value, net
description: Fair values as of the balance sheet date of the net amount of all assets and liabilities resulting from contracts that meet the criteria of being accounted for as derivative instruments.

tlabel: oci, equity method investment, before tax
description: Amount, before tax, of other comprehensive income (loss) (OCI) for proportionate share of equity method investee's OCI.

tlabel: deferred sales inducement cost, amortization expense
description: Amount of amortization expense (reversal of expense) for deferred sales inducement cost.

tlabel: gain (loss) on disposition of real estate, discontinued operations
description: Amount of difference between the carrying amount and the sales price of real estate properties sold as part of discontinued operations.
Amount of principal of investment owned.

tlabel: temporary equity, stock issued during period, value, new issues
description: Value of new stock classified as temporary equity issued during the period.

tlabel: oci, market risk benefit, instrument-specific credit risk, gain (loss), after adjustments, tax, parent
description: Amount, after adjustments, of tax expense (benefit) for unrealized gain (loss) from (increase) decrease in instrument-specific credit risk on contract or contract feature in long-duration contract issued by insurance entity that both protects contract holder from other-than-nominal capital market risk and exposes insurance entity to other-than-nominal capital market risk, attributable to parent.

tlabel: noninterest expense related to performance fees
description: Incentive fees which are compensation paid to a trading advisor or to any practitioner who achieves investment results above a specified contractual level.

tlabel: equity securities without readily determinable fair value, downward price adjustment, annual amount
description: Amount of loss from downward price adjustment on investment in equity security without readily determinable fair value.
Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from capitalized costs.

tlabel: proceeds from derivative instrument, financing activities
description: The cash inflow provided by derivative instruments during the period, which are classified as financing activities, excluding those designated as hedging instruments.

tlabel: proceeds from issuance of long-term debt, capital securities, net
description: The cash inflow associated with security instrument that either represents a creditor or an ownership relationship with the holder of the investment security with a maturity of beyond one year or normal operating cycle, if longer. Includes proceeds from (a) debt, (b) capital lease obligations, (c) mandatory redeemable capital securities, and (d) any combination of (a), (b), or (c).

tlabel: investment company, capital share transaction, increase (decrease)
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in equity from change in number of shares or units.

tlabel: investment income, operating, after expense, tax
description: Amount after expense and tax, of investment income classified as operating. Excludes realized and unrealized gain (loss) on investment.

tlabel: proceeds from disposition of investment, operating activity
description: Amount of cash inflow from sale of investment, classified as operating activity. Includes, but is not limited to, repayment, principal payment, paydown, and maturity of investment.

tlabel: realized, unrealized gain (loss), investment, derivative, operating, tax expense (benefit)
description: Amount of income tax expense (benefit) from realized and unrealized gain (loss) on investment and derivative, classified as operating. Includes, but is not limited to, debt and equity securities, security sold short, real estate, and commodity.

tlabel: realized, unrealized gain (loss), investment, derivative,, foreign currency transaction, operating, after tax
description: Amount, after tax, of realized and unrealized gain (loss) on investment, derivative, and foreign currency transaction, classified as operating. Investment includes, but is not limited to, debt and equity securities, security sold short, real estate, and c

tlabel: realized gain (loss), investment, derivative, operating, after tax
description: Amount, after tax, of realized gain (loss) on investment and derivative, classified as operating. Includes, but is not limited to, debt and equity securities, security sold short, real estate, and commodity.

tlabel: tax basis of investments, cost for income tax purposes
description: The aggregate cost of investments for Federal income tax purposes.

tlabel: tax basis of investments, gross, unrealized appreciation
description: Aggregate gross unrealized appreciation for all Investments in which there is an excess of value over tax cost.

tlabel: tax basis of investments, gross, unrealized depreciation
description: The aggregate gross unrealized depreciation for all Investments in which there is an excess of tax cost over value.

tlabel: unrealized gain (loss), investment, derivative, operating, after tax
description: Amount, after tax, of unrealized gain (loss) on investment and derivative, classified as operating. Includes, but is not limited to, debt and equity securities, security sold short, real estate, and commodity.

tlabel: realized gain (loss), investment, derivative, operating, after tax
description: Amount, after tax, of realized gain (loss) on investment and derivative, classified as operating. Investment includes, but is not limited to, debt and equity securities, security sold short, real estate, and commodity.

tlabel: unrealized gain (loss), investment, derivative, operating, after tax
description: Amount, after tax, of unrealized gain (loss) from investment and derivative, classified as operating. Investment includes, but is not limited to, debt and equity securities, security sold short, real estate, and commodity.

tlabel: realized gain (loss), investment, derivative, operating, after tax
description: Amount, after tax, of realized gain (loss) on investment and derivative, classified as operating. Investment includes, but is not limited to, debt and equity securities, security sold short, real estate, and commodity.

tlabel: unrealized gain (loss), investment, derivative, operating, after tax
description: Amount, after tax, of unrealized gain (loss) from investment and derivative, classified as operating. Investment includes, but is not limited to, debt and equity securities, security sold short, real estate, and commodity.

Amount at end of the reporting period of the aggregate extended product warranty liability that is expected to be paid within one year of the balance sheet date or normal operating cycle, if longer. Does not include the balance for the standard product warranty liability.

Amount at end of the reporting period of the aggregate extended product warranty liability that is expected to be paid after one year from the balance sheet date or normal operating cycle, if longer. Does not include the balance for the standard product warranty liability.

Amount as of the balance sheet date of the aggregate standard product warranty liability that is expected to be paid within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer. Does not include the balance for the extended product warranty liability.

Amount as of the balance sheet date of the aggregate standard product warranty liability that is expected to be paid after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer. Does not include the balance for the extended product warranty liability.

Amount at end of the reporting period of the aggregate extended product warranty liability that is expected to be paid within one year of the balance sheet date or normal operating cycle, if longer. Does not include the balance for the standard product warranty liability.

tlabel: income (loss) from discontinued operations, net of tax, attributable to noncontrolling interest
description: Amount after tax of income (loss) from a discontinued operation attributable to the noncontrolling interest. Includes, but is not limited to, the income (loss) from operations during the phase-out period, gain (loss) on disposal, gain (loss) for reversal of write-down (write-down) to fair value, less cost to sell, and adjustments to a prior period gain (loss) on disposal.

tlabel: limited liability company (llc) members' equity, including portion attributable to noncontrolling interest
description: Amount of ownership interest in a limited liability company (LLC), including portions attributable to both the parent and noncontrolling interests.

tlabel: proceeds from collection of lease receivables
description: The cash inflow associated with the collection of receivables arising from the lease of real estate, equipment or other fixed assets for a specified time in exchange for payment, usually in the form of rent; excludes proceeds from sales-type lease transactions, which are classified as operating activities.

tlabel: related party transaction, expenses from transactions with related party
description: Expenses recognized resulting from transactions (excluding transactions that are eliminated in consolidated or combined financial statements) with related party.

tlabel: other adjustments to income, discontinued operations
description: Amount of noncash income (expense), classified as other, from discontinued operations.
Capital account balance of the other unit holders in a limited partnership or master limited partnership. Does not include limited or general partners' ownership interests.

tlabel: contract with customer, asset, before allowance for credit loss, noncurrent
description: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right is conditioned on something other than passage of time, classified as noncurrent.

tlabel: disposal group, including discontinued operation, accounts, notes, loans receivable, net
description: Amount classified as accounts, notes and loans receivable attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of.

tlabel: proceeds from issuance of financial services obligations
description: The cash inflow from a long-term borrowing issued by the entity involved in financial services operations.

tlabel: effect of exchange rate on cash (deprecated 2022)
description: Amount of effect of exchange rate changes on cash balances held in foreign currencies. Excludes cash equivalents.

tlabel: effects of unrealized holding gain (loss) on present value of future insurance profits
description: Amount of adjustment to reflect the effect that would have been recognized had the unrealized holding gain (loss) actually been realized on the present value of future insurance profits being amortized using the gross profit method and the present value of future profits recognized as a result of a purchase of an insurance entity holding long-duration contracts.

tlabel: increase (decrease) in notes payable, related parties
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amount owed by the reporting entry in the form of loans and obligations (generally evidenced by promissory notes) made by the following types of related parties: a parent company and its subsidiaries; subsidiaries of a common parent; an entity and trust for the benefit of employees, such as pension and profit-sharing trusts that are managed by or under the trusteeship of the entity's management, an entity and its principal owners, management, or member of their immediate families, affiliates, or other parties with the ability to exert significant influence.

tlabel: loans, leases receivable, related parties, proceeds
description: Amount of cash inflow from related parties which reduce the amount of loans and leases receivable due from related parties.

tlabel: effect of exchange rate on cash, cash equivalents (deprecated 2022)
description: Amount of increase (decrease) from the effect of exchange rate changes on cash and cash equivalent balances held in foreign currencies.

Gross carrying amount before accumulated amortization as of the balance sheet date of an intangible asset that arises from a contractual arrangement with a third party (not including franchise rights and license agreements).

tlabel: effect of exchange rate on cash, cash equivalents (deprecated 2022)
description: Amount of increase (decrease) from the effect of exchange rate changes on cash and cash equivalent balances held in foreign currencies.

tlabel: loans, leases receivable, related parties, proceeds
description: Amount of cash inflow from related parties which reduce the amount of loans and leases receivable due from related parties.
Amount of increase (decrease) in interest expense on long-term debt.
Amount of other partners' capital.
Amount of other partners' capital.

tlabel: share-based compensation arrangement by share-based payment award, fair value assumptions, expected dividend payments
description: The estimated amount of dividends to be paid to holders of the underlying shares (expected dividends) over the option's term. Dividends are taken into account because payment of dividends to shareholders reduces the fair value of the underlying shares, and option holders generally do not receive dividends.

tlabel: share-based compensation arrangement by share-based payment award, fair value assumptions, expected dividend payments
description: The estimated amount of dividends to be paid to holders of the underlying shares (expected dividends) over the option's term. Dividends are taken into account because payment of dividends to shareholders reduces the fair value of the underlying shares, and option holders generally do not receive dividends.

tlabel: acquired finite-lived intangible asset, residual value
description: The aggregate expected value at the end of their useful life of a major finite-lived intangible asset class acquired during the period either individually or as part of a group of assets (in either an asset acquisition or business combination). A major class is composed of intangible assets that can be grouped together because they are similar, either by their nature or by their use in the operations of a company.
Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of liabilities incurred through that date and payable for statutory sales and use taxes, including value added tax.

tlabel: advance payments by borrowers for taxes, insurance
description: Carrying amount of accumulated prepayments received by financial institutions from borrowers for taxes (for example, property taxes) and insurance (for example, property and catastrophe) which will periodically be remitted to the appropriate governmental agency or vendor on behalf of the borrower.

tlabel: debt securities, available-for-sale, amortized cost, excluding accrued interest, after allowance for credit loss
description: Amortized cost excluding accrued interest, after allowance for credit loss, of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

tlabel: employee stock ownership plan (esop), deferred shares
description: Represents the carrying amount of shares held by the ESOP as of the balance sheet date in which no ESOP participant has a vested interest and no lender has a claim.

tlabel: increase (decrease) in advance payments by borrowers for taxes, insurance
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in prepayments received from borrowers for taxes and insurance remitted to the appropriate tax authority or insurer on behalf of the borrower.
The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the aggregate amount due to the entity in the form of unpaid interest and dividends.
The cash outflow for a financial contract that meets the hedge criteria as either a cash flow hedge, fair value hedge, or hedge of a net investment in a foreign operation.

tlabel: gain (loss) on sale of financing receivable
description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale of financing receivable.
The cash outflow for the purchase of amounts due from customers, clients, lessees, borrowers, or others under the terms of its agreements therewith.

tlabel: proceeds from sale of finance receivables
description: The cash inflow associated with the sale of receivables arising from the financing of goods and services.

tlabel: defined benefit plan, accumulated other comprehensive (income) loss, prior service cost (credit), before tax
description: Amount, before tax, of accumulated other comprehensive (income) loss for cost (credit) of benefit change attributable to participants' prior service from plan amendment or plan initiation of defined benefit plan, that has not been recognized in net periodic benefit cost (credit).

tlabel: defined benefit plan, plan assets, contributions by employer
description: Amount of contribution received by defined benefit plan from employer which increases plan assets.

tlabel: defined benefit plan, expected amortization, next fiscal year
description: Amount of cost (credit) included in accumulated other comprehensive (income) loss expected to be recognized in net periodic benefit cost (credit) for fiscal year following most recent annual statement of financial position.
Amount of expense for amortization of capitalized computer software costs.
The amount of asset retirement costs previously incurred and capitalized separately from the capitalized amount of the associated long-lived assets.
The amount of asset retirement costs previously incurred and capitalized separately from the capitalized amount of the associated long-lived assets.
The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the value of loans or securitized loans that are held with the intention to sell in the near future.

tlabel: proceeds from sale of mortgage-backed securities (mbs), available-for-sale
description: Amount of cash inflow from sale of investment in mortgage-backed security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

tlabel: noncontrolling interest in preferred unit holders
description: Carrying amount of the equity interests owned by noncontrolling preferred unit holders in an entity included in the reporting entity's consolidated financial statements.
Interest earned from receivables purchased; for instance, receivables purchased through a factoring arrangement.

tlabel: sale leaseback transaction, net proceeds, financing activities
description: Amount of cash inflow after closing and debt issuance costs received by a seller-lessee in a sale-leaseback recognized in financing activities.

tlabel: transfers of financial assets accounted for as sale, initial fair value of assets obtained as proceeds
description: Represents the initial fair value recorded for assets received on transfer of financial assets in a securitization, asset-backed financing arrangement, or a similar transfer which transaction is recognized as a sale of the transferred financial assets.

tlabel: variable interest entity, measure of activity, expense
description: The amount of expense between the reporting entity and the Variable Interest Entity (VIE).

tlabel: discontinued operation, provision for loss (gain) on disposal, net of tax
description: Amount after tax of (gain) loss recognized for the (reversal of write-down) write-down to fair value, less cost to sell, of a discontinued operation.

tlabel: gain (loss) on discontinuation of interest rate cash flow hedge due to forecasted transaction probable of not occurring, net
description: The amount of net gain (loss) reclassified into earnings when interest rate cash flow hedge is discontinued because it is probable that the original forecasted transactions will not occur by the end of the original period or an additional two month time period.

tlabel: oci, equity method investment, after tax
description: Amount, after tax, of other comprehensive income (loss) (OCI) for proportionate share of equity method investee's OCI.

tlabel: oci, equity method investment, before tax
description: Amount, before tax, of other comprehensive income (loss) (OCI) for proportionate share of equity method investee's OCI.

tlabel: closed block operations, income (loss) from discontinued operations, net of tax
description: Amount after tax of income (loss) from a disposal group, which is allocated to the operations of the closed block.
Amount of fee income including, but not limited to, managerial assistance and servicing of investment and origination and commitment fees.

tlabel: securities held as collateral, at fair value
description: The carrying amount (fair value) as of the balance sheet date of securities held that had been pledged by counterparties under financing and lending arrangements, pursuant to which the entity has the right by agreement or custom to sell or re-pledge such securities.

tlabel: financing receivable, allowance for credit loss, excluding accrued interest, noncurrent
description: Amount excluding accrued interest, of allowance for credit loss on financing receivable, classified as noncurrent.

tlabel: financing receivable, excluding accrued interest, after allowance for credit loss, current
description: Amount excluding accrued interest, after allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable classified as current.

tlabel: financing receivable, excluding accrued interest, after allowance for credit loss, noncurrent
description: Amount excluding accrued interest, after allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable classified as noncurrent.
Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of amounts received from and refundable to customers unless used by them to obtain goods and services from the entity.
The amount of cash received during the period on settlement of a hedge.

tlabel: consolidation, less than wholly owned subsidiary, parent ownership interest, changes, sale of interest by parent
description: Represents a sale by the parent of a portion of its equity interest in a subsidiary during the period, thereby effecting a change in total (consolidated) equity attributable to the parent. The sale of the equity interest represented by this element does not result in a loss of control by the parent.

Amount of the obligation recognized by withdrawing from a pension or postretirement benefit plan to which two or more unrelated employers contribute where assets contributed by one participating employer may be used to provide benefits to employees of other participating employers.
Amount of tax expense (benefit) allocated to other comprehensive income (loss) (OCI) for proportionate share of equity method investee's OCI.

Amount of deferred interest and fee income, unamortized costs incurred to originate loans and leases, unamortized loan commitments and loan syndication fees, and premiums over or discounts from face amounts of acquired loans. Excludes amounts for loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

tlabel: oci, debt securities, available-for-sale, gain (loss), before adjustment, after tax
description: Amount, after tax and before adjustment, of unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) and unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to available-for-sale.

tlabel: oci, debt securities, available-for-sale, gain (loss), before adjustment, tax
description: Amount, before adjustment, of tax expense (benefit) for unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) and unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to available-for-sale.

tlabel: other real estate, foreclosed assets,, repossessed assets
description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of other real estate and foreclosed assets. Other real estate may include real estate investments, real estate loans that qualify as investments in real estate, and premises that are no longer used in operations may also be included in real estate owned. Foreclosed assets include all assets obtained in full or partial satisfaction of a debt arrangement through foreclosure proceedings.
The total value of forfeitures related to restricted stock awards forfeited during the period.

tlabel: gain (loss) on sale of accounts receivable
description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale of accounts receivable.

tlabel: payments to acquire other loans, leases held-for-investment
description: Amount of cash outflow from purchases of loans and leases held-for-investment classified as other.

tlabel: servicing asset at fair value, changes in fair value resulting from changes in valuation inputs
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in fair value from changes in the inputs used to calculate the fair value of contract to service financial assets under which the benefits of servicing are expected to more than adequately compensate the servicer.
A credit or adjustment for government or taxing authority authorized decrease in taxes owed as a result of meeting certain tax policy conditions.

tlabel: business combination, acquisition of less than 100 percent, noncontrolling interest, fair value
description: This element represents the fair value of the noncontrolling interest in the acquiree at the acquisition date.

This element represents the total consolidated (as applicable) capitalization of the entity which is comprised of its long-term debt and equity instruments. The table may be detailed by subsidiary (legal entity) and include information by type of debt or equity detailed by instrument.

tlabel: contract with customer, asset, before allowance for credit loss, noncurrent
description: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right is conditioned on something other than passage of time, classified as noncurrent.

Developers, builders, governmental agencies and municipalities will provide the entity with cash, or in some cases property, to extend its services to their properties. Nonrefundable contributions are recorded as contributions in aid of construction ("CIAC").
Amount, after accumulated amortization, of debt issuance costs. Includes, but is not limited to, legal, accounting, underwriting, printing, and registration costs.

Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of the asset arising from energy trading activities that involves the purchase and sale of energy under forward contracts at fixed and variable prices and the buying and selling of financial energy contracts that include exchange futures and options and over the counter options and swaps, which are expected to be converted into cash or otherwise disposed of within a year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.
The increase (decrease) during the period in the carrying amount of capitalized costs of materials, supplies, or both, which are not included in inventory.
The amount of regulated water operating revenues recognized during the period.

tlabel: related party transaction, due from (to) related party, current
description: Receivables to be collected from (obligations owed to) related parties, net as of the balance sheet date within one year where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party; including affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, pension trusts, and so forth.
Amount of unbilled receivables under long-term contracts that have not been billed and were not billable.
Amount of operating expense of regulated operation.
Amount of operating expense for routine plant maintenance, repairs and operations of regulated operation.

tlabel: real estate owned, valuation allowance, component
description: The valuation allowance loss on real estate owned or any impairment losses taken against real estate investments held for use or resale.
Amount of collateralized debt obligations classified as other.

tlabel: deferred compensation arrangement with individual, contributions by employer
description: Amount of contributions made by employer into fund established for purposes of making future disbursement to individual in accordance with deferred compensation arrangement.

Sum of the carrying values as of the balance sheet date of (a) interest payable on all forms of debt, including trade payables, that has been incurred, and (b) dividends declared but unpaid on equity securities issued by the entity and outstanding (also includes dividends collected on behalf of another owner of securities that are being held by the entity). Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).
Amount of long-term debt classified as other, payable within one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

tlabel: debt, equity securities, gain (loss), excluding other-than-temporary impairment loss
description: Amount of unrealized and realized gain (loss) on investment in debt and equity securities, excluding other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI).
Amount of expense (reversal of expense) which increases (decreases) the restructuring reserve from an adjustment to a previously accrued restructuring liability.

tlabel: realized, unrealized gain (loss), investment, derivative, operating, after tax
description: Amount, after tax, of realized and unrealized gain (loss) on investment and derivative, classified as operating. Includes, but is not limited to, debt and equity securities, security sold short, real estate, and commodity.

Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of the funds held on behalf of others and that are expected to be liquidated within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer. This does not include funds held under reinsurance agreements.

Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations and payables pertaining to claims incurred of a workers compensation nature. Used to reflect the noncurrent portion of the liabilities (due beyond one year; or beyond one operating cycle if longer).

tlabel: equity securities without readily determinable fair value, impairment loss, annual amount
description: Amount of impairment loss on investment in equity security without readily determinable fair value.

tlabel: amount recognized in income due to inflationary accounting
description: The amount that will be recognized through the income statement (as well as the impact on the other financial statements) as part of highly inflationary accounting.
The increase (decrease) in noncurrent deferred charges, classified as investing activities.

tlabel: gain (loss) on sale of previously unissued stock by subsidiary
description: The profit or loss on sales of previously unissued stock by subsidiaries made to investors outside the consolidated group that is not reported as operating income. Represents the difference in the parent company's carrying amount of the equity interest in the subsidiary or equity investee immediately before and after the transaction.

tlabel: business combination, recognized identifiable assets acquired, liabilities assumed, contingent liability
description: The amount of liability arising from an inherited contingency (as defined) which has been recognized as of the acquisition date.

tlabel: consolidation, less than wholly owned subsidiary, parent ownership interest, changes, issuance of equity by subsidiary to noncontrolling interests
description: Represents a sale (new stock issuance) by a subsidiary to noncontrolling interests (third parties, parties directly or indirectly unrelated to parent) during the period. The capital transaction by subsidiary does not result in a loss of control by the parent, but does effect a change in total (consolidated) equity attributable to the parent.

tlabel: increase (decrease) in notes receivable, related parties
description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amount owed to the reporting entity in the form of loans and obligations (generally evidenced by promissory notes) made to the following types of related parties: a parent company and its subsidiaries; subsidiaries of a common parent; an entity and trust for the benefit of employees, such as pension and profit-sharing trusts that are managed by or under the trusteeship of the entity's management, an entity and its principal owners, management, or member of their immediate families, affiliates, or other parties with the ability to exert significant influence.

tlabel: proceeds from divestiture of interest in consolidated subsidiaries
description: The cash inflow associated with the deconsolidation of a previously consolidated subsidiary or the sale of investment in consolidated subsidiaries (generally greater than 50 percent).
The accumulated depreciation and amortization related to the asset(s) sold in connection with the property sold to another party and leased back to the seller.
Amount of receivables due from an entity that is affiliated with the reporting entity by means of direct or indirect ownership, due within 1 year (or 1 business cycle).

Amount of payable due to an entity that is affiliated with the reporting entity by means of direct or indirect ownership. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

tlabel: finance lease, right-of-use asset, accumulated amortization
description: Amount of accumulated amortization of right-of-use asset from finance lease.

The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in receivables to be collected from an entity that is controlling, under the control of, or within the same control group as the reporting entity by means of direct or indirect ownership.
The increase (decrease) in obligations owed to an entity that is controlling, under the control of, or within the same control group as the reporting entity by means of direct or indirect ownership.

tlabel: business combination, recognized identifiable assets acquired, liabilities assumed, cash, equivalents
description: Amount of currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, acquired at the acquisition date. Includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits. Also includes short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.
Stated value of common units of ownership issued by a limited liability company (LLC).

Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of the asset arising from derivative instruments and hedging activities, which are expected to be converted into cash or otherwise disposed of within a year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

Sum as of the balance sheet date of the (a) fair values of all liabilities resulting from contracts that meet the criteria of being accounted for as derivative instruments, and (b) the carrying amounts of the liabilities arising from financial instruments or contracts used to mitigate a specified risk (hedge), and which are expected to be extinguished or otherwise disposed of within a year or the normal operating cycle, if longer, net of the effects of master netting arrangements.

Fair value of liability arising from contracts that meet the criteria of being accounted for as derivative instruments, financial instrument or contract used to mitigate a specified risk (hedge), energy marketing activities (trading activities), expected to be settled after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer. Examples of energy marketing activities include, but are not limited to, trading of electricity, coal, natural gas and oil using financial instruments, including, but not limited to, forward contracts, options and swaps.

Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of the assets arising from derivative contracts and hedging activities, which are expected to be converted into cash or otherwise disposed of after a year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

tlabel: direct financing lease, net investment in lease, after allowance for credit loss, current
description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of net investment in direct financing lease, classified as current.

tlabel: direct financing lease, net investment in lease, after allowance for credit loss, noncurrent
description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of net investment in direct financing lease, classified as noncurrent.

tlabel: share-based payment arrangement, cash used to settle award
description: Aggregate cash paid by the entity during the period to settle equity instruments granted under equity-based payment arrangements.
Change in the different classes of partners' capital accounts during the year due to acquisitions. Partners include general, limited and preferred partners.

tlabel: preferred units, preferred partners' capital accounts
description: The amount of the preferred partners' ownership interests.

tlabel: proceeds from long-term capital lease obligations
description: The cash inflow from proceeds received from lessor related to a long-term capital lease obligation.

tlabel: property, plant, equipment, other, accumulated depreciation
description: Amount of accumulated depreciation of long-lived, physical assets used to produce goods and services and not intended for resale, classified as other.

tlabel: repayment of notes receivable from related parties
description: The cash inflow from a loan, supported by a promissory note, granted to related parties where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party; including affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, pension trusts, and so forth.

Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date and payable for utilities, such as electrical power, heating oil, natural gas, and water. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

tlabel: other comprehensive income (loss), financial liability, fair value option, reclassification adjustment from aoci for derecognition, after tax
description: Amount, after tax, of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income (loss) for unrealized gain (loss) from increase (decrease) in instrument-specific credit risk, realized upon derecognition of financial liability measured under fair value option.

tlabel: derivative, foreign currency transaction price change, unrealized gain (loss), operating, before tax
description: Amount, before tax, of unrealized gain (loss) on derivative and foreign currency transaction on derivative from change in market price, classified as operating.
Interest earned from receivables purchased; for instance, receivables purchased through a factoring arrangement.

tlabel: deferred sales inducement cost, amortization expense, realized gain (loss)
description: Amount of amortization expense (reversal of amortization expense) for deferred sales inducement cost from realized investment gain (loss).

tlabel: payment to acquire life insurance policy, operating activities
description: Amount of cash outflow for payment of premium on corporate-owned life insurance policy, classified as operating activities. Includes, but is not limited to, bank-owned life insurance policy.

tlabel: investment company, capital share transaction, increase (decrease)
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in equity from change in number of shares or units by investment company.

tlabel: business combination, recognized identifiable assets acquired, liabilities assumed, noncurrent liabilities
description: Amount of liabilities due after one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer, assumed at the acquisition date.

tlabel: business combination, recognized identifiable assets acquired, goodwill,, liabilities assumed, less noncontrolling interest
description: Amount recognized as of the acquisition date for the assets, including goodwill, in excess of (less than) the aggregate liabilities assumed, less the noncontrolling interest in the acquiree.

tlabel: gain (loss) on sale of previously unissued stock by subsidiary or equity investee, nonoperating income
description: The profit or loss on sales of previously unissued stock by subsidiaries or equity investees made to investors outside the consolidated group that is not reported as operating income. Represents the difference in the parent company's carrying amount of the equity interest in the subsidiary or equity investee immediately before and after the transaction.

tlabel: oil, gas property, successful effort method, accumulated depreciation, depletion amortization, impairment
description: Amount of accumulated depreciation, depletion, amortization and impairment of oil and gas property carried under the successful effort method.

tlabel: defined benefit plan, plan assets, increase (decrease) for assets transferred to (from) plan
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in plan assets of defined benefit plan from assets transferred into (from) plan.
Cumulative provision for contract losses not offset against related costs accumulated on the balance sheet.

tlabel: financing receivable, excluding accrued interest, after allowance for credit loss, noncurrent
description: Amortized cost excluding accrued interest, after allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable classified as noncurrent. Excludes net investment in lease.

tlabel: debt securities, held-to-maturity, accumulated unrecognized loss
description: Amount of accumulated unrealized loss on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity).

tlabel: energy related inventory, crude oil, natural gas liquids
description: The aggregate carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of unrefined petroleum and the liquid hydrocarbon components recovered from natural gas.

tlabel: realized, unrealized gain (loss), investment, derivative, operating, after tax
description: Amount, after tax, of realized and unrealized gain (loss) on investment and derivative, classified as operating. Investment includes, but is not limited to, debt and equity securities, security sold short, real estate, and commodity.
Cost of water purchased, may include any water related assessment. If water is bought on a unit volume basis, would also be considered as commodity costs.
The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in current portion (due within one year or one business cycle) of obligations evidenced by formal promissory notes.

The cash inflow from borrowing by the entity from developers, builders, government agencies and municipalities for construction that are repaid in cash, generally on a straight-line basis over periods ranging from five to forty years.
The amount of regulated power revenues recognized during the period.
The amount of regulated other operating revenues recognized during the period.

The cash outflow for the payments made by the entity, generally on a straight-line basis over periods ranging from five to forty years to developers, builders, government agencies and municipalities for borrowings received in construction.
Reduction in cash due to no longer including the former subsidiary's cash in the consolidated entity's cash.

tlabel: financing receivable, allowance for credit loss, writeoff, after recovery
description: Amount, after recovery, of writeoff of financing receivable, charged against allowance for credit loss.

tlabel: noncontrolling interest in preferred unit holders
description: Carrying amount of the equity interests owned by noncontrolling preferred unit holders in an entity included in the reporting entity's consolidated financial statements.
The amount of capital contributed by the preferred partners.

tlabel: oil, gas property, successful effort method, accumulated depreciation, depletion amortization, impairment
description: Amount of accumulated depreciation, depletion, amortization and impairment of oil and gas property carried under the successful effort method.
Amount of expense (reversal of expense) for expected credit loss on premium receivable.

tlabel: gain (loss) on price risk derivative instruments not designated as hedging instruments
description: Amount of gain (loss) recognized in earnings in the period from the increase (decrease) in fair value of price risk derivatives not designated as hedging instruments.

tlabel: noninterest expense related to performance fees
description: Incentive fees which are compensation paid to a trading advisor or to any practitioner who achieves investment results above a specified contractual level.

tlabel: securities held as collateral, at fair value
description: The carrying amount (fair value) as of the balance sheet date of securities held that had been pledged by counterparties under financing and lending arrangements, pursuant to which the entity has the right by agreement or custom to sell or re-pledge such securities.

tlabel: variable interest entity, measure of activity, expense
description: The amount of expense between the reporting entity and the Variable Interest Entity (VIE).

Amount of the obligation recognized by withdrawing from a pension or postretirement benefit plan to which two or more unrelated employers contribute where assets contributed by one participating employer may be used to provide benefits to employees of other participating employers.

tlabel: proceeds from sale of flight equipment
description: Cash received from sales of long-lived depreciable flight assets, including owned aircraft or capital improvements.

tlabel: consolidation, less than wholly owned subsidiary, parent ownership interest, changes, sale of interest by parent
description: Represents a sale by the parent of a portion of its equity interest in a subsidiary during the period, thereby effecting a change in total (consolidated) equity attributable to the parent. The sale of the equity interest represented by this element does not result in a loss of control by the parent.
Amount of asset retirement obligations incurred during the period.
The amount of cash received during the period on settlement of a hedge.

tlabel: transfers of financial assets accounted for as sale, initial fair value of assets obtained as proceeds
description: Represents the initial fair value recorded for assets received on transfer of financial assets in a securitization, asset-backed financing arrangement, or a similar transfer which transaction is recognized as a sale of the transferred financial assets.

tlabel: debt securities, held-to-maturity, accumulated unrecognized loss
description: Amount of accumulated unrealized loss on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity).

tlabel: real estate owned, valuation allowance, component
description: The valuation allowance loss on real estate owned or any impairment losses taken against real estate investments held for use or resale.
Amount of collateralized debt obligations classified as other.

tlabel: gain (loss) on foreign currency derivative instruments not designated as hedging instruments
description: Amount of gain (loss) recognized in earnings in the period from the increase (decrease) in fair value of foreign currency derivatives not designated as hedging instruments.

tlabel: deferred federal, state, local, tax expense (benefit)
description: Amount of deferred federal, state, and local tax expense (benefit) attributable to income (loss) from continuing operations. Includes, but is not limited to, deferred national, regional, territorial, and provincial tax expense (benefit) for non-US (United States of America) jurisdiction.
The carrying value of securities purchased to be resold in reverse repurchase transactions as of the balance sheet date.

tlabel: financing receivable, excluding accrued interest, before allowance for credit loss, noncurrent
description: Amortized cost excluding accrued interest, before allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable classified as noncurrent. Excludes net investment in lease.

tlabel: financial guarantee insurance contracts, premiums receivable, adjustment, accretion of discount on premium receivable
description: Amount of accretion of the discount for premiums receivable on financial guarantee insurance contracts.

tlabel: business combination, provisional information, initial accounting incomplete, adjustment, inventory
description: This element represents the amount of any measurement period adjustment (as defined) realized during the reporting period to inventory acquired in connection with a business combination for which the initial accounting was incomplete.

tlabel: sale leaseback transaction, net proceeds, financing activities
description: Amount of cash inflow after closing and debt issuance costs received by a seller-lessee in a sale-leaseback recognized in financing activities.

tlabel: mandatorily redeemable preferred stock, fair value disclosure
description: Fair value portion of shares that an entity is required to redeem for cash or other assets at a fixed or determinable date or upon the occurrence of an event.

tlabel: embedded derivative, fair value of embedded derivative asset
description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of the embedded derivative or group of embedded derivatives classified as an asset.

tlabel: business combination, provisional information, initial accounting incomplete, adjustments related to previous period
description: Amount of increase (decrease) in income that would have been recognized in previous periods if the adjustments to provisional amounts were recognized as of the acquisition date.

Amount of asset retirement obligations settled, or otherwise disposed of, during the period. This may include asset retirement obligations transferred to third parties associated with the sale of a long-lived asset.
Amount of expense for incentive rights held by the managing member or general partner, of limited liability company (LLC) or limited partnership (LP).

tlabel: payments to acquire real estate held-for-investment
description: The cash outflow associated with the purchase of real estate held for investment purposes.

tlabel: preferred stock, accretion of redemption discount
description: The amount of accretion of the preferred stock redemption discount during the period.

tlabel: proceeds from principal repayments on loans, leases held-for-investment
description: The cash inflow from repayments of the balance excluding interest (principal) on loans receivable and leases held for investment purposes.
Amount of additional cost recognized for award under share-based payment arrangement from occurrence of event accelerating recognition of cost.
Amount of additional cost recognized for award under share-based payment arrangement from occurrence of event accelerating recognition of cost.

tlabel: defined benefit plan, amortization of prior service cost (credit)
description: Amount of prior service cost (credit) recognized in net periodic benefit cost (credit) of defined benefit plan.

For a classified balance sheet, the carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of the portion of the obligations recognized for the various benefits provided to former or inactive employees, their beneficiaries, and covered dependents after employment but before retirement that is payable after one year (or beyond the operating cycle if longer).
The cash outflow due to repaying amounts borrowed by issuing commercial paper.
The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the value of coal held in inventory.
The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the value of coal held in inventory.

Gross carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of certain rights acquired to exercise a certain privilege or pursue a particular business or occupation and which is deemed to have a finite economic life.
